46a3(mdo 'grel): du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa pas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang
46a4(mdo 'grel): zhig gis/ sangs rgyas ri mor bris pa'am gzugs su byas pa mthong na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed na/ thal mo sbyar ba'am/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/ spos sam/ mang me 'bul ba lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de
46a5(mdo 'grel): bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpa' rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang gA'i klung gi
46a6(mdo 'grel): bye ma snyed dag la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul ba dang/ de bzhin du lha'i na bza' rnams phul ba bas/ rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis/ tha na phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bsam
46a7(mdo 'grel): pa phun sum tshogs pa gcig la/ sangs rgyas la skyer ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung ba yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin gcig zan gcig byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo
46b1(mdo 'grel): gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'i gos
46b2(mdo 'grel): rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ sangs rgyas la skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung pa yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin gcig zan gcig
46b3(mdo 'grel): byin na yang/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig
46b4(mdo 'grel): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta
46b5(mdo 'grel): bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ sangs rgyas la skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung ba yongs su 'dzin te/ tha na nyin gcig zan gcig byin na yang/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm
46b6(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin
46b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches
47a1(mdo 'grel): bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 
47a2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de
47a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas chos bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/
47a4(mdo 'grel): bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/ nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'i
47a5(mdo 'grel): gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang/ klog pa 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa
47a6(mdo 'grel): bskyed do/ /bzlog ste/ bsti stang ma byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyang de bzhin du brtod par bya'o/ /phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang/ ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang/ glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i shing rta lta
47a7(mdo 'grel): bus 'gro ba dang/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'ang de bzhin te/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gyi rdul snyed kyi/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 
47b1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bar chad byas pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i
47b2(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing/ khro ba dang brnyas pa'i sems bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa grangs med pa bskyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
47b3(mdo 'grel): kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad mig phyung nas/ bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' la rkyen ci yang rung bas brnyas pa'i sems bskyed de/ gshe ba dang/ mi snyan par smra
47b4(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ snyogs par byed pa na/ de bas ches sdig pa mang du bskyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis /byang chub sems dpa' la rkyen ci yang rung bas brnyas pa bskyed de spyos nas/ de mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal
47b5(mdo 'grel): ba du 'bod chen por lus dpag tshad lnga brgya par skye bar 'gyur te/ de la mgo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro/ /de'i mgo re re la yang kha lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/ de'i kha re re la yang lce lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur te/ lce re re la yang gshel lnga brgya lnga brgyas
47b6(mdo 'grel): smod par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad la dbyig pa dang/ mtshon gyis bsnun te bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/
47b7(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed na/ khro ba dang/ gnod sems dang/ tha ba dang/ khros pa'i sems bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sngags pa grangs med pa bskyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi
48a1(mdo 'grel): buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ sdang ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang/ gling re re dang/ dgra
48a2(mdo 'grel): bcom pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi srog bcad pa dang/ rin po che'i mchod rten rin po che'i stegs bus yongs su bskor cing/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lha'i ba dan dang/ btsugs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bshigs pa bas/ 'jam
48a3(mdo 'grel): dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i theg pa chen po nyid la sgro btags te/ brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas/ skyon cis kyang rung bas/ khro ba dang/ gshe ba dang/ mi snyan par
48a4(mdo 'grel): zer ba dang/ khyad du gsod par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa bskyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa des par 'byung ba'i phyir te/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa
48a5(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /gang byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa des chos spang ba yin no/ /chos kyang gzhan la/ chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid chos so/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo
48a6(mdo 'grel): gang la la zhig khros nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson ra mun nag du btsud pa bas/ rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la khros te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rgyab kyi phyogs shing 'dug
48a7(mdo 'grel): nas/ ma rungs pa 'di ni mi blta'o zhes zer na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par bskyed do/ /'jam dpal rigs kyi buAm rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa
48b1(mdo 'grel): pas/ gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu yang rung ba la smad na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par bskyed do zhes gsungs so// //zhal ta byed pa la dgongs pa bstan pa/ nyi ma'i snying po'i mdo las
48b2(mdo 'grel): kyang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhal ta ba zhes bgyi ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na zhal ta par gdags par mdzad pa lags na/ bcom
48b3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dge slong gnyis zhal ta bar ngas gnang ngo/ /gang zhe na/ gang yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsgoms pa'i dgra bcom pa dang/ gang yang dge slong slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa yin te/ rgyal po chen po
48b4(mdo 'grel): dge slong 'di gnyis zhal ta byed pa'i las byed par ngas gnang ngo zhes gsungs so// //'od srungs kyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
48b5(mdo 'grel): 'das dge slong ji lta bus zhal ta bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs zhal ta bye bar gnang ba'i dge slong gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ dge slong yongs su dag pa 'jig rten gyi khams pha rol tu kha na ma tho
48b6(mdo 'grel): bas 'jigs par lta ba las kyi rnam par smin pa la ston pas/ 'dzem pa dang ldan zhing 'gyod pa dang ldan pa dang/ gang yang zag pa zad pa/ dgra bcom par gyur pa ste/ 'od srungs dge slong ma nyams pa 'di gnyis zhal ta byed par ngas gnang ngo/
48b7(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srungs legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la/ rigs sna tshogs las rab tu byung ba/ sems kyi mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ spong ba'i phyir rnal 'byor sna tshogs la gnas pa/ kha cig ni dgon pa bas mdza' i
49a1(mdo 'grel): mal stan la mngon par dga' ba/ kha cig ni bsod snyoms pa/ kha cig ni grong 'dab na gnas pa/ kha cig ni 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa/ kha cig ni mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa/ kha cig ni chos smra ba/ kha cig
49a2(mdo 'grel): ni 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ kha cig ni ma mo 'dzin pa/ kha cig ni grong dang grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang/ pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas chos ston pa ste/ sems can gzhan dag gi sems kyi spyod pa rnams pa srung dka' ba'i phyir
49a3(mdo 'grel): 'od srungs de la dge slong de zhal ta byed pas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi sems mgu bar bya'o/ /'od srungs de la dge slong dgon pa bas mdza' i mal stan gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong zhal ta byed pa yongs su bsko bar mi bya'o/ /zhal
49a4(mdo 'grel): ta byed pas dge slong dgon pa pa de dag bsrung bar bya ste/ dus ma yin par gsol bar mi bya/ dus ma yin par btang bar mi bya'o/ /'od srungs gal te dge slong dgon pa pa la dge 'dun gyi bya bar gtogs pa'i las res bab na/ dge slong
49a5(mdo 'grel): zhal ta byed pa des las bdag nyid kyis bya'o/ /yang na dge slong gzhan zhig bskos la las byed du gzhug ste/ dge slong dgon pa la la gnod par mi bya'o/ /'od srungs de la dge slong bsod nyoms spyod pa gang yin pa de la/ dge slong zhal ta byed
49a6(mdo 'grel): pa des kha zas bsod pa bgo bsha' bya'o/ /'od srungs de la dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa gang yin pa de dag la dge slong zhal ta byed pa'i mthun pa'i 'tshog chas dang/ na ba'i gsos sman dang/ yo byad rnams sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong rnal 'byor spyod
49a7(mdo 'grel): pa de la phyogs gang la gnas pa'i sa phyogs der/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa des sgra chen po dang/ skad drag po mi dbyung zhing byed du yang mi gzhug go /dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong spyod pa de bsrung zhing mal cha yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /kha zas
49b1(mdo 'grel): bsod pa dang/ yi gar 'ong ba dang/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang mthun pa'i bza' ba dang/ bca' ba rnams sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong de la dge slong 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ston pa'i phyir gnas pa yin te/ de la bdag gis rjes su
49b2(mdo 'grel): mthun pa'i yo byad thams cad mang du sbyar bar bya'o snyam du shin tu 'phangs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /'od srungs de la dge slong mang du thos pa la mngon par brtson pa gang yin pa de dag la dge slong zhal ta byed pas/ lung mnos shig /lhogs
49b3(mdo 'grel): shig /kha ton gyis shig /kho bo ni khyod kyi rim gro byed pa yin gyis/ khyod ji lta ji lta bur mang du thos par gyur pa de lta de lta bur/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mdzes par 'gyur ba gyis shig /'dul ba brjod pas mdzes par gyis shig /bdag
49b4(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi shes rab kyang mchog tu 'gyur bar gyis shig ces spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /'od srungs de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas de dag dus ma yin par btang bar mi bya/ las su bsgo bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong zhal ta byed pa des dge slong mang du thos pa
49b5(mdo 'grel): de dag bsrung bar bya'o/ /'od srungs de la chos smra ba'i dge slong yin pa de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas las su mi bsgo par bya'o/ /grong dang grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug tu bcug la chos 'chad du
49b6(mdo 'grel): gzhug go /chos nyan pa dag bsgo bar bya'o/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par bya'o/ /'bel ba'i chos kyi gtam gyi phyir dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o/ /chos smra ba'i dge slong la dge slong gang dag gnod par byed pa'i dge slong de dag dge
49b7(mdo 'grel): slong zhal ta byed pas bzlog par bya'o/ /dge slong zhal ta byed pas chos smra ba'i dge slong la rtag tu bsu bar bya'o/ /legs so zhes bya ba mang du bya'o/ /'od srungs de la dge slong gang dag 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang/ ma mo 'dzi par gyur pa de dag gi gan du dge slong
50a1(mdo 'grel): zhal ta byed pa song la/ ji ltar na bdag rma med cing ma nyams pa dag /ji ltar na bdag ltung ba med pa'i chos kyi zhal ta bya zhes yongs su dri bar bya'o/ /de nas 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang/ ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag gis
50a2(mdo 'grel): dge slong zhal ta byed pa'i bsam pa rig nas de'i bya ba dang/ 'byung ba gang yin pa dang/ byed pa gang yin pa de bstan par bya'o/ /dge slong zhal ta byed pas/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang/ ma mo 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag la phangs par bya ba dang/ dad pa
50a3(mdo 'grel): dang gus pa dang/ zhes rab tu bskyed par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de dag dge slong zhal ta byed pas/ dus dus su dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'i/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bsags shing sba bar mi bya ste/ ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin du sbyin
50a4(mdo 'grel): par bya/ ma bskul bar sbyin par bya/ gnod pa med par sbyin par bya'o/ /des 'dun pa dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ 'jigs pas 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun la rton par bya'o/ /khyim pa'i phyogs la rton par mi bya'o/ /dge 'dun
50a5(mdo 'grel): gyi bya ba la rton par bya'i/ /bdag dga' bar bya ba la rton par mi bya'o/ /dngos po gang la yang dbang bya ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'i/ bya ba ji tsam du chung ba yang dge 'dun gyi gros bzhin bya zhing/ rang dgar mi bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi'am/ phyogs bzhi'i
50a6(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun gyi'am/ mchod rten gyi yo byad gang ci yang rung ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag par bya ste/ dge 'dun gyi dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o/ /phyag bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dang dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o/ /dge 'dun
50a7(mdo 'grel): gyi dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa mchod rten gyi bse bar mi bya'o/ /mchod rten gyi rnyed pa yang dge 'dun gyi dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang bsre bar mi bya'o/ /gal te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la brel phongs su gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa tshe
50b1(mdo 'grel): bar gyur na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdus la gros mthun par gyis te/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa las/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bzhugs par bya'o/ /gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig ral du gyur la/ dge 'dun gyi
50b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa che bar gyur na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad bsdus la/ gros mthun par bgyis te/ 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'di ni zhig ral du gyur la/ dge
50b3(mdo 'grel): 'dun gyi dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa ni che bar gyur na/ gal te che dang ldan pa rnams gnod pa med cing dad pa dang ldan la bzod cing gnang na/ bdag gi dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'di las dngos po cung zad cig khyer
50b4(mdo 'grel): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten bcas par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te dge 'dun gyi gnang na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa des de bzhin du bya'o/ /ji ste dge slong gi ma gnang na/ dge slong zhal ta byed pa nges sbyin pa po dang/ sbyin bdag la
50b5(mdo 'grel): gsol ba thob la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gso bar bya'o/ /'od srungs gal te mchod rten gyi rnyed pa ji ltar mang du gyur tu zin kyang zhal ta byed pas dge 'dun dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshug par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dad cing
50b6(mdo 'grel): dad ba mang po dag gis mchod rten la phul ba ni/ tha na ras kyi kha tshar cig tsam gang yin pa de yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten yin na/ rin po che'am rin po cher smos bdag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mchod rten la gos phul ba
50b7(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de nyid du rlung dang/ nyi ma dang/ char par de ngas kyang sla'i/ mchod rten la phul ba'i gos dbyig gam/ dbyig gi rin du bsgyur bar mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mchod rten gyi ni rin
51a1(mdo 'grel): thad du cung zad kyang med la/ mchod rten ne cis kyang brel ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pas de ltar yongs su dag par bya ste/ des dkon mchog gsum gyi dang ma 'bags par bya'o/ /bdag gi rnyed pas
51a2(mdo 'grel): chog shes par bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyis rlabs pa'i dngos po rnams la bdag gir 'du shes mi bya'o/ /'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang la la zhig gis/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon
51a3(mdo 'grel): tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin gnas rnams la sems khros sam/ dbang byed cing bsgo blag byed na/ de mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te mi'i 'jig rten du 'od na yang bran dang gzhan gyi las byed par 'gyur ba
51a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ khu tshur dang/ thal lcag dang/ lag cha bsnyems pas brdogs pa dang phrad par 'gyur ro/ /'od srungs gzhan yang gal te dge slong zhal ta byed pa dge 'dun gyi bya ba las 'das te/ rang dgar dge slong rnams la dbang byed cing bsgo ba dang/
51a5(mdo 'grel): chad pas gcod pa dang/ 'jigs par byed pa dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ dus ma yin par brdegs pa dang/ dus ma yin par sgo bar byed na/ de mi dge ba'i las des nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba phur pa mang po zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur te
51a6(mdo 'grel): der skyes nas lus la lcags phur brgya stong zug cing de dag 'bar/ rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba mched cing 'bar par 'gyur ro/ /des tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la bsdigs shig /dag
51a7(mdo 'grel): gi las gdug pa smras par gyur pa gang yin pa des der skyes nas/ lce'i dbang po'i khyon dpag tshad brgya par 'gyur zhing/ de'i lce'i dbang po de la lcags phur brgya stong rab tu 'bab cing/ de dag kyang 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu
51b1(mdo 'grel): rab tu 'ched cing 'bar te/ mer 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des bsdigs shing dag gi las gdug pa smras pa'i phyir ro/ /'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'dus shing 'dus bzhag ste/ dus dus su me
51b2(mdo 'grel): sbyin zhing/ mtho btsams la bcos nas sbyin pa dang/ kha cig sbyin/ kha cig ma byin/ kha cig la byin/ kha cig la ma byin/ des mi dge ba'i las des yi dags kyi skye gnas rkyags 'jim byin pa nub ces bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de der
51b3(mdo 'grel): skyas nas yi dags gzhan gyis kha zas blangs te/ de la bstan na de bstan pa'i che mig mi 'dzums par zas de la blta zhing bkres pa dang/ skoms pas nyen pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong gi /lo brgya stong du yang zas de thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ste brgya
51b4(mdo 'grel): la brgya lam na zas de thob kyang/ ngan skyags dang rnag khrag tu 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ sbyin gnas rnams mgu bar ma byas shing/ rang gi rnyed pas chog mi shes pa'i phyir ro/ /'od
51b5(mdo 'grel): srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun gyi'am/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi 'am/ mchod rten gyi 'chol bar byas na/ de'i rnam par smin pa ni ngas bskal par bgrangs pas kyang brjod kyis mi lang ngo/ /'od srungs dge slong zhal ta
51b6(mdo 'grel): byed pa gang la las nyes dmigs kyi gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas/ khro 'am/ gshe'am/ gnod par sems shing/ khong khro ba skyed na/ de ni gsor mi rung ngo zhes ngas bshad do/ /'od srungs da lta bas na dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'di thos nas/
51b7(mdo 'grel): dge slong zhal ta byed pas lus dang ngag dang/ yid yongs su dag par bya'o/ /bdag dang gzhan bsrung bar bya'o/ /'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa rang gi sha la za yang sla'i/ dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i lhung bzed dam/
52a1(mdo 'grel): gos sam/ na ba'i gsos sman nam/ yo byad yongs su spyad par ni mi bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi lhod pa rnams kyis lhod pa'i
52a2(mdo 'grel): chos dang/ 'dzem dog mchis pa rnams kyis 'dzem dog gis chos rnams bka' stsal to zhes gsungs so/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i mdo las kyang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di
52a3(mdo 'grel): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas/ las ngan ba rtsom pa de dag ni shes rab shin tu chung zhing /shes rab kyi dman par 'gyur ba lags so/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang/
52a4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi mchog yongs su spangs nas las dan ba rtsom pa de dag
52a5(mdo 'grel): ni/ shes rab shin tu chung zhing shes rab kyi dman par 'gyur ba yin no/ /byams pa gzhan yang khyod mos par bya'o/ /khyod kyi khong du chud par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la sbyor ba med cing/ bsam gtan med la spong ba med cing 'don pa
52a6(mdo 'grel): med pa dang/ mang du thos pa yongs su 'tshol ba med pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba ma yin no/ /byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsdan pa ni bsam gtan dang spong bas che ba dang/ ye shes kyis 'dus byas pa dang/ ye
52a7(mdo 'grel): shes kyis mnyam par bzhag pa dang/ brtson pas phye ba yin gyis khyim pa'i las dang zhal ta byed pas phye ba ni ma yin te/ 'di ltar zhal ta byed pa'i las de ni mi rig pa la sbyor ba rnams dang/ 'du byed la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang/ 'jig
52b1(mdo 'grel): rten pa'i bya bas spags pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas de la 'dod pa skyed par mi bya'o/ /byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dag gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
52b2(mdo 'grel): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bkang nas des ni nga mnyes par byas ba ma yin/ ri mor byas pa ma yin/ bkur stir byas pa ma yin gyis/ byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' tha na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i
52b3(mdo 'grel): tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam/ 'chad dam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'chang ba de ni nga la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
52b4(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ byams pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni mang du thos pa las byung ba yin gyis/ dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa las byung ba ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /byams pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byed pa la brtson pas
52b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' lung nod pa dang/ kha ton byed pa la brtson ba zhal ta byed pa'i sbags pas sbags par byed na/ bsod nams 'dod pa des na/ bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po chen po bskyed par 'gyur te/ las kyi sgrib pa
52b6(mdo 'grel): yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsod nams bya ba'i bzhi gsum po gang yin pa de dag ni shes rab las byung ba'i phyir ro/ /byams pa de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta byad pa la brtson pas/ byang chub sems
52b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' lung nod pa la dang/ kha ton byed pa la brtson pa'i bar chad mi bya'o/ /dzam+bu'i gling na zhal ta byed pas yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i zhal ta byed pa de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' i lung nod pa dang/ kha ton byed pa la brtson pa gcig
53a1(mdo 'grel): la/ rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /bden pa'i rnam pa'i mdo las kyang/ de la byang chub sems dpa' i zhal ta gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dang/ chos nyan pa dang/
53a2(mdo 'grel): mkhan po dang/ slob dpon rnams la snyoms las med pa dang/ bltos pa med pas zhal ta byed pa'i bya ba la bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la las than legs so zhes bya ba yang re bas zhal ta de mi bya/ de lta bu'i ngo bos zhal
53a3(mdo 'grel): ta mi bya ste/ 'di ni zhal ta shes pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /yongs su 'dzin pa la dgos pa bstan pa/ ji lta bu zhig gi mdo las kyang/ maung+gal gyi bus gsol pa/ btsun pa dge slong gang la la zhig skyes bu gang zag brgyad kyi zhing la phul ba
53a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun chen po'i dkor gyi dor ba dang/ rgyal po'i khol po dang/ sna chen po la gtogs pa dang/ mdun na 'don pa dang/ blon po dang/ smad 'tshong ma mchog dang/ rgyal po dang/ btsun mo dam pa la
53a5(mdo 'grel): brten nas/ gsod sa brgya phrag stong la dbang byed pa pa dang/ dra ba'i las gsang bar rtsom pa chen pos byed pa dang/ thabs log pa de nyid kyi phyis ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang/ bsod nams ma yin pa ci 'dra ba zhig skyer
53a6(mdo 'grel): par gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge spyod ngor ba/ gdug pa la brten pa srid pa'i khol po/ 'khor ba rgyas par byad pa/ nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dri mas spags pas/ slob dpon ltar snang bas dbang
53a7(mdo 'grel): bskur ba/ byis pa mchil snabs 'phyag cing kha 'phro za ba rnams kyi bskor ba de ni/ rma bya'i 'bag lta bu'i sin bu ras kha bsgyur ba'i gos dang/ rams kyis kha bsgyur ba'i shangs 'gag dang/ bkra ba dang nye bar bkra ba'i lham
53b1(mdo 'grel): gyon nas/ bal mchog gi 'bol stan la gnas te/ dge slong des sa la smod cing 'dri/ gshe ba dang/ /spyo ba dang sngags mdzub dag gis gnas nas 'byin par byed/ de dag la sngon du 'ong ba dang/ rjes su 'brang ba dang
53b2(mdo 'grel): ldang ba dang/ thal mo sbyar ba'i las/ 'dud pa'i phyag gis bka' bsgo zhing/ chu mchog dang zas mchog dang/ mal stan mchog yongs su longs spyod pas/ mtshams med pa/ mtshams med pa dang nye bar 'dra ba'i sdig pa ches
53b3(mdo 'grel): shin tu bsogs par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar gtsang sbra 'dod pa rnams kyi bdag gi lus dang/ gos brlag par ma gyur cig snyam nas/ bshang 'phag ring du spong bar byed la/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sras po zad pa med pa'i tshul
53b4(mdo 'grel): khrims kyi gtsang sbra 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang/ de lta bu'i gang zag mthong nas lung dang rtogs pa'i chos kyi longs spyod gnyis las ring du byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyud rma lta bu ba/ rtag par mi dge ba byed pa/ shing dang ltang ka bskams pa
53b5(mdo 'grel): dang 'dra ba/ dam pa'i chos kyi ljon shing gi bcung zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims 'joms pa lus zangs kyi gos kyis g.yogs pa/ lcags kyi gong bu 'bar ba za ba/ bdag nyid kyi khrag khol ma 'thung ba/ mi ma rabs lo ma rul ba lta bu
53b6(mdo 'grel): sgra snyan pa nyams pa'i dung gi skad ltar kun tu spyod pa/ bdag dang gzhan rnam par 'joms pa ni/ mthar gnas ltar rnal 'byor pas yongs su spong bar byed do/ /maung+gal gyi bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das des bskal pa brgyad cur
53b7(mdo 'grel): mam med pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar bya dgos so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maung+gal gyi bu de de bzhin te/ bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cur bsdoms pa bskal pa chen po dar dge 'dun 'du ba'i sgo 'phrogs pa der sdug bsngal nyams su myong
54a1(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /las kyi zas can du 'gyur zhing/ de'i lus bcu 'gyur dang/ de gzhon sha chags pas mar sar dang ras bal gyi 'dab ma lta bu dang/ tshor ba bcu 'gyur du rnam par chad pa med par
54a2(mdo 'grel): gnad thams cad gcod pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /las byas shing bsags pa de zhig cing bsal ba nyams par gyur pa/ /yongs su zad par gyur gyis bar du kun nas 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba/ yang dag par rab tu 'bar ba/ rgya
54a3(mdo 'grel): skyags kyi kha dog lta bur 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa lta bur 'tshed do/ /de nas shi 'phos nas sdig pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bus/ gung dang byi la dang/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ spyang ki'i mngal du sdig to can 'tsheng par
54a4(mdo 'grel): skye bar 'gyur ro/ /der yang slar sdig pa spyod cing des mun pa nas mun par 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ /nyi ma'i snying po'i mdo las kyang/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nga'i bstan pa 'di dang/ dam pa'i chos sam/ dam pa'i
54a5(mdo 'grel): chos kyi gzugs brnyan yun ji srid gnas par/ chos kyi gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la khyim dang/ kun dga' dang/ zhing dang bran dang/ bran mo'i bar gang su dag gis de ltar bsgos pa de la/ sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong tshul khrims 'chal
54a6(mdo 'grel): pa gang dag/ tha na 'dab ma gcig dang/ 'bras bu gcig dang/ me tog gcig cig yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed na de ni mi blun po de la don ma yin pa dang/ phan pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ de lta gnod pa bzhi yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi
54a7(mdo 'grel): gang zhe na/ phyogs thams cad du mi snyan pa chen po 'gro ba yin/ mdza' bo dang/ nye du dang/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dang/ mkhan po dang/ slob dpon dang/ rim gro pa dang sbug cing yid du 'ong ba dang myur du 'bral bar 'gyur ba yin/ nang
54b1(mdo 'grel): tshabs chen pos yun ring ba dag gi thebs par 'gyur ba yin na/ de'i chos gos dang/ lhung bzed gang yod ba de yang 'jigs pa chen po lngas phrogs par 'gyur ba yin no/ /lnga gang dag yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po dang/ chem
54b2(mdo 'grel): rkun dang/ me dang chu dang/ bgo skal la spyod pa'i mi mdza' ba de dag gis so/ /de'i 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu bzhi myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yin te/ bzhi gang dag yin zhe na/ lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba
54b3(mdo 'grel): chen po mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po de nas shi 'phos nas/ 'brog dgon pa ro skam gyi nang du/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dags kyi rigs su long ba dang/
54b4(mdo 'grel): rkang lag med pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing/ de lo brgya stong mang po dag tu bkres pa dang/ skom par yongs su gdung ba chen po'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin/ gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas de nas
54b5(mdo 'grel): shi 'phos nas/ lo brgya stong mang po dag tu/ sprul gdug pa/ longs ba rdul za ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ de brgya la res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas/ gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes nas/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
54b6(mdo 'grel): snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu/ mi nyid 'thob pa rnyed par 'gyur zhing/ mong rtul ba dang tshul 'di mi shes par 'gyur ba dang/ mig ma tshang ba dang/ lag pa mtshang ba dang/ rkang pa ma tshang ba dang/ khyi'i longs spyod kyi kha zas lag gdu
54b7(mdo 'grel): zhing/ rkyag khung sa'i kha zas la za ba dang/ 'dam rdzab dang/ phyag dar khrod na gnas pa dang/ 'brog dgon pa dang/ lam po che rnams rma 'tsho bar 'gyur la/ de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
55a1(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i 'bras bu 'dod pa ma yin te/ de ltar lci bar 'byung zhe na/ 'di ltar sdig pa sbyed pa'i dge slong de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyi gnas pa rnams la khyim dang zhing dang/ kun dga' ra ba
55a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ bran dang/ bran mo dang/ phyugs dag gi bar phrogs pa dag phrogs nas/ gang zag rang gi yongs su sbyod ba la longs spyod par byed pa'i phyir te/ sdig pa sbyong ba'i dge slong de lta bu de ni/ de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i
55a3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi tshul med par bya ba dang/ rnam par gzhig pa dang/ rgyun bcad pa dang/ nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/ /de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba nas/ nub par bya ba'i bar du brtson
55a4(mdo 'grel): ba yin no/ /de ce'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i phyogs ni tshogs pa dang ldan pa yin la/ chos kyi tshul dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang dge ba'i phyogs kyis rab tu bya ba yin te/ de'i phyir de nyid kyi mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnam par
55a5(mdo 'grel): smin pa'i lci ba mngon par 'grub pa yin no/ /de nas gnas brtan ga ya 'od srungs kyi mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi nyid rnyed pa ni ma 'thob kyang sla'i/ rab tu byung nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i skud log
55a6(mdo 'grel): par sgrub pa ni de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ga ya 'ong srungs chen po de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gong du de'i sngon gyi las rnams zad par gtu 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal bar gnas pa ni sla'i/
55a7(mdo 'grel): 'di ni gang gzhan du spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /'on kyang skyes bu blun bo kha cig mi nyid 'thob par dka' ba rnyed de/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang la sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa dang/ zag pa thams cad mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i
55b1(mdo 'grel): ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rab tu byung ba rnyed par dka' ba dang/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob nas/ 'on kyang skyes bu blun po gang gis mchod par mi 'gyur ba dang/ bza' btung dang bral bar 'gyur la/ mid ge ba'i phyogs
55b2(mdo 'grel): rnal 'byor yid la byed pa yongs su bsal nas rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dad pa can dag gi khyim dang zhing dang/ kun dga' ra ba dang/ skyed mos tshal dang/ bran dang bran mo dang/ rkang bzhi
55b3(mdo 'grel): pa dag gis bar dge slong chos kyi gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyag pa dag longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir dang/ dge ba'i phyogs dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir de ltar bsngos pa la/ sdig pa sbyod pa'i dge slong de mang du thos pa'i mthu 'am/ khyim
55b4(mdo 'grel): na gnas pa'i mthus de dag la bsdos pa'i longs spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa phrogs nas/ bdag nyid kyis gang zag gi 'du shes kyi yongs su sbyong par byed/ skyes bu blun po de'i log par sgrub pa de ni de lta bur 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ /yang mdo de
55b5(mdo 'grel): nyid las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/ /khyod kyi spobs pa legs so/ /rgyal pa chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gang dag rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dag
55b6(mdo 'grel): chos kyi gnas pa rnams la/ khyim gyi gzhi dang/ zhing gi gzhi dang/ kun dga' ra ba'i gzhi dang/ skyed mos tshal dang/ bran dang aban mo dang/ mal cha dang stan dang/ na ba'i gsos sman dang/ yo byang dag de lta de ltar bsdos pa dang/
55b7(mdo 'grel): rkang bzhi pa'i bar bsdos pa yang/ 'phrog par bying ba 'am/ rku bar byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar de dag thams cad ni mthong ba'i chos la 'byung ba 'dod pa ma yin pa'i chos nyi shu dang myung du ldan par
56a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu gang dag dang ldan zhe na/ lha rnams kyi yongs su btang ba yin/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu yang de'i mi snyan pa grags par 'gyur ba yin/ mdza' bshes dang/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis
56a2(mdo 'grel): kyang yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i dgra bo dag kyang mang bar 'gyur ba yin/ nor dang nor gyi yo byang dag kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par g.yeng bar mang ba yang yin/ yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur ba yang yin/ mdza' bshes
56a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ba yin/ de gnyid med pa yin/ rtag tu de sred pas gnod par 'gyur ba yang yin/ de'i bza' ba dang btung ba yang dug gi bya ba byed pa yin/ sdug pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba
56a4(mdo 'grel): dag dang myur du 'bral ba 'thob pa yin/ rtag tu gzhan dag dang 'thab mo 'byung ba yin/ pha dang ma dang spun dang/ chung ma dang bu mo dang/ bran dang bran mo dag kyang bsgo ba bzhin mi byed pa yin/ de'i gsang sngags gsang ba dag dang/ nor gsang ba dang/
56a5(mdo 'grel): slas gsang ba dang/ de'i dngos po gsang ba rnams kyang thams cad gsang ba shor ba dag tu 'gyur ba yin/ bsgo sgal la spyod pa mi mja' ba la sogs pa lngas longs spyod dag chung za bar 'gyur ba yin/ nad tshabs chen po dag gis kyang myur du thebs par
56a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba yin/ sman dang rim gro ba dag dang 'bral ba yin/ sha dang khrag bskams nas/ sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba yin/ rang gi bshad gci dag gi nang du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba yin te/ rgyal po chen po 'dod pa ma yin pa'i chos nyi shu
56a7(mdo 'grel): bo de dag dang myur du ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang dge slong chos kyi gnas pa rnams la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang/ /nye bar spyod pa'i ngang/ nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed cing/ bdag nyid kyang yongs su spyod par byed pa de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ sems can
56b1(mdo 'grel): dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dar yang tshe bskal par lcags dang zangs bzhun 'thung bar 'gyur zhing/ lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur la/ me'i gos dang/ longs spyod dang/ nye bar spyod par byed cing/ gnod pa mi bzad pa
56b2(mdo 'grel): chen po rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe bskal pa zad pa nas de nas shi 'phos nas kyang/ 'brog dgon pa ro skam dag gi nang du lam du skyes pa'i yi dags rnams dang skal ba mnyam par rkang pa dang lag pa dang/ mig ma tshad
56b3(mdo 'grel): bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /der yang byogs bzhi nas langs pa'i rlung kun tu cha ba dag gis kun tu gdu bar bya'o/ /sa spu gri dang 'dra ba'i steng du snyal bar byed/ yongs su snyal bar byed zhes gsungs pa dang/ yang mdo de nyid las/ rgyal po gzugs
56b4(mdo 'grel): can snying bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcun pa bcom ldan 'das spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma gang dag gis/ dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod ba/ dge slong chos kyi gnas pa rnams kyi nang du slan chad kyang gnas
56b5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa bgyi bar mi 'os pa 'chal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po rna/ ?? 'di lta bus/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i mgo 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gang gis kyang myur du rnam
56b6(mdo 'grel): par shes par mi nus te/ rgyal po chen po 'di ni nang gi dang por sangs rgyas la ma gus pa yin no/ /chos dang dge 'dun dang/ mkhan po dang slob dpon dang/ bla ma'i gnas lta bu'i rnams la ma gus pa yin/ 'phags pa'i rigs
56b7(mdo 'grel): btang ba yin/ rnal 'byor yid la byed pa la kun dga' ba ma yin no/ /ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa rnam par spangs pa yin/ khyim na gnas pa dang 'dres pa yin/ tshig khyal ba smra ba yin/ bdag la bstod pa yin/ gzhan la
57a1(mdo 'grel): smod pa yin/ de lta bu dag la kun dga' ba yin/ sdig pa'i snyil chags pa yin/ la mngan bar zhugs pa yin/ khengs pa yin/ kha drag pa yin/ 'phral g.yang can yin/ 'phyar po yin/ kha
57a2(mdo 'grel): shing can med?/ g.yo sgyu can yin/ sgra byed pa yin/ dge sbyong yon po yin/ dge sbyong g.yon can yin/ dge sbyong snyi long lta bu yin/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mi mthun par 'dod ba smra ba yin/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa
57a3(mdo 'grel): la mngon par dga' ba yin/ 'du 'ji kun la dga' ba yin/ sdig pa can gyi dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba don ji srid du de'i tshul khrims 'chal ba'i mgo byung ba ma gyur gyi bar du gang gis kyang mtshan ma de dag gi myur du shes bar mi nus so/ /sdig
57a4(mdo 'grel): pa can gyi dge slong de gang gi tshe/ khyim gyi gzhi dang/ zhing gi gzhi dang/ kun dga' ra ba'i gzhi dang/ bran dang bran ma dang glang po che dang/ rta dang/ rnga mo dang/ bod bu dang/ lug ngag gang zag gis srel bar byed na/ de ni de'i tshul?
57a5(mdo 'grel): khrims 'chal ba'i mgo byung ba yin te/ tshul khrims 'chal ba'i mgo des na sdig pa can gyi dge slong nges/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang nas/ dor ba yin/ gnas bar bya ba ma yin/ longs spyod bar bya ba ma yin/ dge slong gi dngos
57a6(mdo 'grel): po las ltung ba yin/ bam bar gyur ba yin te/ dge sbyong gi tshul las kyang phyis blang du med par 'gyur ba yin no/ /rgyal po chen po mi gdol ba gnas na gnas par byed pa ni sla'i/ dge slong gdol ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa rgyud
57a7(mdo 'grel): tshig pa don la mi lta ba/ 'jig rten pa rol gtad pa/ snying rje'i bsam pa med pa/ phyis khud chen po dang 'dra ba/ bdud kyi lam du zhugs pa/ lha dang mi rnams la gnod par byed pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi drang srong thub pa rnams la
57b1(mdo 'grel): slu bar byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung chos kyi mar me med par byed ba/ chos kyi rgya mtsho skems bar byed pa/ chos smra ba'i dbyen byed pa/ sbyin pa po dang/ sbyin bdag rnams la 'drid bar byed ba/ dge slong chos kyi gnas ba rnams
57b2(mdo 'grel): la mtho 'tshams par byed pa/ /dge 'dun mthun par byed pa'i rgyun gcod par byed pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /sdig pa can gyi dge slong de ni/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i rkyen gyis mtho ris kye lam las rgyal bo ldog bar byed pa yin no/ /rgyal rigs dang/
57b3(mdo 'grel): bram ze dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang bu mo ldog par byed pa yin no/ /ngan song gi lam gsum la rab tu gzhog par byed pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po sdig pa can gyi dge slong de yongs su
57b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa'i khyad par gyi rgyu mtshan gyi lha dang mi ji snyed cig mi skyed par byed pa la ltos/ rgyal bo chen po de lta bas na/ yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i dge slong dang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa yon tan gyi phyug ba dag dang lhan cig tu kun dga' ra
57b5(mdo 'grel): ba gcig dang/ gtsug lag khang gcig tu gnas par mi bya'o/ /gal te sdig pa can gyi dge slong de kha drag cing ngo tsha shes pa dang/ khrel yod pa rnam bar spangs te/ dge slong de dag dang lhan cig gnas par byed na/ de'i phyir dge slong
57b6(mdo 'grel): chos kyis gnas pa de dag gi byams pa dang ldan zhing chos dang 'thun pas dran par byas te/ gal te sdig pa can gyi dge slong de gnas de nas 'gro ba lta na ni legs/ gal te 'gro bar mi byed na ni/ der dge slong chos kyi gnas pa de dag
57b7(mdo 'grel): dod la/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ grong dang ljongs dang ri bo de dag na/ rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze 'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang dbang byed du 'jug pa de la sbran par bya'o/ /gal te rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze
58a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs des sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/ gnas de nas bzlog par byed na/ der ni dge slong chos kyi gnas pa de dag gnas par bya'o/ /ji ste rgyal rigs dang/
58a2(mdo 'grel): bram ze dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs de dag bza' ba dang btung ba dang rnyed ba'i rgyus/ sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs byed pa lta na/ de'i phyir dge slong chos kyi gnas pa de dag gis khre ba bstan par mi bya'o
58a3(mdo 'grel): chags pa ma yin/ nga rgyal ma yin te/ 'on kyang cang mi smra bar gnas de nas 'gro bar bya zhing/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ nags khrong dam/ ri 'am/ ri bo'i bor gzhan gang na dgra bcom chud ba dang/ nang du yang dag 'jog dang 'tsham
58a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang mthun pa der gnas bar bya'o/ /yang rgyal po gzugs can snying bos/ mchim dag phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang bza' ba dang/ btud ba dang/ rnyed
58a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i slang du sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin ba dang/ bcas pa'i phyogs bgyid cing/ dge slong chos kyis gnas ba/ yon tan gyi phyug ba rnams kyang gnas nas mchi bar 'gyur ba'i rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ rje'u rigs dang/
58a6(mdo 'grel): dmangs rigs de dag ni nyams pa lags so/ /btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu nyams pa lags so/ /de mi nyid rnyed pa ni rnyed bar dka' lags te/ 'khor ba na 'khor bar bgyid pa da mi nyid rnyed pI tha ma ni de lags so/ /sangs rgyas
58a7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas kyang/ gang dge slong chos kyi gnas pa rnams kyi chig gus par mi nyan pa'i/ /
58b1(mdo 'grel): sems can de ni ngan song rnams las yongs su thar bar bgyi ba 'am/ mtho ris su bzhag par mi spyod de/ de ni sdig pa'i las de lta bu dang ldan bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rgyal po chen po ma
58b2(mdo 'grel): 'ongs pa'i dus na/ la lar gang dge slong chos kyi gnas pa rnams la shin tu dad ba'i rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi don du dgon pa'i gnas dag byed bar
58b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /gtsug lag khang dang/ dgon pa'i gnas der yang khyim gyi gzhi nas/ zhing gi gzhi dang/ bran dang bran me dang/ kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag gi longs spyod dang/ nye bar spyod pa'i phyir yongs su btang bar 'gyur ro/ /
58b4(mdo 'grel): de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur ro
58b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'phrad par 'gyur ba nas/ ring po mi thogs par sbyin pa po dang/ sbyin bdag de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du 'gyur te/ de dag ni de'i bstan pa
58b6(mdo 'grel): la dge slong chos kyi gnas ba rnams yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ba yin no/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ gang khyod kyi bu 'am sbun nam/ bkrabs pa 'am/ sna chen po la gtogs pa gang yang rung ba zhig nyes ba dang bcas pa
58b7(mdo 'grel): yin na/ g.yang nga gang du rgyal po chen po'i dus ston nam/ dga' ston 'byung ba dar/ rgyal po chen pos dga' ba dang/ bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs nyams su myong bar byang na/ rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de khyod kyi
59a1(mdo 'grel): mdun du 'dug cing/ skyid pa dang rtse ba myong bar byed pa 'am/ dga' ba dang bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas bar byed nus sam/ rgyal pos gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags te/ skyes bu de
59a2(mdo 'grel): bdag gi mdun na mchis par yang/ rdo mi thogs lags na/ skyid pa dang rtse ba myong bar bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po de bzhin du gang zag gang zhig gang zag gi bran dang bran mo
59a3(mdo 'grel): srel bar byed cing/ khyim gyi gzhi 'am/ zhing gi gzhi nas/ lug ngag gi bar srel bar byed na/ nga yang de'i ston pa ma yin la/ de yang da'i nyan thos ma yin no/ /dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la yang gnod par
59a4(mdo 'grel): byed pa dang bcas pa yin te/ de ni chos kyi gnas pa rnams kyi gnas de ltar bsngos pa dag du/ chos dang mthun pas gnas par 'os pa ma yin no/ /rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs gang yang sdig pa
59a5(mdo 'grel): can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i don byed pa dang/ de nas 'gror mi ster ba'i rgyal rigs nas/ dmangs rigs kyi bar de ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la yang gnod par byed pa
59a6(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa chen po yin no/ /sbyin pa mang po sbyin par byed du zin kyang de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/ bdag la phan par yang dag par
59a7(mdo 'grel): rjes su lta bas/ sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su gnas par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni lha dang mi thams cad la yang gnod pa dang/ phan pa ma yin pa dang/ log par ltung bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs
59b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang zhig dge slong chos kyi gnas pa rnams kyi phyogs la yang dag par gnas
59b2(mdo 'grel): par byed cing/ sdig pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyi phyogs la ma yin na/ de sbyin pa mi sbyin du zin kyang/ 'on kyang de ni chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyu'i phyir dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sbyin bdag dam pa yin no/ /
59b3(mdo 'grel): de ni dam pa'i chos rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dam pa yin par blta'o/ /'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba nas/ reng? po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
59b4(mdo 'grel): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/ rgyal rigs 'tsham pa khyed kyi lag tu chos kyis gnas pa dang/ bstan pa ngas yongs su gtad kyis/ lnga brgya ba tha ma la gnas pa'i bar du khyed kyi nga'i chos kyis
59b5(mdo 'grel): gnas pa yang dag par zung shig dang/ de'i rkyen gyis nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing/ lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ zhes bya ba'i bar dang/ yang mdo ste
59b6(mdo 'grel): de nyid las/ de nas klu'i rgyal po'i bu pad+ma'i gdong zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag sug las gang gi klu'i rigs su skyes nas/ gzugs mchog tu lha me zhing lus kyi reg pa gang cung zad ci reg kyang kun tu tshig cing 'bar ba lags/ bdag
59b7(mdo 'grel): dus thams cad du 'chil lham bor nas gcer bur rgyu bar bgyid lags/ bdag gi tha de ni dpal phun sum tshogs pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa myong ste/ dper na gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin lags/ bcom ldan 'das
60a1(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye lags 'gro sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i tshe/ de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i
60a2(mdo 'grel): bar du gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo/ /de'i tshe rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po me tog bral des kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can nyan thos dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun brgya stong
60a3(mdo 'grel): phrag mang pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa de la/ zla ba gsum yo byad thams cad phul nas/ rtag tu chos mnyan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam pa tab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang
60a4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa zhig kyang brtsigs so/ /rgyal po me tog bral de'i bu srid sgrub bcas zhes bya zhig yod do/ /de shin tu 'khor bas skrag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ pha'i dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba de rjes su skyong zhing 'dug go /de nas bcom
60a5(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong gang dag gnas pa dang/ de nas gang dag bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ mal chal longs spyod bar byed pa thams cad la me tog bral gyi bu dge slong srid sgrub bcas de phrag dog byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
60a6(mdo 'grel): kyi dge slong de dag kyang gnas de nas dong ngo/ /de yang yid mchog tu dga' nas bdag nyid kyis kyang longs spyad par mi byed/ gzhan la yang mi ster ro zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong de yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams
60a7(mdo 'grel): kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya bar du'o/ /de lo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang du skyes nas bcos so/ /de nas shi 'phos nas yi dags rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por der sdug bsngal myong ngo/ /
60b1(mdo 'grel): phyis yang sems can dmyal ba dang/ yi dags rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal myong ngo/ /lag dgro 'khor bas skrag pa'i sems dang ldan pa srid sgrub bcas shes bya ba rab tu byung ste/ de nas shi 'phos nas de ltar yun ring por ngan song du sdug bsngal
60b2(mdo 'grel): myong bar de gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na gzhan yin par yang lta bar mi bya ste/ de ltar las kyi sgrib pa dam pas zin pa yang khyod yin no/ /'di phan chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu khyod rtag par ngan song gsum gyi nang du skyes so/ /de'i las
60b3(mdo 'grel): kyi sgrib pa lhag ma lus pa nges 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa ni gzhan ma yin gyi khyod yin te/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myong ngo/ /gang khyod 'di nas shi 'phos nas phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dags rnams
60b4(mdo 'grel): kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas yod do/ /klu'i bu de mchog tu yid mi dga' nas rab tu du zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byis
60b5(mdo 'grel): pa ji lta bu dang/ myos pa ji lta bu dang/ mi gsal ba dang/ mi mkhas pa ji lta bu zhig tu nongs ba so sor 'chags lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsam pas sdom pa bzung bar bgyi'o/ /bdag de bzhin gsheT
60b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i dge bsnyen lags te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod par sbad bar bgyi lags so/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /khyod lhag pa'i bsam
60b7(mdo 'grel): pas nga la skyabs su song bas khyod kyi ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su zad do/ /de nas shi 'phos nas khyod kyi byams pa'i tshe na mi'i rnyed pa thob par 'gyur te/ byams pa'i thang du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du mngon sum du byed par
61a1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gi gtsug tor can 'khor dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyi rim gro byas pa dang/ de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs
61a2(mdo 'grel): par byas pa'i rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na de gzhan du yin par yang mi blta ste/ de ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di yin no/ /'di ni bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu nam yang ngan 'gror ma skyes so/ /lha'i
61a3(mdo 'grel): dpal dang bskal pa bzang po phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgya chen po myong ngo/ /'di ni bla na med pa'i theg pa'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gi 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ 'dir dpal dang skal pa bzang po de lta bu myong ngo/ /de skad ces thos nas klu
61a4(mdo 'grel): thams cad skyo zhing mchog tu yid mi dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu gus pa skyes shing nye bar rtogs pas gces par byed par gyur to/ /zhes gsungs pa dang/ yang mdo de nyid las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
61a5(mdo 'grel): spu gri rnon po dag gis su/ /rang gi yan lag btubs pa bla'i/ /bsngos zin pa yi dngos po ni/ /khyim pa rnams la sbyin mi bya/ /me lce 'bar ba lta bu yi/ /lcags kyi thu lum zos pa bla'i/ /dge 'dun dag las gar de ni/ /dge
61a6(mdo 'grel): 'dun gyis la longs mi spyad/ /lhun po dang ni 'dra ba'i me/ /blang ba byas te zos pa bla'i/ /khyim par gyur pas dge 'dun gyi/ /longs spyod par ni mi bya'o/ /thams cad 'byung bar byas pa dang/ gsal shing steng du bteg pa bla'i/ /khyim
61a7(mdo 'grel): par gyur par dge 'dun gyi/ /longs spyod par ni mi bya'o/ /me mdag gis ni gang ba yi/ /gnas khang der ni zhugs pa bla'i/ /khyim pas dge 'dun gnas khang du/ /mtshan mo gnas par mi bya'o/ /me lce 'bar ba lta bu yi/ /lcags kyi thu
61b1(mdo 'grel): lum blangs pa bla'i/ /rab tu byung bas khyim pa yi/ /dbyig ni blangs par mi bya'o/ /'khor lo rnon pos bdag gis lus/ /kun tu btub par byas pa bla'i/ /legs par gsungs pa'i chos rnams la/ /rgyags dang gshe ba bskyed mi bya/ /legs dang
61b2(mdo 'grel): gsungs pa'i chos can gyis/ /mig ni rang gi byung bar bla'i/ /sems can du ni bgrangs pa la/ /khros pas skye dgu mi mad go /legs par gsungs pa'i chos can gyi/ /me yi gos ni gon pa bla'i/ /tshul 'chos pa dang mthu yis su/ khyim pa
61b3(mdo 'grel): las ni gos mi bslang/ /me 'dra bar ni bskol ba yis/ /rtsub 'gyur chu ni 'thungs pa bla'i/ /rab tu byung ba g.yo rgyu yis/ /bza' btung blad bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs so// //nam mkha' i can gyi mdo las kyang/ /yang de'i tshe lha'i dbang
61b4(mdo 'grel): po dang/ klu'i dbang po dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang/ nam mkha' ldang gi dbang po dang/ mi'am ci'i dbang po dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang/ grul bum gyi dbang po dang/ yi dags kyi dbang po dang/
61b5(mdo 'grel): sha za'i dbang po dang/ sa la rgyu ba dang nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i khyed rnams kyi lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ngas yongs su gtad par bya'o/ /da ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus su gang zag don yid la byed pa/ chos la gnas pa/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa/
61b6(mdo 'grel): chos dang mthun pa'i chos spyod pa/ dben pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams srungs shig /yongs su skyongs shig /de'i sbyin pa po dang/ sbyin bdag de dag kyang srungs shig /yongs su skyongs shig /gang dag de rnams kyi yo byad 'dzin pa dang/ yongs su
61b7(mdo 'grel): skyong pa de dag kyang srungs shig /yongs su skyongs shig /de ni khyed cag la yun ring por phan pa dang bde ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po de snyed thams cad nas/ sha za'i dbang po dang/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang sa la rgyu ba'i bar thams
62a1(mdo 'grel): cad kyi mgrin gcig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags so/ /btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa de ltar lags so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis
62a2(mdo 'grel): brlabs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar ba/ de srid kho bo cag gi rang gi sug las dor nas de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos 'dul ba bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su skyang bar bgyi'o/ /chos la gnas pas tshul khrims kyi phyug pa/ yon tan
62a3(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ dben pa la mngon par dga' ba/ chos kyi rjes su mthun par chos la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams chos gos dang/ zas dang/ mal stan dang/ na ba'i rkyen sman gyi byad? rnams kyi bsrung
62a4(mdo 'grel): bar bgyi/ yongs su skyang bar bgyi'o/ /nad med pa dang stobs dang bde ba la reg pa gnas pa nyid kyis/ dge ba'i phyogs dang rjes su mthun pa nyid bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /ji srid du de dag sangs rgyas kyi bcas pa'i bslab pa la yongs su rdzogs
62a5(mdo 'grel): par spyod pa brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ rab tu rnam par dben pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pas gnas shing/ yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang/ kun dga' ra ba dang/ khyim dang/ zhing dang/ bran pho dang/ bran mo dang/
62a6(mdo 'grel): nor dang/ 'bru dang/ grags pa dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa mchog dang/ tshul 'chos dang/ kha gsag dang/ gzhog slongs rnams dang thams cad dang ma 'dres par gnas pa de srid du/ kho
62a7(mdo 'grel): bo cag gis gnod sbyin gdug pa nas/ lus srul po gdug pa'i bar du zlog par bgyi'o/ /bde bar gshegs pas rab tu bstan pa'i bstan pa la de dag dad pa bskyed par bgyi'o/ /ji srid du de dag zla ba dang nyi ma dang gza' dang rgyu skar
62b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang/ lo dang dus tshigs yang dag par 'da' ba de srid du/ kho bo cag gis 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang g.yul do dang/ nad dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang mu ge dang g.yo dang slu ba dar brdzun du sma ba dang/ dus bstan??
62b2(mdo 'grel): yin pa'i rlung dang char 'bab pa dag rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag gis rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang bu mo ji snyed pa'i bar rnams mi dag ta'i?? chos
62b3(mdo 'grel): rnams las bzlog par bgyi'o/ /dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /gang zag chos la gnas pa sbyin pa dang dul ba dang yang dag par sdams pa dang/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang/ yon tan gyis 'phyug pa rnams pa kyi spyod pa'i spyod pa
62b4(mdo 'grel): la gzung bar bgyi'o/ /ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos re bo thams cad yongs su mi 'dzin cing chos kyi 'du shes kyis mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba de srid du/ bdag cag gis grong khyer dang grong rdal dang/ ri sul dang yul 'khor dang
62b5(mdo 'grel): ljongs de dag dang/ sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyad par bgyi'o/ /nor dang 'bru dang dga' ba dang rtse ba dang nad med pa dang/ phan tshun du rab tu dga' bas tshogs pa dang/ tshe ring ba nyid ma ched
62b6(mdo 'grel): ba med par bsgrub par ba gyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos re ba thams cad mi 'dzin cing/ chos la gnas pa chos kyi rjes su mthun par chos bsgrub par gnas par 'gyur ba de srid du 'di ni yun ring por sa'i
62b7(mdo 'grel): bcud dang sems can gyi gzi mdangs dang/ chos kyi gzi mdangs mi nub par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du yun ring por lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ mi'i 'jig rten na mngon par dga' bar gyur pa de srid du yun ring por sems can
63a1(mdo 'grel): rnams tshe'i dus byas nas lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du sems can dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur/ de srid du yun ring por lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du sems can dbang che bar grags pa
63a2(mdo 'grel): dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar 'gyur/ de srid du yun ring por chos la gnas pa'i sems dpa' rnams gnas par 'gyur/ de srid du 'di ltar chos ma yin pa'i phyogs tshar gcad pa'i phyir bdag cag stabs dang
63a3(mdo 'grel): brtson pa dang pha rol gnon pas gnas par 'gyur/ de srid du yun ring por bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa'i sems can rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir nus par 'gyur/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi phyir
63a4(mdo 'grel): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas par 'gyur bas/ rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang/ chos la gnas pa dang/ dgon pa dang/ nags khrod na gnas pa dang/ bas mdza' i gnas mal spong
63a5(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ phrag dog gi ngang tshul can dang bsags pa mang bas gnas par 'gyur/ bslab pa dang ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa spong bar 'gyur/ khyim na gnas pa dang 'dri ba dang/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la dga' bar 'gyur/
63a6(mdo 'grel): de dag khyim pa'i stobs dang/ nor gyi phung po'i stobs kyi phan tshun 'joms par byed/ 'thab pa la dga' zhing khyim pa'i mdun du rtsod pa byed/ brdzun tshig rtsub mo smra bar mi srung bas/ khyim pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
63a7(mdo 'grel): pa theg pa chen po la dad pa skyed par mi 'gyur/ rgyal rigs dang/ bram ze dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rgyun gcod par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang/ yang mdo de nyid las/ /
63b1(mdo 'grel): da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rgyal rigs khyed cag thams cad kyi lag tu nyan thos kyi bslab pa khrims su bca' ba gtad par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na da'i bstan pa la gang zag lam ngan pa gdul dka' 
63b2(mdo 'grel): ba ngo tsha ba dang khrel spangs pa spyod pa legs par ma byas pa rnams gnas par 'gyur/ gang dag gnyen bshes kyi stobs sam khyim pa'i stobs sam/ mang du thos pa'i stobs sam/ 'khor gyi stobs kyis bslab pa dag la rmas par
63b3(mdo 'grel): spyod cing/ khyim pa'i rtags dang khyim pa'i longs spyod dag la lta bar byed/ yongs su 'dzin pa yang lan par byed/ dge slong nyung bar gnas pa rnams kyi myur bar dge 'dun gyi nang nas dbyung ba dang/ ji ltar bslab pa bcas pa
63b4(mdo 'grel): bzhin chad pa gcad par mi nus pa de'i phyir bslab pa bca' ba'i bya ba rgyal rigs rnams kyi lag tu gtad par bya'o/ /rgyal rigs de dag de lta bu'i ngo bo'i gang zag rnams la ji ltar bcas pa bzhin chad pa gcod du 'jug par byed do/ /rgyal rigs
63b5(mdo 'grel): gang dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma'i bar du de ltar brtson pa dang pha rol gnod pas nga'i bstan pa srung bar byed/ yongs su spyod par byed/ chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ba'i rgyal rigs de dag ni/ dkon
63b6(mdo 'grel): mchog gsum gyi gdung mi bcad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yongs su skyong ba'i lha rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur/ yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs de dag yun ring por rgyal po nyid byed par 'gyur/ gang
63b7(mdo 'grel): las bskal pa brgyar byang chub kyi phyir spyod par 'gyur ba bsod nams ches mang po bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /yang gang dag de ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ nga'i bstan pa la btang snyoms par gnas par 'gyur ba'i rgyal rigs de dag ni/ lha thams cad
64a1(mdo 'grel): gyis yongs su spong bar 'gyur/ nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba thams cad kyi spong bar 'gyur/ gang nga'i bstan pa la btang snyoms pa'i rgyal rigs de ni 'jig rten pha rol tu lha dang mir skye bar mi 'gyur/
64a2(mdo 'grel): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rnam par gcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ chos kyi sgron ma yongs su bsnub pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ chos kyi bcud bskal ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig dbyung
64a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang zag gang sems can thams cad kyi mig 'byin par byed pa des/ bsod nams ma yin pa ji tsam zhig dang ldan par 'gyur/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos
64a4(mdo 'grel): mchi ma blags te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/ /gang zag des bsod nams ma yin pa gzhal du med grangs med pa ra btu bskyed las so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal rigs
64a5(mdo 'grel): gang zhig da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag gi bstan pa de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa 'bar gyi bar du/ chos la gnas pa'i gang zag bsrung bar mi 'gyur/ gang zag las ngan pa pa rnams chad pa'i rim pa chos ji lta ba
64a6(mdo 'grel): bzhin du slob par mi byed pa'i rgyal rigs de bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du bskyed do/ /gang rgyal rigs de sngon bskal pa brgyar sbyin pa btang bar gyur/ tshul khrims bsrungs pa nas shes rab bsgom pa'i bar du gyur pa dang/
64a7(mdo 'grel): theg pa gsum po gang yang rung ba'i theg pas yang dag par rab tu gnas par gyur pa de/ dam pa'i chos spangs pa dang rab tu brlag pa'i rgyus/ de'i sngon bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad yongs su zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par
64b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /de'i yul tu chos ma yin pa gsum po/ /mu ge dang 'thab mo dang g.yul 'gyed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de la lhas btang snyoms su byed/ lha rnams kyi 'dod/ /de'i yul du bka' lung mi 'jug /de'i yul du g.yo dang slu ba dang brdzun smra
64b2(mdo 'grel): ba sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi chos kyi phung po 'phrog par 'gyur/ /mes tshig pa'am chus 'khyer bar 'gyur/ rgyal rigs de yun ring por mi thogs par nang mi bzad pas thebs par 'gyur/ myur du mdza' 
64b3(mdo 'grel): bo dang ni ra du 'ong ba rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe'i dus byas nas dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te rgya lam na shin tu yun ring po zhig na mi nyid du skyes pa nas/ myur du mig nyams par 'gyur/ nye bar longs spyod pa dang/
64b4(mdo 'grel): yongs su longs spyod pa thams cad dang 'bral zhing/ ljan ljin na gnas par 'gyur/ yun ring por 'tsho zhing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ des sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gnas ma yin pa yongs su rtogs par byed par 'gyur/
64b5(mdo 'grel): de sangs rgyas 'byung ba med par mi'i thod pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs ji lta de bzhin du bram ze dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmangs rigs la sogs pa/ grong khyer gyi gtso bo rnams la yang 'gyur ro/ /yul gyi gtso bo dang/ grong
64b6(mdo 'grel): gi gtso bo dang/ ri brag pa'i gtso bo dang/ grong rdal gyi gtso bo rnams la yang 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig bag med pa'i rgyuAm/ nor gyi rgyus da'i bstan pa la chos la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams ci nus par mi srung zhing/ gang zag lam ngan pa
64b7(mdo 'grel): pa ji lta bu'i chos kyi mi 'dzin pa thams cad ni/ de lta bu'i ngo bo'i las kyi sgrib pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rgyal rigs
65a1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi mi'i thob pa ni rnyed pa dka' o/ /gang dag kun nas bag med pas mang du gnas shing/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ yon tan gyi 'phyug pa chos la gnas pa rnams la mchod pa dang rim gro mi byed la/ dam pa'i
65a2(mdo 'grel): chos yun ring du gnas pa'i phyir dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir/ gang zag lam ngan pa pa ngo tsha ba dang khrel spangs pa chos kyis tshar gcod par mi byed pa de ni/ shin tu brlag pa dang/ rtag tu ngan song du
65a3(mdo 'grel): 'gro bar 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /yul 'khor skyong gi mdo las kyang/ bsam gtan dang ni kha ton btang nas su/ /rtag tu gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson/ /gnas la brkam zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed/ /de dag slob ma 'khor kyang ma
65a4(mdo 'grel): dul ba/ /nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lag gi bla/ /bdag gi ched du 'di ni ngas byas te/ /dge slong gang dag nga yi rjes mthun pa/ /gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do/ /gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan/ /chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la
65a5(mdo 'grel): mngon brtson pa/ /dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa/ /de dag gnas ni sdud par mi byed do/ /'di ni da yis gnas su bskos pa ste/ /'di ni nga dang lhan cig gnas pa'i yin/ /'di ni nga yi dga' bar byed pa yin/ /khyed ci gnas 'di gang
65a6(mdo 'grel): yang med kyis song/ /'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de/ /mas cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos zin la/ /'di ni rnyed pa 'byung ba yod ma yin/ /'dir ni ci zhig spyad kyis dge slong song/ /de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba/ /nam
65a7(mdo 'grel): duAng srid par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ /de dag khyim pa lta bur sogs 'gyur zhing/ /'tshog bcas rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo las kyang/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/
65b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams yin no/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nye bar len pa med pa rnams yin/ 'du 'dzi med par spyod pa rnams yin/ yul la rgyab kyi phyogs pa rnams yin/ yul la sred
65b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ /yul gyi nyes pas mi gos pa rnams yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims brgyas pa la rim gro byed cing brtson pa shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/ gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha ngan don dang
65b3(mdo 'grel): nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad ngan ngon dag gis chog shes pa rnams yin/ lhung bzed dang chos gos dang yo byad sogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ rtag par 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan zhing yul rnams la skyo ba rnams yin/ dben pa la
65b4(mdo 'grel): dga' zhing rtag tu dgon pa la brtson pa rnams yin no/ /rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams yin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las
65b5(mdo 'grel): kyang/ rigs kyi bu gzhan gang dper na/ zhing ngam khyim du dug shing ngam/ snying longs skyes nas/ rtsa nas dbyung dgos pa de bzhin du/ tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams dang dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams bran bzhin du tshar bcad par
65b6(mdo 'grel): ngas gnang ngo/ /gang dag de rnams tshar gcod par mi byed pa de dag ni/ da'i bstan pa las shin tu ring ba yin no/ /gang dag de rnams tshar gcod par byed pa de dag ni/ nga'i slob ma dang nga'i nyan thos yin no/ /'od srung chen po dang rus gcig
65b7(mdo 'grel): phas gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas de skad gsungs na ni/ sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs pa'ang ma lags/ ste'u dang tsandan lta bu zhes bgyi ba'i ming yang brlag par 'gyur na/ ngam pa'i chos sun
66a1(mdo 'grel): 'byin pa rnams ji ltar tshar bcad pa'i rigs lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bgyid du stsal ba'i mi rigs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig ?
66a2(mdo 'grel): dper na khyim bdag gam/ tshod dpon nam/ ded dpon nam/ blon po nam/ rgyal po yang rung ba zhig gis rang gi bu sdug cing phangs la/ mchog tu mdzes shing byang gzugs phun sum chogs pa rnams/ slob dpon gyi lag
66a3(mdo 'grel): tu gtad nas/ slob dpon de la 'di skad ces smras te/ bdag gi bu 'di rnams 'dul ba dang cho ga dang spyod yul dang/ rig pa rnams bslab pa'i phyir khyod la gtad kyis/ 'di rnams khyod kyi 'dul ba dang cho ga dang/ spyod yul
66a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ rigs pa rnams slobs shig /chos shig /gal te bdag gi bu 'di bzhi las gsum ni brdeg pa dang bsdigs pa dang/ tshar bcad pa rnams kyis shi bar gyur la/ gcig ni gson por 'dug ste/ gcig lobs? par
66a5(mdo 'grel): gyur na/ gsum shi yang bla ste/ gsum ni shi gcig lobs pa de la ci slob dpon gyi sdig pa'i las byas zhes bya'am/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /de la ni gnyi ga la yang sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i
66a6(mdo 'grel): slang du zhe na/ de la ni khon gyi bsam pa ma mchis te/ de ltar bgyis na bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dam pa'i
66a7(mdo 'grel): chos sun 'byin pa'i sems can rnams la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs te/ bu rnams slob dpon gyi lag tu gtod pa bzhin du/ rgyal po dang blon po dang/ dge bsnyen rnams kyi lag tu gtod par mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po dang blon
66b1(mdo 'grel): po dang/ dge bsnyen de dag gis byis pa g.yel ba de dag tshar gcod par byed na/ ci de la de bzhin gshegs pa la sdig pa'i las su 'gyur zhes bya ba'am/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ rgyal po dang blon po dang/ dge bsnyen rnams
66b2(mdo 'grel): la yang sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gos pa mi mnga' ba lta la gos par gal 'gyur/ de dag nyid kyi yon tan dang/ spyod pa bsrung ba'i slad du mi 'dod bzhin du tshar gcod par bas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal
66b3(mdo 'grel): stsal pa/ da ltar na bu gcig pa'i 'du shes sgom pa yin te/ gang dag de ltar bsgom pa de dag ni bu gcig pa'i 'du shes sgom par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes
66b4(mdo 'grel): sgom par bya'o/ /de ltar byas nas sems can thams cad la ting nge 'dzin sgom pa bsgoms par 'gyur ro/ /de na mchog tu 'tshe ba med pa dag par 'gyur te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' tshe ring ba dang/ mchog tu ring ba dang/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/
66b5(mdo 'grel): 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes bsgoms na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de
66b6(mdo 'grel): lta los kyang mod/ 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dper gsol na/ gtam rgyud mkhan zhig gis ltad mo ba'i 'khor gyi nang du/ ma la phung dung bya ba'i rigs pa'i gtam sna tshogs bgyis la/ rang gi
66b7(mdo 'grel): khyim du mchis nas/ mchog tu dga' ba bgyid bgyid pa'i ma la/ dbyug pa dang/ phag dum dang/ bong ba dang/ rdo dag gi gnod pa bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig
67a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'du shes sgoms na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshe ring pa dang/ mchog tu tshe ring ba dang/ tshe rabs dran pa dang/ mi 'chi ba dang/ ther zug pa dang/ brtan par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs na/
67a2(mdo 'grel): ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku tshe thung lags ci slu ba mdzad dam/ 'od te bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sems can thams cad la dgra bzhin du gzigs gzigs sam/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das
67a3(mdo 'grel): kyis ni dga' ba mdzad mdzad do/ /mi'i ltar brtsin lo brgya yang mi thub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di kho na ltar sku tshe thung ba las na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i tshe/ de snyed kyi srog cig bcang lag
67a4(mdo 'grel): 'di kho na ltar tshe thung ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mchog tu mi bzad pa'i las mdzad lags grang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
67a5(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ 'di kho na ltar ma rgya zhig ma rgyas shig /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mchog tu sku tshe ring ngo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
67a6(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mchog tu brtan pa'o/ /mchog tu zhi pa'o/ /mchog tu ther zug pa'o/ /mchog tu rtag pa'o/ /'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu
67a7(mdo 'grel): sku tshe ring lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa/ dper na chu klung gang gA dang/ ya mu na dang/ sa ra yu dang/ hing ku la sogs pa chu klung chen po rnams dang/ chu bran gzhan rnams rgya mtsho
67b1(mdo 'grel): chen po kho na'i nang du 'bab pa de bzhin du/ 'od srungs chen po dang rus gcig pa/ lha yul dang sa'i steng gi tshe'i chu klung yod do cog thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rgya mtsho kho nar 'bab ste/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa
67b2(mdo 'grel): mchog tu sku tshe ring ngo zhes gsungs pa dang/ mdo sde de nyid las/ rdo rje lta bur mi shigs pa'i sku 'di ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur lags/ sku 'di lta bu rgyu cis 'grub lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da'i sku 'di lta bu ni dam pa'i chos
67b3(mdo 'grel): bsrungs pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyus 'grub pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dam pa'i chos bsrungs pa'i dge bsnyen gyis ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blang bar mi bya'o/ /dge bsnyen gyi 'dul pa yang spyad par mi bya'o/ /tshul khrims dang cho ga dang/ yon tan
67b4(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i dge slong rnams bsrung ba'i phyir/ mda' gzhu dang/ ral gri dang/ mdung thung kha leb lag tu thogs par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ dge slong dag las bsrungs ma dang/ lhan cig mi 'khod par gcig pu shing drung du stan bting
67b5(mdo 'grel): ba la mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni dge slong zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /bsrungs ma dang lhan cig 'khod pa gang lags pa de dag ni khyim bdag mgo reg ces bgyi ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyim bdag
67b6(mdo 'grel): mgo reg ces de skad ma zer cig /'di ni dge slong la la mal stan sar pa la 'dug cing de zan zos nas gcig pu phyogs gcig na/ mi smra bar 'dug ste/ bsam gtan byed la lus kyi rang bzhin la yang lta bar byed do/ /sems can 'ongs pa
67b7(mdo 'grel): rnams la yang sbyin pa'i gtam dang/ tshul khrims kyi gtam dang/ bsod nams kyi gtam dang/ bsod nams rnam par smin pa'i gtam dang/ chog shes pa dang/ smyung ba'i chos la seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par mi byed de/ seng ge lta bu
68a1(mdo 'grel): 'khor yang mi 'chad/ rtags can 'chal pa tshar bcad pa'i phyir yang ston par mi byed pa'i dge slong de ni skye po thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa yang ma yin/ bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa yang ma yin te/
68a2(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs pa zhan pa yin pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa tshangs par spyod pa tsam du yang zad do/ /dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos can gzhan zhig gnas gzhan zhig na mal stan sar pa la gdug cing seng ge'i sgra sgrogs te/ sa
68a3(mdo 'grel): thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gsung rab yan lag dgu/ mdo'i sde dang/ dbyangs kyi snyad pa'i sde dang/ lung stan pa'i sde dang/ tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang/ ched du brjod pa'i sde dang/ de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang/ skyes
68a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i rabs kyi sde dang/ shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang/ rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde rnams ston te/ mdo 'di la dge slong bran dang bran mo dang/ ba lang dang ma he la sogs pa rdzas ngan pa 'chang ba rnams bshad pas bshad pa ni/ bdag
68a5(mdo 'grel): cag gis rkyen du 'tshams pa yin te/ mdo che ge mo zhig las kyang rab tu byung ba/ rdzas ngan 'chang ba rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyal po che ge mo zhig la chad pas gcod du bcug ste/ tshul khrims 'chang ba rnams ni gos skya po gyon
68a6(mdo 'grel): du bcu go zhes ston cing/ de 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa la/ tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams kyis dkrugs ma byas te/ srog bcad zin kyang/ dge slong de la ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ bdag la phan pa dang/ gzhan la
68a7(mdo 'grel): phan pa la zhugs pa zhes nga zer ro/ /rgyu nges na rgyal po dang blon po dang/ dge bsnyen rnams la dam pa'i chos bsrung pa'i phyir/ ngas dge slong rnams bsrung bar yang gnang/ khyim bdag mgo reg rnams chad bas gcod du yang gnad? do/ /
68b1(mdo 'grel): de la tshul khrims 'chal ba gang yin pa de dag ni/ khyim bdag mgo reg ces bya ste/ de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i tshig bla dags ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i snga rol tu/ grong khyer
68b2(mdo 'grel): ku shi nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' skyed ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bde ba can bzhin du yangs par gyur te/ de'i che sems can dag
68b3(mdo 'grel): bde ba can gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams bzhin du/ bru bas nyam chung ba med do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de lo bye ba phrag du ma bzhugs nas/ grong khyer 'di nyid dang/ gnas 'di nyid du mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas de'i
68b4(mdo 'grel): bstan pa lo bye ba phrag du ma'i bar du gnas nas/ gang gi tshe bstan pa gnas pa de'i lhag ma lo bzhi bcu lus pa de'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos nub du cha ba'i dus na/ dge slong sangs rgyas byin zhes bya ba g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa/
68b5(mdo 'grel): seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ gsung rab yan lag dgu'i chos ston pa zhig byung ste/ de bran dang bran mo dang/ ba lang dang ma he la sogs pas rdzas ngan ba 'chang pa log pa'i chos ston pa/ tshul khrims 'chal pa sdang pa'i sems dang ldan
68b6(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyis thos nas/ bcad pa'i sems skyed de/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa'i phyogs rnams gcig tu bsdongs nas/ mtshon cha sna chags lag na thogs te/ dge slong de'i thad du dong ngo/ /nga yang yang de'i tshe dge slong srid sbyin zhes bya
