223b5(mdo 'grel): cad la 'dzin pa'i sems bdag la med par 'gyur ba yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ba dang/ bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
223b6(mdo 'grel): la sbyar bar bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par zhugs par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar byas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu yon tan gyi phan yon bcu gnyis po de dag yang dag
223b7(mdo 'grel): par mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya ste/ sbyin pa de yang bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /'jam dpal gyi zhing gi bkod pa'i mdo
224a1(mdo 'grel): las kyang/ shA ri'i bu bzhi bo 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i phan yon yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di'i gtong ba'i sems brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang/ mu ge'i dus
224a2(mdo 'grel): dus na sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba dang/ slong ba po rnams nye bar dong ba na 'di'i khyim ma bsgribs par 'gyur ba dang/ ster ba 'am len pa na 'di la 'ga' yang phrag dog par mi 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' phrag dog dang
224a3(mdo 'grel): ser sna yongs su spangs ba'i phan yon bzhi yin no zhes gsungs so/ /las rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mdo las kyang/ de la zas byin pa na chos bcu 'phel bar 'gyur ba gang zhe na /bza' ba byin pa za na kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/
224a4(mdo 'grel): stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ skyid par 'gyur ba dang/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ tshe ring zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang/ bza' ba dang btung ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang/ rigs mtho bar 'gyur ba dang/ long spyod
224a5(mdo 'grel): che bar 'gyur ba dang/ mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ myur du mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te/ bza' ba byin pa na chos bcu po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ /rab tu byung bar gtogs pa'i byin pa dang/ khyim la ser snabyed ba dang/ log par 'tsho ba dang/ chos smra?? ba la kur ba 'debs pa dang/ chos spong ba dang/ rma 'byin pa dang/ zhal ta byed pa dang/ yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ 'tsho ba yang ba dang/ 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa dang/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang/
224a6(mdo 'grel): bdud kyi smras pa dang/ nyo tshong dang/ tshul khrims 'chal ba'i mtshan ma dang/ tshul khrims dang ldan bzil gyis gnon pa dang/ rab tu byung ba la bsngags pa dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang/ spyod yul ma yin pa dang/ sdig pa'i grogs
224b1(mdo 'grel): po dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba dang/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba dang/ thos pa'i yon tan brjod pa dang/ thos pa nyung ba spang ba dang/
224b2(mdo 'grel): mi 'dri ba'i skyon dang/ chos rku ba dang/ bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smong ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan brjod pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems la 'dun pa bzlog pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems brjod pa dang/ gso dpyad dgag pa dang /rgyu skar
224b3(mdo 'grel): rtag ba spang ba dang/ rgyal po la brten pa smad pa dang/ khyim pa'i sbyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang/ sbyin pa'i yon tan la dgongs pa bstan pa'o/ /mdo snga sna tshogs las btus pa'i gtam rdzogs so// //sbyin
224b4(mdo 'grel): par bya ba'i chos 'di ni rab mchog theg pa chen po'i rjes su 'brang pa shA kya'i gnas brtan mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi yin no/ /gang 'dir bsod nams su 'gyur ba ste/ mkhan po dang slob dpon dang pha dang ma sngon du 'gro bar byas te/ sems
224b5(mdo 'grel): can gyi chogs mdza' dag bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i ched du gyur cig /'di ni 'dri mkhan dzI ba d+ha ri'i lag gis bris pa'o/ /de lta bu'i rgya gar gyi phyag dpe las bod kyi ye ger bsgyur ba'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'di ni rab mchog
224b6(mdo 'grel): theg pa chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba/ shAkya'i gnas brtan mkhas pa chen po yon tan grags kyi thugs dam yin no/ /gang 'dir bsod nams su 'gyur ba de mkhan po dang slob dpon dang pha dang ma sngon du 'gro bar byas ta /sems can gyi chogs mdza' 
224b7(mdo 'grel): dag bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi 'bras bu theb bar bya ba'i ched du gyur cig /'di 'dra mkhan b+hik+Shu ku mA ra pradz+nya'i lag gis bris pa'o/ /thub pa'i gsung rab rgya mtsho'i bdud rtsi'i bcud/ /ltung dang nyon mongs nad gso'i sman chen 'di/ /lnga brgya'i dus na
225a1(mdo 'grel): bstan pa'i srog 'dzin pa/ /shAkya'i sras po yon tan grags pa yis/ /dpe med grong du sku 'khrungs rtsod dus kyi/ /mkhas pa rgyal ba kun dga' la gsol nas/ /ya rabs spyod pa ma nyams dad dang ldan/ /pa tshab ldod
225a2(mdo 'grel): gis skor zhogs kyi stod/ /mkhas btsun 'byung gnas dam pas byin brlabs pa/ /dpal ldan ya gad gtsug lag khang chen du/ /skad gnyis smra la seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma grags pa dang/ /khu yi ban d+he mdo snga
225a3(mdo 'grel): 'bar gyis bsgyur/ /des bskyed bsod nams zla ltar bsil ba yis/ /thub pa'i 'khor bzhi dang ni 'gro kun gyi/ /ltung dang nyon mongs gdud ba zhi gyur cig /nam mkha' i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam par/ /sems can ma lus mdza' yang de bzhin te
225a4(mdo 'grel): ji tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa/ /bdag gi smon lam mdza' yang de tsam mo/ /deng nas bzung ste chos kyi sku/ /gcig tu ma gyur bar du ni/ /bshes gnyen khyod dang mi 'bral zhing/ /sgrub pa'i sgo nas mnyes byed shog /thos brtson dang ldan
225a5(mdo 'grel): dge sbyong la gus pa/ /pa tshab dge bsnyen rdo rje g.yung drung dang/ /bslab gus yod gzhungs gzhon nu shes rab dang/ /bzod ldan rin chen bzang po yongs la drin/ /gdung brgyud sa las 'phags pa ba tshab ldong gi sras/ /bslab gsum sgrub pas skyod bar
225a6(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten rab grags pa/ /da ltar lnga brgya'i dus kyi bstan pa'i srog 'dzin pa'i/ /dge slong yon tan grags kyi rab tu bskul gyur bas/ kha che'i bram ze mkhas pa rgyal ba kun dga' dang/ /sgra bsgyur phul du phyin pa ba tshab khu gsum gyis/ /ya rabs
225a7(mdo 'grel): spyod pa ma nyams pa tshab rom po'i khul/ /gnod sbyin nor spel grags pa zhogs lha phyug pa'i 'dabs/ /mkhas btsun bzhugs rjes skyong pa ya gang gtsug lag tu/ /mdo sde kun las btus pa bsgyur cing lags par zhus/ /bod 'bangs yongs la
225b1(mdo 'grel): sman pas sa yang rab tu g.yos/ /dge legs bsam pa dag pas dgongs pa mthar yang chub// // */ /rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa zhes bya ba paN+Di ta bud+d+ha sh+rIdz+nyA nas bod du mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du
225b2(mdo 'grel): dzi na mArgA ba tA ra/ bod skad du/ rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa/ bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig bag la nyal ni bag chags bcas dang bdud dgra ma lus thams cad ni/ /gnyen po yang
225b3(mdo 'grel): dag gzung ba'i stobs kyis nges bcom byang chub mchog ni rgyas ldan zhing/ /kun mkhyen bde gshegs thugs rje bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin skyob pa rab ston mnga' bdag po/ /de dang bla ma chos dang dge 'dun bcas la gus pas rtag par kun nas
225b4(mdo 'grel): 'dud// /nyen po yongs su gzung ba yis/ /mi mthun phyogs de kun spangs dang/ /byang chub mchog gi rtogs pa dang/ /'gro ba'i don ni 'dod pa yis/ /rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa 'di/ /ji ltar lung bzhin mdor bsdus pas/ /rang gis rtogs par bya ba
225b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ dge slong mkhas pa byams dpal bzang/ /zhes bya chos kyi don gnyer ba/ /de yis gus par bskul ba dang/ /rang nyid mchog tu goms 'phel phyir/ /rang gi shes rab kyis brtags brjod/ /spyod yul min la goms byas nas/ /don
225b6(mdo 'grel): mchog rigs pa ldan gyur te/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa yis/ /tshod ma sbyin la'ang 'bad bzhin no/ /mdo dang dal 'byor rnyed dka' dang/ /mi rtag nyid dang srid sdug bsngal/ /thog med srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi/ /mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral 'dod dang/ /dpal
225b7(mdo 'grel): ldan bla ma'i mtshan nyid dang/ /byang sems bskyed dang sdom pa dang/ /rang bzhin kha na ma thor bcas/ /sdig bcu 'bras bu dang bcas dang/ /bag med 'dod sred bud med chang/ /bag la nyel dang de sbzhin du/ /nye ba'i nyon mongs dang bdag med /rten cing
226a1(mdo 'grel): 'brel 'byung 'khor lo dang/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams dang/ /dam chos mnyam pa la sogs dang/ /pha rol phyin bcu rnams gsungs pa/ /'jig rten pa dang don dam dang/ mi stag rnam pa gsum dang ni/
226a2(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang dbugs rngub 'byung rjes dran/ /sbyor ba'i lam dang mthong ba'i lam/ /bsgom pa'i lam dang de bzhin du/ /khyad par lam zhes grags pa dang/ /sa rnams yongs su sbyang ba dang/ /yongs smin sku bzhi brjod pa dang de bzhin du ni smon lam ste/
226a3(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa 'di/ /mdo ru bsdus te yongs brjod na/ /'di ltar le'u sum cur ni/ /go rim bzhin du gnas pa yin/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las mdor bsdus kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// //mi yi dngos po
226a4(mdo 'grel): rnyed par shin tu dka' / /rab bsngags skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ /rab bsngags yul dang 'tshe dang skrag pa med/ /nad med pa dang dbang po tshang gyur dang/ /lang tsho ldan gyur nas kyang tshe rings dang/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chu bor g.yengs pas 'jigs/
226a5(mdo 'grel): dka' tshegs med pa'i gos dang bza' la sogs/ /snying po yod med dpyod shes blo ldan dang/ /sangs rgyas byon dang de yi chos gsungs dang/ /chos thos 'dod cing mngon par brtson pa dang/ /dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i bsnyen bkur dang/ /thos don sems
226a6(mdo 'grel): dang bsgom sogs shin tu dkon/ /de ltar ston pas gsungs te 'jig dus kyi/ /rlung gis cher g.yengs gcig byung rgya mtsho yis/ /gnya' shing bu gar lo brgya nas 'thon pa'i/ /rus sbal mgrin pa chud ltar mi rnyed dka' / /sngar bshad las ltos lhag
226a7(mdo 'grel): par khyad par du/ de de rim pa rim pa rnyed par dka' / /de phyir dal 'byor rin chen legs rnyod pa/ /mi yi lus kyi skyes bu'i don bsgrubs te/ /gal te 'di la phan pa ma bsams na/ /phyis ni gsungs pa'i dal 'byor ga la rnyed/ bla ma'i bka' lung rang gi rig
226b1(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ blo dang ldan pas brtag cing dpyad par bya/ 'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las dal 'byor rnyed par dka' ba brgyud pa'i rim pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o// //skyes pa tsam nas skye 'gro yi/ mdun na brtse ba med pa yi/ 'chi ba zhes
226b2(mdo 'grel): bya'i 'dre chen gnas/ shin tu bzlog dka' 'jigs par byed/ /ma dang pha dang bu dang ni/ spun dang sring mo de bzhin du/ /chung ma gnyen gshes mdza' bo dang/ /mi mdza' kun kyang gshin rjes gsod/ byis pa rgan po gzhon nu dang/ /dar ma dang ni
226b3(mdo 'grel): mchog gzugs can/ /lang mtsho can dang lang tsho med/ khrel med mche bas za ba'o/ 'khor los sgyur dang mi yi ni/ dbang po blun po la sogs dang/ tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang/ nor rgyas la sogs klu rnams te/ 'di dag kun kyang 'chi bas zos
226b4(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan can dang shes pa can/ /zhi dang thub dang snying rje mchog /gtong dang dge ba'i las can dang/ /sna tshogs rig pa'i pha rol phyin/ bde ldan rnyed ldan kha drag dang/ smra mkhas pa dang chos smra rnams/ 'chi ba yis ni 'joms pa ste/ kun la gtong
226b5(mdo 'grel): ba gang yang med/ /bcugs pa dang ni ngo yang med/ /dad pa can dang gus can mad/ /sa mtshams dang ni rtog dpyod med/ gar yang 'chi bdag 'di ni 'byung/ /snod dang sems can 'jig rten grags/ /dus gsum gyi ni khams gsum rnams/ /skyes
226b6(mdo 'grel): pa nas gzung brlag gi bar/ /mdor na 'jigs pa'i rjes su phyogs/ /yid brtan mi rung 'chi bdag 'di/ byas dang ma byas mi sdod 'joms/ /bde dang mi bde yid brtan med/ /gnam lcags chen po glo bur ba/ gsod pa'i gnas su gsad bya yi/ /skyes bu stobs
226b7(mdo 'grel): kyis khrid pa ltar/ /skye 'gro rnams ni skyes tsam gyis/ /de ni skad cig skad cig 'chi/ /dal 'byor rin chen rnyed dka' ste/ /rnyed kyang skad cig 'jig rang bzhin/ /de mthong yang ni ci gnas rang/ /'chi ba nyid du mi rtogs te/ /rgas med 'chi med bdag nyid du/ /go zhing lus
227a1(mdo 'grel): can gsod ba ste/ 'dod dang gti mug 'jigs khro yis/ bla ma dang ni phan 'dogs dang/ /gang yang rung ste su yang gsod/ /bla ma dkon mchog gsum dang yang/ /yon tan can dang sdug phongs kyi/ /rdzas ni dogs pa
227a2(mdo 'grel): med par 'phrog /longs spyod don du lha bzhin du/ 'dod pas log par spyod pa rnams/ /rung dang mi rung rnams dpyod mid/ gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnyed bzhin du/ /rten cing rab tu tshim par byed/ /rdzun dang phra ma tshig rtsub dang/ ngag 'khyal ba yi tshig
227a3(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ rol rtsed byed dang sems can ni/ /pha rol sems la zug rngu byed/ /gzhan gyi nor la bdag por ni/ 'dod pa skyed par byed pa dang/ /gzhan yang nod par sems par byed/ chos dang chos min phyin ci log /'di ltar sdig pa byas kyang
227a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ rgas med 'chi ba med bzhin rol/ /shin tu lhung ste cher rtsub pa'i/ /dmyal ba mi bzang myong bar 'gyur/ mchog tu tshe ring mi rnams kyang/ /tshe lo brgya pa yin par brjod/ stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi /zhag la lo ni brgya yin te/ de rnams
227a5(mdo 'grel): nang nas gang rung ba'i/ /nyin zhag la ni nges par 'chi/ /kha cig mngal du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /kha cig skyes ma thag tu 'chi/ /skad cig 'jig pa'i rang bzhin du/ chos rnams yang dang yang du bsam/ bla ma dkon mchog gsum po la/ blo ldan 'bad
227a6(mdo 'grel): pas skyabs su 'gro/ 'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las mi rtag pa brtan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //spyir ni 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi/ /phung por rab tu grags pa yin/ skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi/ de bzhin du ni ngan sor gsum
227a7(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal rang bzhin nyid du gsungs/ /'khor ba cis kyang 'byung ba yin/ /zhing las g.yo dang tshong dang ni/ /phyugs skyong ba yi sdug bsngal dang/ /sdug pa dang bral sdug bsngal dang/ /mi sdug dang phrad sdug bsngal dang/ /'dod yon btsal yang ma rnyed dang/ /
227b1(mdo 'grel): shin tu bkres skom sdug bsngal dang/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu che/ /dag rnams sna tshogs sdug bsngal dang/ bsam pa ma grub nor zad dang/ /grags med sdug bsngal sdug bsngal nyid/ /'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal chen po ni/ /dbang po
227b2(mdo 'grel): lnga ni rgyas byed pa'i/ /dbang po'i spyod yul longs spyod kun/ /de bzhin rgyal po dbang phyug sogs/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus kyi/ /mder na zag bcas bde ba 'di/ /mthar ni 'bral bar 'gyur ba ste/ /'di ni sdug bsngal nyid yin no/ /nges par
227b3(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal 'di rnams kyi/ /nyer lan rgyu ni sred pa ste/ /de bzlog pa yi chad du ni/ /chos kyi bdag med bsgom par bya/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal brjod pa'i le'u ste bzhi ba'o// //thog ma med
227b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'khor ba ru/ /las rlung shugs kyis gang 'khor ba/ /'di dag dal ba med par 'khor/ /sdug bsngal 'chi ba'i chos can de/ /thog ma med ldan 'khor bar ni/ /skye ba brgyud mar 'khor ba na/ /res 'ga' la lar gang la la/ /pha dang ma dang bu dang ni/ /
227b5(mdo 'grel): snag gnyen sogs su brgya stong du/ /'di la gang zhig ma gyur med/ /bu dang tsha bo sogs 'brel ba/ /nye 'khor gnyen dang rtsa lag rnams/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho ru/ /bying pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir/ /nan tan gyis ni legs brtags nas//
227b6(mdo 'grel): dpal ldan bla ma dam pa bsten/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las 'gro ba bsgral bar 'dod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga ba'o// //lta ba kun gyi gnad shes shing/ /snying po yod med rnam dpyod can/ /rtog ge'i bstan bcos kun don dang
227b7(mdo 'grel): dbu ma'i don la rnam dag blo/ /rgyags min nga rgyal med pa dang/ /snyoms shing mchog tu snying rje can/ /srid pa'i long spyod bon mi gnyer/ /bla ma dkon mchog gsum la brten/ /gzhan las rnyed pa don mi gnyer/ /chog shes rang gi las la sems/ /pha rol
228a1(mdo 'grel): dpal dang rnyed pa dang/ /bkur sti yon tan grags pa yis/ /bde dang ldan na shin tu dga' / /mdo dang chos mngon 'dul ba yi/ /'gal ba'i don ni gsal byed cing/ /bla ma rgyud pa'i rim pa yi/ /theg pa chen po'i don ston
228a2(mdo 'grel): pa/ brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/ /bzod ldan gsong por legs smra ba/ /tshul khrims 'chal yang lam la gnas/ /byas pa'i ltung ba 'chos par byed/ /de la sogs te gsung rab las/ /gsungs pa'i bla ma'i mtshan nyid ldan/ /de 'dra'i dpal
228a3(mdo 'grel): ldan bla mar bya/ /de las gzhan pa bdud kyi phyogs/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa dpal ldan bla ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u sta drug pa'o// //rnam dag tshes dang gza' la sogs/ rjes su mthun pa kun bzung la/ /gus pas bla ma
228a4(mdo 'grel): dkon mchog la/ /cho ga bzhin du mchod byas te/ /tha ma 'bring sogs dbye ba ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas gsung cho ga yis/ /bla ma dang ni dkon mchog la/ /ci nus pa yi yon dbul bya/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skrag pa'i/ /yid kyis bstod cing phyag kyang
228a5(mdo 'grel): bya/ byang chub snying po ma thob par/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ /bla ma mchod pa la sogs pa'o/ /thog ma med ldan 'khor ba nas/ /tshe rabs 'di'am gzhan dag tu/ /bdag gis ma 'tshal sdig bgyis pa'am/ /bgyid du stsal ba nyid dang
228a6(mdo 'grel): ni/ gti mug 'khrul pas bdag non te/ /rjes su yi rang gang bgyis pa/ /nongs pa de dag mthong bgyis nas/ /bsam pa thag pas mgon la bshags/ /bdag gis dkon mchog gsum dang ni/ /pha ma'am bla ma gzhan dag la/ /nyon mongs sgo nas
228a7(mdo 'grel): lus ngag dang/ /yid kyis gnod bgyis gang lags dang/ /nyes pa du mas skyon chags pa'i/ /sdig can bdag gis sdig pa gang/ /shin tu mi bzad bgyis pa de/ /thams cad 'dren pa rnams la chags/ /sdig pa bshags pa'o/ /'dren pa rnams
228b1(mdo 'grel): kyis bdag gi sdig /nongs pa lags par gzung du gsol/ /'di ni bzang po ma lags pas/ /slan chad bdag ni yongs mi bgyid/ /mi byed par sdom pa'o/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha' i mthas khyab pa/ /'jig rten khams na bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas
228b2(mdo 'grel): byang sems de dag kun/ /dus gsum du ni byung rnams dang/ /nyan thos bse ru sangs rgyas dang/ /'phags min lus can rnams kyi ni/ /dus gsum bsod nams thams cad la/ /dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo/ /bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /rjes su yi rang
228b3(mdo 'grel): bgyis pa les/ /bsod nams dpag med gang skyes pa/ /dge des skye bo thams cad rnams/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob gyur cig /bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba'o/ /'jig rten khams brjod sangs rgyas gang/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i brtse can rnams/ /rnam
228b4(mdo 'grel): pa kun tu drag par ni/ /chos ni gsung zhing bstan du gsol/ /bskul ba'o/ /yongs su mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa'i/ /skyob pa rtag par bzhugs su gsol/ /dam chos thos des sems can rnams/ /srid pa las ni phyir phyogs shog /gsol ba'o/ /mgon po khyod la
228b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad du/ /nges par bdag nyid dbul bar bgyi/ /deng nas bzung nas bran nyid du/ /'khor ba'i 'jigs pas mchi bar bgyi/ /mgon po bla ma sangs rgyas dang/ /byang sems rnams kyis bdag bzung mdzod/ /mi 'jigs pa ni bdag la gsol//
228b6(mdo 'grel): deng nas 'gro ba'i don bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid dbul ba'o/ /de nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi/ /sems ni bla na med par bskyed/ /lung las gsungs pa'i cho ga yi/ /sems ni rtse gcig dang byas la/ /'di lta ste/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu nam mkha' kun khyab pa'i/ /'jig rten
228b7(mdo 'grel): khams na bzhugs pa yi/ /ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /de sras byang chub sems rnams dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos byang chub gang/ /'dan pa rang rgyal rnams dang ni/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha la sogs/ /de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /phyogs su
229a1(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' i mdza' gtugs pa'i/ /'khor ba'i 'ching ba dam po las/ /sems can khams rnams bsgral phyir dang/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bya'i phyir/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad
229a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul khrims rnam pa gsum bsrungs te/ /sangs rgyas sbyor skyes sdom pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims ni/ /bdag gis brtan par
229a3(mdo 'grel): gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /deng nas brtsams nas bzung bar bgyi/ /de ltar sems ni bskyed nas kyang/ /de nas de la mi mthun phyogs/ /chom rkun skabs tshol spangs ba'i phyir/ /de la
229a4(mdo 'grel): zhugs te sems kyis bsrung/ /sgrib pa'i mun pa kun 'joms shing/ /kun mkhyen ye shes byed pa po/ /gang la phan yon dpag med pa/ /thub pa skyes mchog gis gsungs shing/ /dpal ldan kun tu bzang spyod sogs/ /smon lam mdza' yas
229a5(mdo 'grel): kyis bcings pas/ /rdo rje lta bur brtan pa ste/ 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel ba'i mchog /phun sum tshogs pa kun bskyed cing/ /bdud ni thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho kun skyob pa'i/ /rin thang med pa'i rin chen mchog /byang
229a6(mdo 'grel): chub spyod 'jug la sogs su/ /bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis ni/ /sems can kun la brtse ba yis/ /mdor sdus gsungs pa rig par bya/ /ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu dang/ /bum pa bzang po mi zad gter/ /dpag bsam shing gi myu gu ni/ /rnyed bzhin
229a7(mdo 'grel): 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/ /cho ga bzhin du sdom blangs na/ /byang chub smon pa ldan 'gyur te/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pas/ /byang chub sems su rab tu grags/ /sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
229b1(mdo 'grel): dbye ba'am/ /de bzhin lhan cig skye bar brjod/ /nyon mongs la sogs kyis bsgribs phyir/ /de yi gzugs ni ma gsal ba'i/ /ma rig pa yi gzugs yin phyir/ /rnam par rig byed min zhes brjod/ /sdom par brjod pa de yang ni/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyi
229b2(mdo 'grel): rgyun yin no/ /thar pa'i cha mthun gnas pa ni/ /chung ngu la sogs dbye ba gsum/ /'dun pa lhan cig mtshungs ldan sems/ /dag cing bzang ba'i zhing sa bzhin/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs mchog ni/ /skye zhing 'byung ba'i rten yin no/ /bsam pa rjes su zhugs pa'i
229b3(mdo 'grel): sems/ /dag pa'i gser dang mtshungs pa ste/ /da ltar dang ni phyi nas kyang/ /rnam pa kun du 'gyur ba med/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa mtshungs ldan pa'i/ /dkar phyogs zla ba tshes pa bzhin/ /dge ba'i chos ni thams cad kyang/ /gong nas gong du 'phel bar byed//
229b4(mdo 'grel): las ni dang po par gnas la/ /rim pa bzhin du gsum gsungs pa/ /chung ngu 'bring dang chen po ste/ /thar pa'i cha dang mthun gyur pa'i/ /sbyor ba'i lam dang mtshungs ldan pa'i/ /sems ni me dang 'dra ba ste/ /mi mthun phyogs kyi bud shing bsreg /rab tu
229b5(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba 'phro phyir 'byung/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin ldan pa/ /mi zad pa yi gter dang 'dra/ /'dod don kun gyis tshim byas kyang/ /'dod don yongs su zad pa med/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin ldan pa/ /rin chen 'byung gnas lta bur 'gyur/ /yon tan rin chen de
229b6(mdo 'grel): dag kun/ /skye ba'i rten ni de yin no/ /bzod pa'i phar phyin rnal 'byor pa'i/ /sems ni rgya mtsho chen po bzhin/ /mi 'dod pa kun thog bab kyang/ /rgyud la bde ba 'khrug mi 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin ldan pas/ /rmad du byung ba'i rdo rje bzhin/ /yid ches mngon
229b7(mdo 'grel): par brtan pa ste/ /bdud kyi rigs kyis mi tshad pa'o/ /bsam gtan phar phyin rnal 'byor pa'i/ /sems ni ri rgyal lta bu ste/ /dmigs pa kun gyis g.yengs pa yi/ /bdag nyid che rnams mi bskyod pa'o/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ldan pa/ /lha rdzas sman chen lta bu ste/
230a1(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa'i nad/ /des ni kun tu 'joms pa yin/ /thabs kun gyis ni phar phyin ldan/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen lta bu ste/ /kun nas rtag par thams cad du/ /sems can don ni yongs mi gtong
230a2(mdo 'grel): smon lam dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i/ /sems ni yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/ /smon lam gyi ni nus pa yis/ /'bras bu smin pa 'phel ba nyid/ /stobs kyi pha rol phyin ldan pa'i/ /sems ni nyi ma lta bu ste/ /rang gi gdul bya'i la tog kun/ /yongs su smin
230a3(mdo 'grel): pa nyid du byed/ /ye shes pha rol phyin ldan pa/ /glu dbyangs snyan pa sgrogs pa bzhin/ /chos rnams yang dag bstan pas ni/ /sems can 'dun par byed pa'o/ /sems ni bcu po 'di rnams ni/ /rim pas sa ni bcu pa ste/ /mthong lam bsgom lam
230a4(mdo 'grel): zhes pa las/ /der ni gcig dang go rims bzhin/ /mngon par shes dang mtshungs ldan dang/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin/ /thogs pa med pa'i mthu yis ni/ /sems can don kun byed pa nyid/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs ldan pa/ /
230a5(mdo 'grel): bang mdzod dang ni mtshungs pa ste/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis kyis/ /mdzod ni nges par gnas pa nyid/ /byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ /ldan pa sa skyong lam dang 'dra/ /'phags pa'i gang zag ma lus pa/ /'gro ba dang ni 'de ba nyid
230a6(mdo 'grel): zhi gnas lhag mthong ldan pa ni/ /bzhon pa lta bur dgongs pa yin/ /zung 'jug lam du 'gro bas na/ /srid dang zhi bar mi ltung nyid/ /bzung dang spobs pa dang ldan pa/ /bkod ma'i chu dang 'dra ba ste/ /thos dang ma thos chos rnams kun/ /rtag par 'dzin
230a7(mdo 'grel): cing ston pa'o/ /rim pa bzhin du brjod pa yi/ /sems ni lnga po 'di dag nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sa la ni/ /khyad par lam kyis bsdus pa'o/ /chos kyi sbyin pa dang ldan pa/ /kun dga' i sgra snyan lta bu ste/ /thar pa 'dod pa'i gdul bya la/ /kun dga' i tshig ni
230b1(mdo 'grel): sgrog par byed/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /sa dang 'brel te sangs rgyas sar/ /'jug sbyor ba yi lam gyis bsdus/ /de las gzhan yang gang zhig ni/ /bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam gyis ni/ /rjes zhugs gang gA'i chu rgyun bzhin/ /snying brtse shes rab
230b2(mdo 'grel): dbyer med cing/ /gcig tu sbyor bas gzhan don byad/ /chos sku mngon par ldan pa yi/ /sems ni sprin dang 'dra bar 'dod/ /mdza' yas lus kyi sprul sprin gyis/ /sems can don byed rgyu nyid do/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sas bsdus pa'i/ /sems ni gnyis ni rim
230b3(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin/ /sngon du gsung ba dngos gzhi'i skabs/ /phyi ma rjes kyi skabs su 'dod/ /'di ni 'jug pa byang chub kyi/ sems kyi dbye bar gsungs pa yin/ /smon dang 'jug pa'i dbye ba yis/ /byang chub sems ni gnyis su gsal/ gang nas bzung ste sems can khams
230b4(mdo 'grel): mdza' yas rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir/ /mi ldog pa yi sems kyis su/ /sems de yang dag blangs gyur ba/ /deng nas gzung de gnyid log gam/ /bag mer gyur kyang bsod nams shugs/ /rgyun mi 'chad par du ma zhig /nam mkha' mnyam par rab tu 'byung/
230b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub smon pa'i sems las ni/ /'khor tshe 'bras bu cher 'byung yang/ /ji ltar 'jug pa'i sems bzhin du/ /bsod nams rgyun chags 'byung ba min/ /'di dag gis ni dge ba'i chos/ /zag bcas zag med thams cad kyis/ /lam 'bras dang bcas
230b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid rnams/ /yang dag bsdus te ji bzhin gsungs/ /'di ni rgyal pa'i lam la 'jug pa las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/ //mchog tu dge ba bzung ba dang/ /mi dag thams cad spangs pa ste/ /de yis sdom pa
230b7(mdo 'grel): bzung ba ni/ /ji lta ba bzhin yongs su bsrungs/ /bstan pa'i sems kyis 'khor ba yi/ /sdug bsngal rjes su dran par bya/ /sdug bsngal rgyu ni spang ba'i phyir/ /gnyen po yongs su gzung bar bya/ /de ni dge bsnyen bsnyen gnas dang/ /dge tshul dang ni dge slong rnams/ /lnga dang
231a1(mdo 'grel): brgyad dang bcu dang ni/ /thams cad spong zhing bsrung bar bzung/ /pho dang mo yi dbye ba yis/ /mdor na slar yang brgyad du dbye/ /so sor thar pa'i sdom zhes pa/ /'dul pa nyid du rgyas par spros/ /dge slong lus kyi bsdams
231a2(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ dge slong dag ni bsdams pa yin/ /dge slong yid ni bsdams pa ste/ /dge slong kun tu bsdams pa yin/ /sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste/ dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad/ /rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa
231a3(mdo 'grel): yin/ de dag nyid ni theg chen la/ /zhugs nas khyad par 'phags pa nyid/ /byang chub sems dpa' i bslab pa dang/ ldan zhing de rnams so sor 'brang/ /byang chub sems kyi bslab pa ni/ /mdza' yas thub pas gsungs pa rnams/ /byang chub spyod
231a4(mdo 'grel): 'jug la sogs su/ /bsdus pa de rnams blta bar bya/ mdor na byang chub sems rnams kyis/ /bslab pa sems can don bsgrub cing/ phung po la sogs chos rnams kyi/ /ngo bo nyid med rnam par bsgom/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa ma nyams pa/ /rab
231a5(mdo 'grel): tu 'bad pas spyad par bya/ /nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /kun rdzob pa dang don dam ste/ /sdem pa blangs nas bsrung ba ni/ /kun rdzob pa ru 'dod pa yin/ /tshad med pa ni bzhi rnams la/ /bsnyen cing bsten pa don dam ste/ /sdug bsngal dang ni
231a6(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal gyi/ /rgyu las 'gro ba bsgrol 'dod nyid/ de ni snying rjes chen por gsungs/ /ston ka'i zla 'od bzang bzhin no/ 'gro ba bla med bde ba la/ /sbyor bar 'dod pas byams pa nyid/ /nam mkha' kun ni mthar thug ba'i/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od mnyam ba'o
231a7(mdo 'grel): gzhan la phan 'dogs la mkhas shing/ /byang chub la phyogs sems can de/ /mthong nas tshim pa dga' mtshan nyid/ pad+ma rA ga'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /rnyed pa la sogs 'jig rten chos/ /de dag kun la btang snyoms pa'i/ /ting 'dzin de bskyed rnal 'byor
231b1(mdo 'grel): pa/ btang snyoms pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i 'od/ /rang bzhin dang ni mtshan ma dang/ /'bras bu dang mngon du byed kyi/ /stong pa nyid kyi snying rje sogs/ /rim bzhin 'khyud par shes par bya/ /tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po rnams/ /dbye ba rnam bzhi brtag bsgom
231b2(mdo 'grel): bya/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo de yis/ /gal te 'khyud par ma gyur na/ /'di dag zag pa dang bcas so/ /tshangs par spyod pa 'di gnyis ni/ /rgyal ba'i sras po rnams kyi'o/ /tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pa/ /sgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor/ /rang gzhan rgyud kyi
231b3(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs pa/ /spong zhing dben par gnas pa'i yid/ /bza' ba la sogs pa rnams ni/ /srog bsrung tsam gyis chog shes pa/ /gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid 'di nyid ni/ /ldan pa'i mi de rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub lam ni drang po la/ /sgom pa'i snod 'gyur
231b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan du min/ /'khor ba'i bde dang longs spyod ni/ sred pa nyid du sred par byed/ /de yis rnam g.yeng sems kyis ni/ /lam la goms pa shin tu ring/ /thos bsam rab 'phel las byung zhing/ sred dang srid pa rnam spong ba/ /thar pa'i cha mthun dge ba ste/ /de thob
231b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sras chu du'o/ /bsgom pa'i lam ni rnam gnyis te/ /so so'i skye dang 'phags pa yi/ /dbye bzag bcas zag med do/ /mthong ba zhes bya zag pa med/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las sdom pa brjod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //
231b6(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar skyes pa'i rin chen sems/ /bsrung ba du ni 'dod pa yis/ /phan dang mi phan dngos po ni/ /rim bzhin blang dor shes par bya/ dor bya'i dbye ba rang bzhin dang/ /bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba'o/ /kha na ma tho mi dge'i las/ /phye nas phye ste bshad par bya/ /
231b7(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin kha na ma tho nyid/ mi dge bcu po 'di dag ste/ rnam smin mi bzad sdug bsngal nyid/ /de dag rnam par spang bar bya/ srog gcod par ni ma 'khrul bar/ /bsams bzhin srog chags gsod pa'o/ /ma byin len pa gzhan gyi nor/ /mthu dang 'jag
232a1(mdo 'grel): bus bdag gir byed/ /bgrod min 'gro bar 'dod pa yi/ /log par g.yem pa rnam pa bzhi/ /brdzun tshig 'du shes gzhan bsgyur ba'i/ /tshig don dan par go ba'o/ /mig sna yid kyi rnam shes dang/ /gsum gyis
232a2(mdo 'grel): nyams su myong gang de/ /mthong thos rnam par shes pa dang/ /rtogs pa yin te rim bzhin bshad/ /phra ma pha rol dbye ba'i phyir/ /nyon mongs can gyi sems kyi tshig/ tshig rtsub po ni mi snyan pa/ /nyon mongs can kun bkyal pa yin/ /gzhan
232a3(mdo 'grel): yang nyon mongs can sems kyi/ /kha gsag glu dang rol mor bcas/ /bstan bcos ngan pa'i tshig yin no/ /brnab sems gzhan nor log par chags/ /gnod sems sems can la sdang ba'o/ /dge dang mi dge mi lta ba/ /log par lta ba yin 'di
232a4(mdo 'grel): la/ gsum las bdun ni las kyang yin/ /de la rnam smin thams cad du/ /dmyal bar yongs su brjod pa ste/ /rgyun mthun rgyu 'bras mthun par ni/ /sa steng nyid du myong bar byed/ /bdag pos phyi yul 'dod pa'i don/ /phyin ci log tu 'byung ba'o/ /sdug
232a5(mdo 'grel): bsngal phyir dang gsad phyir dang/ /gzi byin med phyir 'bras rnam gsum/ /sbyor ba dngos gzhi rjes rnams kyis/ /gnas skabs go rim bzhin du'o/ /rgyu mthun srog gcod pa yis ni/ /tshe thung lus la nad zug ste/ /ma byin par ni blangs pa yis
232a6(mdo 'grel): dbul por 'gyur zhing rgyal po dang/ /chom rkun sogs kyis nor zang byed/ /'dod pas log par g.yem rnams kyis/ /chud na gzhan la 'phyo bar 'gyur/ /rdzun du smra bas skur pa 'debs/ /phra mas grogs dang dbye bar 'gyur/ /tshig rtsub brjod pas
232a7(mdo 'grel): mi snyan thob/ /dag 'khyal gyis ni legs bshad kyang/ /mi len gzhan gyi gzhad gang rgyu/ /brnab sems kyis ni 'dod chags dag/ drag cing yongs spyod zad par 'gyur/ /gnod sems kyis ni zhe sdang drag /lus kyang ngan pa nyid yin no/ /gti mug
232b1(mdo 'grel): dran? cing lta ba ngan/ /log par lta ba'i 'bras bur grags/ /'di ni rgyu mthun 'bras bu'o/ /gsang pas phyi rol dngos po rnams/ /'bras bu bcud chung la sogs pa/ /ma byin blangs pas thob 'bab cing/ /rdul gyis rab tu gang ba nyid/ /'dod pas log par
232b2(mdo 'grel): g.yem pa yis/ /phyogs kun rdul gyis khyab pa nyid/ /rdzun du smras pas thams cad du/ /dngos po thams cad dri mi zhim/ /phra ma'i tshig gi 'bras bu ni/ /shin tu mtho dang dma' ba nyid/ /tshig rtsub smras pa las 'byung ba/ /sa ni chu med tsha sgo can/ /ngag bkyal
232b3(mdo 'grel): smras pa las 'byung ba/ /dus tshigs rnams ni log par 'byung/ /brnab sems kyis ni 'bras bu phra/ /gnod sems kyis ni 'bras bu rtsub/ /'bras med pa 'am 'bras bu chung/ /log par lta ba las byung ba'o/ /lhan skyes kha na ma tho ba/ /'bras bcas gsungs
232b4(mdo 'grel): pa de smad ba'o/ /'di ni bdag po'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las mi dge bcu brjod ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //bag med la dga' skye bo gang/ /'di ni thar pa'i snod ma yin/ /bag med dug gis brgyal ba ni/ /mya ngan 'das
232b5(mdo 'grel): pa shin tu ring/ /dgra bo 'jigs pa cher byed pa/ /bag med dang mnyam 'ga' yang med/ /gang yang bag med dbang song ba/ /dmyal ba ru ni lhung bar 'gyur/ /bag med rab ldan mi dag ni/ /rtse zhing dogs med sdig pa spyod/ /de nas mi bzad dmyal
232b6(mdo 'grel): bar ltung/ /rtag par bag yod mi rnams ni/ /bsod nams ye shes pha rol phyin/ /mchog tu zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /de yi 'jigs pa thams cad zad/ /gang zhig mi bdag thob nas kyang/ /bag med pa la mi 'jug cing/ /de las gzhan du bzlog ba
232b7(mdo 'grel): ni/ de ni mkhas pa zhes su brjod/ /sngon du bde ba ltar rtogs nas/ /bag med pa la rjes su 'jug/ bag med las byung 'bras bu 'thob/ /phyi nang des par de gdung 'gyur/ /dgra mang yid du mi 'ong dang/ /grags pa ngan zhing shin tu smod/ /tshogs pa'i nang du dma'
233a1(mdo 'grel): 'bab cing/ /bag med ldan pa sdug bsngal snod/ /kun tu rtag par las kun la/ /bag med mchog tu nyes pa ste/ /gang yang nyin dang mtshan mo ru/ /de la dge ba rdzogs mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das bde
233a2(mdo 'grel): ba/ cung zad gang yod bag med des/ /rlag par byed par dogs nas ni/ /de nas de ni spang par bya/ /bag med 'khor ba'i rtsa ba ste/ bag yod mchog tu 'gro ba'o/ /de bas bag med spangs pa de/ /kun tu rtag par bde par 'gyur/ /bag med brgya
233a3(mdo 'grel): yis bcings pa ni/ /yul gyi rgya mtshos g.yengs pa nyid/ /srid pa'i sgrog gis bcings pa yi/ /lha rnams dpag tu med par rtse/ /skyes pa tsam gyis lha yis ni/ /bde ba skad cig rim pas mdzad/ /bag med pa yis brgyal ba rnams/ /skad cig
233a4(mdo 'grel): zad par mi shes so/ /rtag tu yul la rol pa rnams/ /yid la bag med kyis g.yengs 'khrul/ /'dod pa'i bde bas chog shes med/ /de yi lha rnams sdug bsngal nyid/ /'dod pa'i rim gyis 'khrul pa yi/ /lha rnams bag med mun pas btibs/ /'byor pa
233a5(mdo 'grel): g.yo zhing srog kyang ni/ /mthar kyang 'jigs par mi shes so/ /thog mar grogs po bzhin du mthong/ /phyi nas dgra bo bzhin 'gyur te/ /lus can rnams kun bag med kyis/ /nya rnams lcags kyus brlag bzhin no/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams dang/ /klu
233a6(mdo 'grel): rnams la ni khyad par du/ /kun tu don med byed par mthong/ /bag med pas ni dgra bo mchog /srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyis skrag cing/ /rang dang mdza' bo 'chi bsams te/ /sems can kun la brtse ba yis/ /bag med yang dag rab tu sel/ /'di ni rgyal
233a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i lam la 'jug pa las bag med pa'i nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //'dod pa rnams la 'dod mi bya/ /'dod pa yis ni kun tu bslus/ /'khor ba'i 'ching ba drag po ste/ /kun kyang dmyal ba'i rgyu rnams so/ /'di la chags dang
233b1(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa gang/ /de yis sdug bsngal mdza' yas so/ /'dod pa'i sbrul gyis zin pa la/ /zhi ba'i rgyu ni gang yang med/ /chags pas bslus pa'i sems can rnams/ /zhe sdang yongs su 'bar ba ste/ /gti mug dbang du gyur pa yis/ /tshig rtsub po ni smra ba yin/ /gtum pa
233b2(mdo 'grel): las byung gtum pa ste/ /gyur pa dang ni drag gtum nyid/ /'dod pa dug ni mi 'dra ste/ /rab tu 'bad pas spang bar bya/ /so so'i skye bo dbang po ni/ /dbang po'i don la zhen byas te/ /'dod pa 'di ni byis pa yi/ /yid 'phrog byed cing dmyal bar ltung/ 'dod chags
233b3(mdo 'grel): me ni bsreg bya yi/ /yul tsam gyis ni tshim mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin du ni dbang po yang/ /yul las zhen pa tshim pa med/ /rtsol bas me ni 'byung ba ste/ /ma phrad par ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /mi rnams kyi ni 'dod pa'i me/ /phrad dang ma phrad kyang ni skye/ /me ni ring na
233b4(mdo 'grel): 'tshig mi byed/ /'dod ma ring yang bzod par dka' / /dug ni zos pas 'chi ba ste/ /'dod chags dran pa yis kyang 'joms/ /kun rtog las byung shing la ni/ /'dod pa'i rlung gis sbar ba ni/ /go la la sogs zhen chags kyi/ /mar blugs me yis shin tu bsregs
233b5(mdo 'grel): 'byung po rnams ni sun par byed/ /mis ni mchog tu sreg byed de/ /chags me shin tu rno yang ni/ /mi rnams sun par mi byed do/ /de ltar byung ba'i 'dod pa ni/ /skyon dang bcas la khyad par du/ /mi rmongs bde bar gnas pa gang/ /de ni brtan pa zhes su brjod/ /rlung
233b6(mdo 'grel): gis bskyod ba'i shugs rlabs kyis/ /shin tu g.yo ba'i chu zla dang/ /dbu ba lta bur snying med la/ /mkhas pa su zhig dag 'bar 'gyur/ /kun rtog byung nas 'dod chags te/ /de nas zhe sdang rab tu skye/ /zhe sdang khong khros skye bo ni/ /de nas dmyal ba nyid du 'gro
233b7(mdo 'grel): de bas ri bo nyams dga' zhing/ /sna tshogs ljon shing yod pa ru/ /rten cing nges par bsam gtan bya/ /'dod pa'i kun 'byung mdzad pa yin/ /des par skyon rnams 'di kun gyi/ /dang po'i byed mkhan ma rig nyid/ /de phyir ma rig gzhom bya ste/ /de yi ngo bo
234a1(mdo 'grel): rnam dpyad bya/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyi/ /'phel bar byed pa sred pa nyid
234a2(mdo 'grel): de phyir sdug bsngal zhi 'dod pas/ /de bas sred pa mkhas pas gzhom/ /dmyal ba'i me bas sred pa yi/ /me nyid shin tu bsran par dka' / /lus ngag yid ni ngas sreg byed/ /dmyal ba'i mi ni de lta min/ /khams gsum pa yi rjes 'jug cing/ /
234a3(mdo 'grel): thog pa med pa'i las gsum ni/ /'bar med dus gsum du 'byung ba/ /sred med zhes bya gzhan yin no/ /mtho ris 'dod chags me yis bsreg /dud 'gro zhe sdang gis bsreg ste/ /gti mug me yis ngan song bsreg/ sred me kun gyis sred byed do/ /
234a4(mdo 'grel): ja rgyal ser sna'i me dud ni/ /kun tu rtog pa'i shing las byung/ /'dod pa'i me yis 'jig rten bsreg/ shing byung me yi de lta min/ /'dod pa'i sbrul gyis zin pa gang/ /de dag sos par 'gyur ba med/ /'dod pa bsten dang bsgom pa yis/ /phyir zhing de
234a5(mdo 'grel): nyid 'phel bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar me yis sreg bya thob/ /'phel bar 'gyur ba de bzhin 'di/ /'dod pa'i me ni 'phel ba na/ /bzlog par nus pa ma yin no/ /'khor lo bzhi 'khrul 'jig rten ni/ /'dod pas yongs su bslus pa nyid/ /thog med zag med 'jig rten la
234a6(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa lta bu'i dgra med do/ /'dod pas bskul ba'i mi rnams ni/ /rgya mtsho drag shul can du 'jug /mtshon cha sras? pa'i g.yul ngo ni/ /zab mor rab tu 'jug ba'o/ /'dod pa yis ni sa skyong yang/ /phan tshun nges par gsod pa ste/ /spun dang spun ni lhan cig tu/ /
234a7(mdo 'grel): pha dang bu yang phan tshun no/ /dug can mda' yis phog pa yi/ /ri dags gang du rjes su rgyug /der ni dug de nyid 'gro ste/ /de bzhin sred dug mi la'o/ /sdug bsngal can gyi yi dags rnams/ /yi dags longs spyod la rgyug ste/ /dmyal ba dmyal ba nyid du ni/ /
234b1(mdo 'grel): de ni sred pas cher bskul ba'o/ /yun tu lha yi bde ba ni/ /spyad pa'i lha rnams lha yul nas/ /sred pa'i zhags pas drangs nas ni/ /slar yang dmyal bar ltung ba'o/ /bla ma dkon mchog gsum dang ni/ /yon tan can dang btsun mo'i nor/ /gnyis skyes sogs
234b2(mdo 'grel): dang sdug phongs kyi/ /nor ni 'dod can 'phrog bar byed/ /skye 'gro kun ni brtse med pas/ /sdig pa thams cad med? pa yin/ /nor de bor nas 'gro ba ste/ /shi nas sdig dang lhan cig 'brang/ /de nas dmyal ba la sogs pa'i/ /mi bzang sdug bsngal de 'byung
234b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /drag shul skyob pa med pa de/ /las de yis ni myong bar 'gyur/ /sred pa'i yul ni nges grol zhing/ /chags pa'i sol me rnam spangs pa/ /rdo dang rin chen mnyam pa ni/ /mya ngan 'das la bad bar 'gyur/ /blo ldan ye shes chu yis ni/ /'dod
234b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i me ni 'bad de bzhom/ /'dod pa ma bkum pa la ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa shin tu ring/ /skad cig dga' ste shes par dka' / /rnam par smin pa me dang mtshungs/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i bde 'dod pas/ /de phyir sred pa des gzhom bya/ /sed pa'i zhags
234b5(mdo 'grel): pas rnam grol zhing/ /chags sdang zhe sdang spang ba dang/ /sdig pa'i dri ma bral ba yi/ /mkhas pa rnams ni mya ngan bral/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las sred pa'i nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //bud med
234b6(mdo 'grel): ngan song rtsa ba ste/ /thams cad du ni nor zad byed/ /bud med ngag nyan mi dag ni/ /tshogs pa ru ni bzhad gad rgyu/ /bud med rnams ni don med chags/ /g.yo dang ser sna che ba ste/ /'jig rten gnyis su rlag byed pa/ /skyes pa rnams la nye bar gnas/ /chags
234b7(mdo 'grel): las sred pa'i rnam 'gyur tshig /'jam zhing myos byed rnam par lta/ /de yi snying ni gzhan du ste/ /yongs su brjod pa gzhan du'o/ /'jam zhing snum la reg bde yang/ /'dzid na rdo rje lta bu ste/ /phan byas bkur byas mi dran zhing/ /dri ma can gyi bsam pa'o/ /gos
235a1(mdo 'grel): dang zas dang lus rgyan sogs/ /ster ba'i gzhon nu yid 'ongs ba/ /rang gi bdag po bor nas ni/ /byis mi la ni 'gro bar byed/ /gang du 'gro ba'i grogs de la/ /bud med dga' bar byed pa ste/ /gnas pa'i skyes pa myur myur
235a2(mdo 'grel): ba/ 'di ni spong bar byed pa yin/ /ji ltar bung ba me tog gi/ bcung zad nas ni spong ba ltar/ /de bzhin skyed pa nor zad nas/ /bud med kyis ni spong bar byed/ /ral gri'i snying ste rtsub cing g.yo/ /sdig pa'i mun pas bsgribs pa ste/ /bud med skyes pa brlag bya'i
235a3(mdo 'grel): phyir/ skyes te rgyu gzhan ci yang med/ /lha rnams la yang bud med kyi/ /'ching ba las dam gzhan med de/ /bud med 'ching bas nges bcings pa/ /phyi nas dmyal bar ltung ba'o/ /bud med kyis ni byas pa'i las/ /rgyu sogs khram ni mngon pa 'am/ /bud
235a4(mdo 'grel): med chags pas rmongs pa'i mi/ /rmongs pa'i phyir na mi rig go/ blo gtad skyes pa slu brid kyi/ /'bad pa yis ni bcings nas kyang/ /longs spyod kyi ni bcud 'phrog ste/ /bur shing bzhin du 'jibs nas 'dor/ /skyes pa thabs kun 'chang bas ni/ /rnam
235a5(mdo 'grel): pa kun gyis yongs bsrungs kyang/ /bud med dbang du bya bar ni/ /thams cad du ni mi nus so/ /yid 'ong tshig gi skyes pa rnams/ /ri dags bzhin du smongs byed cing/ /phyi nas rgud par gyur pa na/ /mi gtsang thal ba bzhin du spong/ /phan byas mi dran
235a6(mdo 'grel): bkur byas na/ /de bzhin dbang phyug byams byas pa/ /khyod la rgud pa nyer gnas na/ /bud med kyis ni mi dran no/ /me tog rnyid pa spangs nas ni/ /bung ba bzhin du rgyug pa ste/ /de bzhin khyo ni rgud pa la/ /mo la rtse dang ngo tsha med/ /snying dga' ba rin ma nges shing
235a7(mdo 'grel): nges pa med cing snying bzang dang/ /g.yo zhing byed pa yid du 'ong/ /nga rgyal can ni thams cad du/ /ji ltar dug 'dres sprang bzhin ni/ /bud med phal cher sdig bsam can/ /srid pa'i bang mdzod 'chad ba rnams/ /mi mthun thams cad 'byung ba'i phyir/ /thar pa
235b1(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas shin tu spang/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las bud med kyi nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //gang ni skyon kun byed pa nyid/ /chang ni btung bar mi bya ste/ /de yis bag med kyang 'byung zhing/ /khyad par
235b2(mdo 'grel): du ni yon tan 'dzoms/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /cher ni shin tu 'bar byed pa'o/ /'jig rten bzhad gang le lo dang/ /ngag skyon kun dang nor zad byed/ /blo gtad med cing brdzun tshig dang/ /rnam 'phrul bya ba nyams pa nyid/ /blo ni g.yo zhing lus dbang
235b3(mdo 'grel): med/ nad dang blo ni rgud pa dang/ /ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa/ /rtsod cing pha rol kun smod dang/ /nges pa med pa'i bya ba nyid/ /de bzhin sdig pa spyod pa ste/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /mi bzad sdug bsngal cher byed pa'o/ /'di dag la sogs nyes 'byung bas/ /de bas
235b4(mdo 'grel): chang ni rnam par spang/ /gang dang gang gi bslab pa'i gzhi/ /ji ltar thub pas bcas pa gang/ /rgya cher bcas pa de nyams na/ /de ni kha na ma thob pa'o/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las chang gi nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //
235b5(mdo 'grel): mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs nyid/ /nyes pa kun gyi rten 'di rnams /rab tu 'bad pas gzhom par bya/ /nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs 'byung/ /'du byed rnams las dge sogs dang/ /de las 'khor ba'i phung po 'di/ /mtshan nyid
235b6(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal rab tu skye/ /bag la nyal drug rtsa ba ste/ /'dod chags khong khro nga rgyal lta/ /ma rig the tshom nyon mongs te/ /'di la 'dod chags rnam pa gnyis/ /'dod pa khams kyi 'dod chags te/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags zhes su brjod/ /gzugs dang gzugs med gyur
235b7(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ srid pa'i chags pa'o lta ba ni/ /bdag dang bdag gi rtag chad dang/ /med dang dman la mchog lta dang/ /rgyu min lam min der lta ba/ /de rnams lta ba lnga yin no/ /nyon mongs bcu ni khams gsum du/ /dgu bcu rtsa brgyad du phye ba/ /'di dag 'phags pa'i bden bzhi ni
236a1(mdo 'grel): mthong dang sgom lam rnams kyis spong/ /'di rnams rgya cher spros nas ni/ /mthong lam skabs su mngon par brjod/ /'di ni mi mthun phyogs kyi ni/ /gnas skabs tsam du brjod pa yin/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las
236a2(mdo 'grel): bgal nyal ba'i nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //khro dang khon 'dzin g.yo phrag dog /'chab dang 'tshig dang ser sna dang/ /sgyu dang rmugs dang nyes rtsom dang/ /nga cha med dang khrel med dang/ /thob 'jal dang ni tshul 'chos dang/
236a3(mdo 'grel): kha gsag rnyed pas rnyed 'dod dang/ /gzhogs slong zhes bya 'di dag ni/ /log par 'tshe ba lnga rnams so/ /skyon zlos rgyags dang spungs med dang/ /zhen dang yongs su zhe na nyid dang/ /yid la mi khyed mi bzod dang/ /chags dang mi rigs chags pa dang/ /snyoms pa dang
236a4(mdo 'grel): ni chos min chags/ /zhum dang zas mi 'dod pa dang/ /thob 'dod dang ni 'dod bdun dang/ /gnod sems dang ni rgod 'gyed dang/ /rmugs dang gnyid dang sdig 'dod dang/ /le lo dang ni 'dod chen dang/ /bka' blo mi bde tshul med dang/ /skye bo ngan mtshungs mi dga' 
236a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ rtog pa'i dbye ba bzhi dang ni/ /nga rgyal dbye ba bdun du shes/ /the tshom rnams ni nye nyon mongs/ /dri ma 'di rnams spang bya'o/ /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa mdor bstan pa'o/ /khro ba sems rab 'khrug pa ste/ /kho na 'dzin de dang rab 'brel nyid/ /sems kyi gya gyu g.yo
236a6(mdo 'grel): yin te/ /gzhan skyid mi bzod phrag dog go /rang skyon sgrib pas 'chab pa'o/ /'tshig pa sdig la zhen pa nyid/ /ser sna rab tu mi gtang ba'o/ /sgyu ni pha rol slu ba'o/ /non pa spobs pa nyams gyur pa'o/ /nyes rtsom khros pas non pa'o/ /ngo tsha med dang khrel med pa/ /rang dang gzhan la mi 'jem pa'o
236a7(mdo 'grel): thob kyis 'jal ba rnyed pa'i phyir/ /mngon sum gzhan la smod byed pa'o/ /tshul 'chos rnyed dang bkur sti'i phyir/ /dbang po sdom par byed pa ste/ /khags ga rnyed dang bkur sti'i phyir/ /tshig 'jam sngar ni smra ba'o/ /rnyed pas rnyed pa rnams 'dod pa/ /sngar thob pa la sngags byed
236b1(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ gzhan gyi rdzas la mngon zhen pas/ /gzhan gyi rdzas la sngags byed pa/ /gzhog slongs nyid de lnga 'di dag /log pas 'tsho bar 'dod pa'o/ /skyon zlos gzhan khos sems la ni/ /gsol 'debs pa la brjod pa'o/ /rgyags pa dregs pa'o spungs med ni/ /sems ni rtogs par
236b2(mdo 'grel): gyur pa'o/ /zhen pa kun nas dkris pa chung/ /'dod pa'i 'ded chags las byung ba'o/ /yongs su zhen pa 'dad pa la/ /kun nas dkris pa che ba'o/ /yid la mi byed don rnams la/ /sems kyi sor rtogs med pa'o/ /mi bzod gnod pa byad pa dang/ /sdug bsngal dag kyang mi bzod pa'o
236b3(mdo 'grel): chags pa rang gi rdzas la ni/ /chags pa'i 'dod chags ldan pa'i yid/ /gzhan gyi rdzas la zhen pa ni/ /mi rigs chags pa zhes bya'o/ /snyoms pa rtsom pa med pa'i lus/ /skyid lug don gyi le lo'o/ /spang bya bud med la chags pa/ /chos log chags pa zhes 'dod de/ /rang gi
236b4(mdo 'grel): yon tan bskyed nas kyang/ /sems dman zhum pa yi chad pa'o/ /zas mi 'dod pa bza' drags pas/ /lus mi bde ba yin par brjed/ /theb 'dod bdag nyid ci nas kyang/ /yon tan yang dag ldan zhes brjod/ /'dod bdun yon tan lnga rnams la/ /'dod pa don du gnyer ba
236b5(mdo 'grel): yin/ gnod sems brlag par smon pa yis/ /gzhan la gnod par sems pa'o/ /lus sems rab tu ma zhi nyid/ /rgod par yang dag rab tu brjod/ /'gyod pa ngan byas phyi nas ni/ /yang dag rab tu gdung 'gyur ba'o/ /rmuT pa ??? yis/ /las la sbyor bar mi
236b6(mdo 'grel): nus nyid/ /gnyid ni rnam shes dbang po la/ /'dus pa gnyid cas brjod pa'o/ /sdig 'dod yon tan med bzhin du/ /yon tan ldan par tshul 'chos pa'o/ /le lo las la sun skyo bas/ /lus sems bying pa nyid yin no/ /'dod chen rab tu bskam pa ste/ dpal ldan chog
236b7(mdo 'grel): shes las 'da' ba' o/ /bka' blo mi bde gang gsungs pa/ /chos la smos pa'i tshig yin no/ /tshul med slob dpon bla ma yi/ /bya ba rnams la mi gus pa'o/ /bla mar gus pa nyams pa nyid/ /'di ni skye na mtshungs pa'o/ /sems ni 'dod sogs la zhen pas/ /bstan nyams pa
237a1(mdo 'grel): ni mi dga' ba'o/ /nyed du dang 'brel rtog pa ni/ /nyed du la byams 'du shes so/ /de bzhin yul sred de don du/ /de yi yon tan brjod pa'o/ /de bzhin mi 'chir rtog pa dang/ /'chi ba'i 'jigs bas mi dogs pa'o/ /rjes rnams rig dang ldan
237a2(mdo 'grel): rtog ni/ /bdag nyid ci nas gzhan dag gis/ /yon tan bdog pa'i rnam pa yis/ /bla mar byed par 'gyur snyam pa'o/ /gzhan rjes chags dang ldan pa yi/ /rnam rtog gang yin gzhan dag la/ /chags dang gnod sems reg pa yis/ /phan dang mi phan rnam
237a3(mdo 'grel): sems pa'o/ /kun tu brtags pa'i khyad par gyis/ /gang gis ci nas yid kyi ni/ /rnam shes 'jug pa nga rgyal lo/ /'di ni thun mong nyid yin no/ /dman pas dman pa nga rgyal te/ /rang las dman las dman snyam pa/ /nga rgyal nyid du nges pa'o/ /dman pa nyid
237a4(mdo 'grel): dang bdag nyid ni/ /mnyam snyam pa 'am nga rgyal te/ /dman pa las bdag lhag snyam pa'i/ /blo de yang ni nga rgyal nyid/ /mnyam dang bdag nyid mnyam snyam pa/ /mnyam pa yi ni nga rgyal lo/ /khyad 'phags pa dang bdag mnyam par/ /rlom pa lhag pa'i nga
237a5(mdo 'grel): rgyal lo/ /khyad 'phags las bdag khyad 'phags blo/ /nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal lo/ /gar yang bdag ni dgos med ces/ /dman pa'i nga rgyal nyid yin no/ /ngo bo nyid stong nyer len gyi/ /phung po lnga la bdag blo gang/ /nga'o snyam du rlom pa ni/ /de ni nga'o snyam
237a6(mdo 'grel): par bshad/ /bsam gtan dang ni de 'bras bu/ /ma thob pa yang bdag gi ni/ /thob pa nyid du rtog pa de/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal zhes su brjod/ /log pa'i lam la sems chags pas/ /mi 'dod 'bras bu gang zhig la/ /bden pa'i las kyis dngos por rtogs/ /
237a7(mdo 'grel): de ni log pa'i nga rgyal brjod/ /tha dad 'du shes 'du shes gang/ /chags sdang mun gyis bsgribs pa'o/ /bden dang dkon mchog gsum sogs la/ /blo rnam gnyis ni the tshom mo/ /'di dag nye ba'i nyon mongs te/ /lnga bcu rtsa bdun rab tu brjod/ /phran tshegs bzhir
237b1(mdo 'grel): ni gangs pa rnams/ /thar pa 'dod pas spang bar bya/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i nyes dmigs brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// /'di dag chos kyi bdag med pa/ /rtogs pas bag chags bcas pa rnams
237b2(mdo 'grel): rab tu spong ngo yang na ni/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams/ /yang dag par ni mthong bas so/ /yang na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi/ /yang dag mi mthong zhing phung po sogs/ /stong pa nyid du goms pa dang/ /'gro ba'i don la bsgom pa spong/ /phung po 'di spangs
237b3(mdo 'grel): gzhan du ni/ /nyid 'tshams sbyor bar byed pa gang/ /phung po rnams las gzhan pa'i bdag /srid pa'i lam du 'gro ba med/ /byed pa po dang las rnams dang/ /di 'bras spyod dang rtag pa la/ /de ni byed po za ba po/ /bya ba'i nus pa bral ba nyid/ /phung po bdag min
237b4(mdo 'grel): bdag la ni/ /phung po mi ldan bdag gi ni/ /phung po ma yin bdag kyang ni/ /phung po la ni gnas ma yin/ /gzhan gyis yongs su brtags pa nyid/ /brtags phyir bdag tu rigs ma yin/ /phung po bdag las 'brel med do/ /de dag rnam par 'gal bas so/ /ston
237b5(mdo 'grel): dang phyi ma gcig pa'i gzugs/ /mi rtag dang 'brel gal srid/ /'on te 'brel na rtag pa yang/ /mi rtag bdag nyid du ni 'gyur/ /mi rtag pa yang rtag nyid du/ /rtag tu 'brel pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de ltar dpal ldan 'phags pa ni/ /klu sgrubs zhabs kyis gsungs
237b6(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ mu stegs can gyis gang brtags pa'i/ /bdag de rig pas rnam dpyad na/ /phung po kun gyi nang rnams ni/ /gang zhig nas kyang rnyed min to/ /phung po rnams yod de dag min/ /de yang bdag gi ngo bo min/ /gang yang rtag dang mi dag dag /rten dang
237b7(mdo 'grel): brten pa'i ngo bor med/ /phung po tsam zhig bdag tu ni/ /'dod pa nyid ni mi 'gags te/ /de nyid spom dang dag ra la sogs/ /nga ru rlom pas 'phel ba nyid/ /de yang sgyu ma ltar brjod de/ /gang phyir rnam dpyad spyod yul min/ /rnam par dpyod pa rgya che'i phyir/ /'dir ni
238a1(mdo 'grel): bdag gi ma spros te/ /de yi don ni rtog ge dang/ /dbu ma'i bstan bcos dag na yod/ /chos dang gang zag dbye ba yis/ /bdag med rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/ /dbu ma la ni 'jug pa ru/ /zla grags zhabs kyis gsungs pa ni/ /
238a2(mdo 'grel): bdag med 'di ni 'gro ba rnam grol phyir/ /chos dang gang zag dbye bas rnam gnyis gsungs/ /de nyid rnam mang phye ste slar yang ni/ /de ltar gdul bya rnams la ston pas gsungs/ /spros dang bcas nas stong pa nyid/ /bcu drug bshad de mdor bsdus nas/ /
238a3(mdo 'grel): slar yang gzhi ru bshad pa ste/ /de dag theg pa chen por 'dod/ /gang phyir de yi rang bzhin de/ /yin phyir mig ni mig gis stong/ /de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce/ /lus dang yid kyang brjod par bya/ /ther zug gnas min 'jig min nyid/ /nye bar gzung ba'i ngo bo nyid
238a4(mdo 'grel): mig sogs drug po gang yin pa/ /nang stong nyid du de 'dod do/ /gang phyir de yi rang bzhin de/ /yin phyir gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong/ /de bzhin sgra ro dri dang chos/ /reg bya'i bar duAng shes par bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa dngos med pa/ /phyi rol stong pa nyid du 'dod
238a5(mdo 'grel): gnyi ga'i ngo bo stong pa ni/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yin no/ /chos rnams rang bzhin stong ba nyid/ /mkhas pas stong pa nyid ces brjod/ /stong nyid de yang stong pa ni/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngo bor 'dod/ /stong nyid stong pa nyid brjod pa/ /stong nyid stong pa nyid 'dod de/ /stong nyid dngos po'i blo
238a6(mdo 'grel): can gyi/ /'dzin pa bzlog phyir gsungs pa yin/ /sems can snod kyi 'jig rten ni/ /ma lus pa la khyab byed phyir/ /tshad med dpe med mu mdza' ni/ /med phyir phyogs rnams chen po nyid/ /phyogs rnams bcu nyid 'di dag kyang/ /phyogs rnams bcu nyid 'di dag kyang/ /phyogs kyi stong pa nyid de ni/ /chen po
238a7(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid du gsungs/ /chen por 'dzin pa bzlog phyir ro/ /de ni dgos pa mchog yin phyir/ /don dam mya ngan 'das pa yin/ /de ni de yis stong nyid gang/ /de ni don dam stong nyid de/ /myang 'das dngos blo can rnams kyi/ /dngos por 'dzin pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /don dam pa yi
238b1(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid/ /don dam mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin/ /rkyen las byung phyir khams gsum po/ /'dus byas yin par nges par brjod/ /de ni de yis stong nyid gang/ /de ni 'dus byas stong nyid gsungs/ /gang la skye gnas mi rtag nyid/ /de dag med pa 'dus ma byas/ /
238b2(mdo 'grel): de ni de yis stong nyid gang/ /'dus ma byas stong nyid du gsungs/ /gang la mdza' ni yong min pa/ /de ni mdza' las 'das par brjod/ /de ni de nyid kyis stong nyid/ /mdza' las 'das ba stong nyid brjod/ /thog ma dang po tha ma mdza' / /de dag med pas 'khor ba ni/ /
238b3(mdo 'grel): thog ma tha ma med par brjod/ /'gro 'od bral phyir rmi lam lta'i/ /srid 'di de yis dben nyid gang/ /de ni thog ma dang tha ma/ /med pa stong pa nyid do zhes/ /bstan bcos las ni des par brjod/ /dor ba zhes bya bkram pa de/ /btang ba la ni nges par brjod/ /de spangs dor
238b4(mdo 'grel): pa med pa ste/ /'ga' yang btang med gad de ni/ /dor ba med pa de nyid kyis/ /de nyid stong pa nyid gang yin/ /de phyir de la dor ba med/ /stong pa nyid ces des par brjod/ /slob ma rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ /byang sems de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /'dus
238b5(mdo 'grel): byas sogs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /gang phyir ma byas de phyir ni/ /'dus byas sogs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /rang bzhin du ni brjod pa ste/ /de nyid kyis de stong nyid gang/ /de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ /bco brgyad khams dang reg pa drug /de las skyes pa'i tshor ba drug /gzugs can
238b6(mdo 'grel): gzugs can min pa'i chos/ /de bzhin 'dus byas 'dus ma byas/ /gang yin de dag des dben phyir/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid/ /gzugs la sogs pa dngos med gang/ /de ni rang mtshan stong pa nyid/ /gzugs ni gzugs rung mtshan nyid do/ /tshor ba myod
238b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i mtshan nyid can/ /'du shes mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste/ /'du byed mngon par 'du byed pa/ /yul rnams so sor rig pa ni/ /rnam shes rang gi mtshan nyid do/ /phung po'i mtshan nyid sdug bsngal te/ /khams kyi mtshan nyid sprul gdug 'dod/ /skye ba'i sgor gyur skye mched de/ /
239a1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye mched gsungs/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung gang yin pa/ /rkyen tshogs pa yi mtshan nyid can/ /gtong ba sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /tshul khrims gdung ba med mtshan nyid/ /bzod pa khro med mtshan nyid de/ /
239a2(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus kha na ma tho med/ /bsam gtan sdud pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /shes rab ma chags mtshan nyid can/ /pha rol phyin pa drug rnams kyi/ /mtshan nyid 'di ni brtan pa yin/ /bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med rnams/ /gzhan yang gar dag gzugs
239a3(mdo 'grel): med pa/ /'di dag mi 'khrugs mtshan nyid du/ /yang dag mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin/ /sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub phyogs/ /des par 'byung byed rang mtshan nyid/ /stong pa nyid gang dben pa'i phyir/ /de yi mtshan nyid dmigs med 'di/ /de phyir mtshan pa
239a4(mdo 'grel): med pa ste/ /gsum pa'i nyid mtshan sdug bsngal dang/ /rmongs med rnam par thar pa yi/ /mtshan nyid rnam par grol ba'o/ /shin tu rnam par nges pa yi/ /ngo bor stobs rnams kyang brjod do/ /skyob pa mi 'jigs pa rnams ni/ /shin tu brtan pa'i ngo bo'o
239a5(mdo 'grel): so so yang dag rig rnams ni/ /spobs sogs tshad med mtshan nyid can/ /'gro la phan pa nyer sgrub pa/ /byams pa chen po nges par brjod/ /sdug bsngal can rnams yongs skyob pa/ /snying rje chen po'i dga' ba ni/ /rab dga' i mtshan nyid btang
239a6(mdo 'grel): snyoms ni/ /ma 'dres mtshan nyid can zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa/ /bcu dang brgyad du gang 'dod rnams/ /gang phyir ston pa des mi 'phrogs/ /de phyir mi 'phrogs mtshan nyid can/ /rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes ni/ /mngon sum mtshan nyid
239a7(mdo 'grel): can du 'dod/ /gzhan ni phyogs gcig pa yin phyir/ /mngon sum zhes byar mi 'dod do/ /'dus byas mtshan nyid gang yin dang/ /'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid gang/ /de de kho nas stong pa nyid/ /de ni rang mtshan stong pa nyid/ /da ltar 'di ni mi gnas shing/ /'das
239b1(mdo 'grel): dang ma 'ongs yong ma yin/ /gang du de dag mi dmigs pa/ /de ni mi dmigs pa zhes brjod/ /mi dmigs pa de rang ngo bo/ /de yis dben pa nyid gang de/ /ther zug gnas min 'jigs min pas/ /mi dmigs shes bya'i stong nyid/ /sbyor ba las gyur gzugs
239b2(mdo 'grel): rnams med/ /dngos po'i rkyen las byung ba'i phyir/ /rkyen las byung rnams de nyid kyis/ /stong pa dngos po stong pa nyid/ /dngos po'i sgra yis brjod pa ni/ /mdor bsdus phung po lnga rnams te/ /de rnams de yis stong nyid gong/ /de dngos stong pa nyid du bshad/ /mdor
239b3(mdo 'grel): bsdus na ni dngos med par/ /'dus ma byas chos rnams la brjod/ /de ni dngos po med de stong nyid/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/ /rang bzhin ngo bo nyid med ni/ /ngo bo nyid brjod stong nyid de/ /'di ltar rang bzhin ma byas pas/ /ngo bo nyid ces bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas
239b4(mdo 'grel): rnams ni byung yang rung/ /ma byung yang ni dngos po nyid/ /dngos po kun gyi stong pa nyid/ /gzhan gyi dngos po rab tu bsgrags/ /yang dag mdza' dang de bzhin nyid/ /gang de gzhan dngos stong pa nyid/ /shes rab pha rol phyin tshul las/ /de de dag ni rab tu bsgrags/ /'di ni
239b5(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las bdag med pa brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //thog ma med dang nyon mongs kyis/ /'dus byas phung po mtshan nyid de/ /thog ma med pa'i srid 'khor lor/ /rgyun du yongs su 'khor ba ste/ /dpal ldan dbyig gnyen zhabs kyis
239b6(mdo 'grel): ni/ chos mngon mdzod du gsungs pa ni/ /bdag med phung po tsam nyid de/ /nyon mongs las kyis mngon 'dus byas/ /srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis ni/ /mar me bzhin du mngal du 'gro/ /ji ltar 'phangs bzhin rim gyis rgyun/ /skyes nas las dang nyon mongs kyis/ /'jig
239b7(mdo 'grel): rten pha rol dag tu 'gro/ /srid pa'i 'khor lo thog ma med/ /de ni rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i/ /yan lag bcu gnyis cha gsum mo/ /sngon dang phyi mar gnyis gnyis dang/ /bar du brgyad yongs rdzogs ldan la/ /sngon skabs nyon mongs ma rigs pa/ 'du byed dag ni sngon las
240a1(mdo 'grel): kyi/ rnam shes mtshams sbyor phung po yin/ /mid dang gzugs ni de phan chad/ /skye mched drug dod tshun chad do/ /de ni gsum dus tshun chad do/ /reg pa bde sdug la sogs kyi/ /rgyu shes nus pa tshun chad do/ /tshor 'khrig
240a2(mdo 'grel): tshun chad sred pa ni/ /longs spyod 'khrig pa'i chags can gyi/ /nye bar len pa longs spyod rnams/ /theb par bya phyir yongs rgyug pa'i/ /de srid 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /las byed gang yin de srid pa/ /nyid mtshams sbyor ba skye ba yin/ /tshor ba'i bar ni rga shi
240a3(mdo 'grel): yin/ 'di ni gnas skabs bar 'dod la/ /gtso bo'i phyir ni yan lag bsgrags/ /sngon dang phyi mdza' bar dag la/ /rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro/ /nyon mongs gsum po las gnyis so/ /bzhi bdun de bzhin 'bras bu yin/ /gnyis kyi rgyu 'bras mdor sdus pa/ /
240a4(mdo 'grel): bar ma'i rjes su dpag pa las/ /nyon mongs pa las nyon mongs dang/ /bya ba nyid do de las bzhi/ /de las bzhi dang nyon mongs skye/ /'di ni srid pa'i yan lag lugs /'di ni rgyal pa'i lam la 'jug pa las rten 'brel gyi 'khor lo brjod pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad
240a5(mdo 'grel): pa'o// //'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams te/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung de bzhin du/ /sdug bsngal de yi 'gog pa dang/ /sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam/ /bden pa 'di rnams so sor yang/ /rnam pa bzhir ni des pa ste/ /thar pa
240a6(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas 'bad pa yis/ /'bad pas 'gyur ba bsgom par bya/ /sdug bsngal gyi ni bden pa yang/ /mi bdag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /rgyu ni rgyu dang kun 'byung dang/ /rab tu skye ba de bzhin rkyen/ /'gog pa'i 'gog dang zhi ba dang/ /gya nom pa dang nges 'byung
240a7(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ lam gyi lam dang rig pa dang/ /sgrub dang nges par 'byin pa'o/ /de ltar nyon mongs spangs bya'i phyir/ /'phags pa'i bden bzhi bsgom par bya/ /rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir/ /mi rtag skye dang 'jig pa nyid/ /sdug bsngal rjes su mi mthun phyir/ /zag pa
240b1(mdo 'grel): dang bcas dngos po ni/ /bdag med de dang mi ldan pa'o/ /rtags pa'i chos ni snyong pa'o/ /rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag ni/ /thar pa 'dod pas rtag shes bya/ /sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i phung po rnams/ /dga' ba'i bag chags yang dag 'byung/ /dga' la chags dad yang
240b2(mdo 'grel): dag ldan/ /sred dang sred pa'i byed pa po/ /rtag tu bden pa'i lam sgoms pas/ /de ni 'bad bas bzhom par bya/ /rgyu nge sa pon chos yin phyir/ /nang dang sdug bsngal bzhin nyid do/ /sdug bsngal yang dag skye de'i phyir/ /sdug bsngal kan 'byung nyid shes bya/ /gla bur
240b3(mdo 'grel): myong ba'i sdug bsngal la/ /'bras bu zhes ni mngon par brjod/ /rab tu sbyor ba 'brel sbyor nyid/ /de ni sdug bsngal zug rngu'i rgyur/ /mngon par brjod bya don gyis ni/ /rkyen ni chu bo'i chang ba nyid/ /'phel ba'i rgyu ni nyon mongs rnams/ /phral ba'i sbyor ba 'gog pa'o/ /
240b4(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal phung po dang bral bas/ /zhi ba zhes su mngon par brjod/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal bral ba dang/ /dge dang bde ba gya nom pa/ /nges par 'byung ba bdag med de/ /phan dang bde ba rjes su 'phel/ /yang na ma rig 'gog pas na/ /'gog pa yi ni bdag nyid do
240b5(mdo 'grel): zhi ba sdug bsngal yang dag zad/ /gya nom bde ba 'ba' zhig go /nges par 'byung bstong nyid segs/ /rnam thar bde ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /bdag dad bdag gi bas stong phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o/ /'dus byas kun gyi rgyu rnams ni/ /rnam par zhi ba mtshan ma
240b6(mdo 'grel): med/ smon pa med pa khams gsum ni/ /kun tu smon pa zad pa'o/ /las rnams mngon par 'dus byas te/ /dngos med mngon par 'dus ma byas/ /yang na 'khor ba'i phung po rnams/ /rgyu ni zad pa 'gog pa ste/ /zhi ba chags sogs nyon mongs pa/ /mi
240b7(mdo 'grel): bzad mi dpung zhi ba nyid/ /gnod ba kun las des grol zhing/ /bde ba mi zad gya nom pa'o/ /mi mthun phyogs kun nges grol ba/ /nges par 'byung bar rab tu grags/ /'di yis rgyal ba'i sras rnams ni/ /de nyid don tshol byed phyir lam/ /rigs pa yang ni mi
241a1(mdo 'grel): rigs pa'i/ /nyon mongs rnams kyi gnyen po ni/ /thob par byed pa sgrub pa ste/ /lam ni rnam par bsgom pa yis/ /rtag par phyin ci log zad byed/ /chags thogs med pa'i theg pa gang/ /nges 'byung yin te der 'byung ba/ /nges
241a2(mdo 'grel): par 'byin pa zhes brjod de/ /srid las shin tu 'byung phyir ro/ /yang na 'gro ba'i don gyis lam/ /rigs pa sbyor bas rigs pa'o/ /yang dag par ni thob byed pa'i/ /don gyis sgrub par rab tu brjod/ /'khor ba las ni yang dag par/ /'byung bas nges par 'byin
241a3(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /'di rnams bshad par gzhan yang ni/ /rnam par bzhag pa yod mod kyi/ /gzhung bsdus pa yi phyir na ni/ /ma sbyar bzod pa nyid du rigs/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhin po ni/ /kun tu de ltar brtag bsgom bya/ /'di ni nyan thos rang rgyal gyis/ /
241a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub lam gyi rjes 'brang ste/ /gzhan du srid mtsho'i sdug bsngal las/ /sus kyang pha rol bgrod pa med/ /'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi/ /ngo bo nyid med dmigs pa nyid/ /chags pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /byang chub sems dpas sgom par
241a5(mdo 'grel): bya/ /'phags pa'i bden bzhi'i rnam pa ni/ /rang gi rang bzhin bral ba nyid/ /ji lta par ni gsungs pa rnams/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bsgom par bya/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// //
241a6(mdo 'grel): 'on kyang mi mthun phyogs dang ni/ /gnyen po'i chos rnams nges pa ni/ /dam chos mnyan las gzhan du min/ /de bas dam chos mnyan par brjod/ /nyes pa thams cad spang phyir dang/ /kun mkhyen go 'phang thob byed pa'i/ /rgyu ni dam chos nyid yin te
241a7(mdo 'grel): de bas 'bad ba sa 'di nyan bya/ /dam chos 'bad pas mnyan byas nas/ /yang dag bsam zhing yongs su bsgom/ /sdug bsngal thams cad rnam grol ba/ /kun gyi bdag po rgyal bar 'gyur/ /shin tu gya nom gos dang ni/ /bza' ba dang ni stan dag dang/ /
241b1(mdo 'grel): bzhon pa 'am ni mal cha yis/ /rang gi lus ni bskyed mi bya/ /byas pa mi gzo sran mi thub/ /sdug bsngal kun gyi 'byung gnas te/ /lus ni dgra ste de don du/ /mkhas pa su zhig sdig pa byed/ /nad kun gyi rten gnod pa can/ /mi gtsang mdza' dag 'dus pa
241b2(mdo 'grel): ste/ shin tu dri nga'i bdag nyid can/ /rang dbang med pas 'jigs pa'i rgyu/ /glog dang mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin/ /g.yo zhing skad cig 'jig rang bzhin/ /'dod pas tshim med shes byas nas/ /mkhas pas 'di yi bsnyen bkur spangs/ /de yang 'tshol
241b3(mdo 'grel): tsam byin nas/ /'di ni yongs su skyang bar bya/ /rang gzhan bsod nams sogs la sogs/ /bsgrub phyir legs par 'tsho bar bya/ /dam chos 'dzin lus don med du/ /sdug bsngal nyid du mi bya ste/ /lus la brten nas srid pa yi/ /rgya mtsho las ni brgal
241b4(mdo 'grel): bar bya'o/ /ji srid 'chi ba ma byung zhing/ /blo ni rtogs par ma gyur pa/ /de srid blo ldan 'bad pa yis/ /yid ni chos la dga' par byed/ /'tsho ba thams cad brlag phyir dang/ /bde ba thams cad zad bya dang/ /sdug pa kun dang bral bya'i phyir/ /'chi ba mngon par
241b5(mdo 'grel): 'ong par 'gyur/ /mchog tu mi zad 'chi pa ni/ /thob nas shin tu bzlog dka' ste/ /de tshe chos las gzhan skyabs med/ /de bas chos la dga' bar bya/ /shi nas ngan song las skyobs pa/ /chos las mchog ni gang yang med/ /sdug pa'i bu dang chung ma
241b6(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /'brel pa yang ni shin tu ring/ /gang yang bdag dang bdag gis 'brel/ /sngon dang phyi mar gang dang na/ /gang la yang med par bgyi yang/ /tha snyang phyir na mi rig pa/ /de yang rang gis byas pa'i las/ /dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba/ /bde dang sdug bsngal
241b7(mdo 'grel): nyer spyod phyir/ /'khor dang mdza' dang mi mdza' med/ /de phyir bu dang chung ma sogs/ /shin tu zhen pa spang par bya/ /sdang la slar yang zhe sdang spang/ /dpen par chos ni bklag par bya/ /gal te 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mtshos/ /'jigs pa mi bzad yod na ni/ /chos
242a1(mdo 'grel): kyi blo ni bya ba ste/ /'di ltar bde ba thob par 'gyur/ /gang nyid skyes pa'i skye 'gro ni/ /de nyid 'chi bar nges pa ste/ /ji ltar nyin mo'i mdza' ru ni/ /mtshan mo cis kyang 'byung ba bzhin/ /ji srid 'chi ba ma byung ba/ /ji srid nyid du rab
242a2(mdo 'grel): 'bad nas/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas/ /chos bsam pa gnyid mchog tu brjod/ /sems ni kun tu dam chos la/ /mkhas bas zhen pa nyid du bya/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i yul tshogs las/ /'bad bas rab tu bzlog par bya/ /sems
242a3(mdo 'grel): ni kun tu rtag par ni/ /rang dag byas te blo can gyis/ /sems kyi dbang du 'gro mi bya/ /sems kyi dbang gyur dmyal bar ltung/ /bzlog par dka' zhing 'khrul pa dang/ /g.yo zhing dri ma can nyid gang/ /dam chos 'dzin pas g.yo med cing/ /dri ma med par
242a4(mdo 'grel): byas pa ste/ /bag chags kun dang bdud dang ni/ /mdza' dag dgra ni phan byed cing/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i grong gi lam/ /skyes bu dam pas sbyong ba nyid/ /sems kyi dbang gi las 'byung ste/ /las kyi dbang gi 'bras bu 'byung/ /sems kyi las las yang dag
242a5(mdo 'grel): 'byung/ /'khor ba zhes ni yongs su brjod/ /sdig dang bsod nams las dang na/ /de yi 'bras bu sems kyi byas/ /bde dang sdug bsngal gang cung zad/ /sems las gzhan pa'i byed pa med /bya ba thams cad sems dbang ste/ /'bras buAng sems kyi dbang du
242a6(mdo 'grel): shes/ ji ltar sems ni sna tshogs pa/ /de bzhin 'bras bu yang ni shes/ /ji ltar ri mo mkhan gcig gis/ /ri mo sna tshogs 'dri byed pa/ /de bzhin sems ni gcig gis kyang/ /sna tshogs srid pa'i las byed do/ /sems kyi sprul pa las yin te/ /las kyi sbrul pa
242a7(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba'o/ /las kyi sprul pa sdus pas ni/ /sa gnyis po ni bsdus par 'gyur/ /ji ltar sems ni sna tshogs pa/ /de las 'bras bu sna tshogs shes/ /'gro ba gsum po 'di dag kun/ /sems kyis bris pa nyid du dgongs/ /thog med ma rig pas bcings pa'i/ /
242b1(mdo 'grel): sems ni 'khor bar brjod pa ste/ /de nyid 'ba' zhig dag pa ste/ /mya ngan 'das 'chi med zhi ba'o/ /sems dang sems des sprul pa'o/ /bskyed pa yi ni khams gsum pa/ /sgyu ma lta bur rnam shes pa'i/ /blo dang ldan pa'i don dam nyid/ /des na de bzhin
242b2(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa yis/ /yang dag dam chos mnyan la 'bad/ /kun rtog thams cad bsdus nas ni/ /blo ldan gyis ni chos don bsgoms/ /'di ltar dam chos kun la ni/ /rtag par brdzun ni mi mthun nyid/ /srid sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs 'di la/ /blo dang ldan
242b3(mdo 'grel): pas de dag spang/ /bden dang mi ldan mi rnams ni/ /legs pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /'jig rten 'dir ni rtswa bzhin 'gro/ /pha rol ngan 'gro sdug bsngal nyid/ /gang zhig chos la mchog rton pa/ /gang du yang ni brdzun mi smra/ /mchod 'os yid
242b4(mdo 'grel): ches pa yi gnas/ /de yi ngag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /brdzun smra dag ni mi btsun zhing/ /shin tu skal ngan chung bar 'gyur/ /kha ni rul pa'i dri ma can/ /phyi nas 'gyod pas gdung bar 'gyur/ /'di ltar bden pa nyams pa na/ /de yi chos ni shin tu ring
242b5(mdo 'grel): chos ni nyams par byas pa yin/ /mdza' yas sdug bsngal rim par brgyud/ /ji tsam bsod nams ye shes tshogs/ /rtsa ba bden pa mchog tu 'dod/ /de las bzlog pa skyon du bzhed/ /bden pa mchog gzhan btsal mi bya/ /yul gzhan du ni 'gro mi
242b6(mdo 'grel): dgos/ /'jug ngogs rnams las 'jug ngogs mchog /chu yi bkad ba 'jug ngogs yin/ /sgron ma'i nang na sgron mchog tu/ /bden pa sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /sman gyi nang na de mchog ster/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed/ /
242b7(mdo 'grel): bden pa gnyis don 'di nyid du/ /dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /bden pa smra ba thob gyur pa/ /'khor ba'i 'ching ba las grol ba'o/ /rdzun dang phra ma tshig rtsub dang/ /ngag kyal pa ni smra ba ste/ /dmyal ba'i me dang khyad med pa'i/ /dag skyon de dag
243a1(mdo 'grel): spang bar bya/ /bden dang phan dang yid tshim dang/ /rgya chen don ni tshig nyung ba/ /skabs dang legs par 'brel pa dang/ /brjod bya 'byam por smra bar bya/ /chog shes pa dang rgyags min dang/ /sems can kun la phan? 'dod
243a2(mdo 'grel): cing/ chags par zhe sdang rnam grol pa'i/ /bya ba bsgrub par nges par gnas/ /mdza' dang mi mdza' dbye ba med/ /sems snyoms pa yis lus can ni/ /ngan song las ni rnam grol zhing/ /bsam pa'i don ni rab sgrub 'gyur/ sdom la gnas shing zhi
243a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /bla ma mchod la dga' ba dang/ /bya dang bya min cho ga shes/ /nan tan don ni rab tu 'grub/ /g.yo med shin tu brtson pa dang/ /rtag par dag ni yid 'ong dang/ /bsam gtan kha ton la chags pa'i/ /bya ba 'grub pa ring ba min/ /yul dang dus dang cho
243a4(mdo 'grel): ga shes/ /sgrub dang sgrub min bye brag shes/ /nus pa dang ni thabs dang ldan/ /dngos grub thams cad nya bar gnas/ /gzhan yang mi khros khro ba 'joms/ /bzod pas mi bzod yid 'joms te/ /chos kyis chos min nges par 'joms/ /'od zer gyis
243a5(mdo 'grel): ni mun pa 'joms/ /rdzun gyi tshig ni bden pas 'joms/ /phra ma ting nge 'dzin gyis te/ /tshig rtsub 'jam pa'i sems kyis so/ /dag kyal phan par smra nyid kyis/ /gsod pa byams pa bsgoms pas te/ /rku ba sbyin pas rtag tu rgyal/ /tshul bzhin ma yin yid
243a6(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /de kho na nyid bsgoms pas 'joms/ /ji ltar nyin mos mtshan mo bzhin/ /ma rig rig pas des par 'joms/ /dkar po'i phyogs kyis nag po yi/ /phyogs ni 'joms pa de bzhin du/ /'dod log spyod dang 'dod pa rnams/ /blo yis de nyid brtags
243a7(mdo 'grel): bas so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa'i lam gyis ni/ /las ngan pa rnams rtag par 'joms/ /mi 'jigs bzhi po de dag gis/ /nyam nga ba ni legs par spong/ /brjod des spod pa dran pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pas mi shes spong/ /me yis shing la byed bzhin
243b1(mdo 'grel): du/ yang dag gis 'joms yang dag min/ /'jig tshogs la ni lta pa kun/ /stong nyid bsgom pas 'joms pa'o/ /rtag par 'dzin pa rab 'joms pa/ /skad cig 'jig par bsgoms pas so/ /le lo'i gti mug 'phel pa kun/ /brtson 'grus kyis ni
243b2(mdo 'grel): 'joms pa'o/ /ye shes lhag ldan rtag par 'dul/ /skyes bu de nyid smra ba yis/ /rdzun smra ma rungs las can gyi/ /mi rnams nges par 'joms pa'o/ /mu stegs gya gyu'i bsam can kun/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni phan par mdzod/ /lha min lha yas phan pa
243b3(mdo 'grel): ste/ chos nyid kyis ni gnas pa yin/ /'di ni rgyal po'i lam la 'jug pa las dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la sogs brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //chags pa thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /sbyin pa btang te rnam pa bzhi/ /zang zing mi 'ji
243b4(mdo 'grel): chos dang ni/ /byams par brjod de la mar gsum/ /ji srid gang du chags gyur pa/ /de srid 'khor ba'i 'ching ba ste/ /chags pa thams cad spang don du/ /'di ltar sbyin pa sbyin par bya/ /gang zhig phyugs dang dbang phyug dang/ /nad med pa dang rgyal po ni/ /stobs kun dang
243b5(mdo 'grel): ni ldan pa dang/ /skal bzang tshe ring gyur pa ni/ /de ni sbyin pa las byung 'bras/ /lha dang de bzhin mi rnams kyi/ /rab tu sbyin pa stobs kyi mchog /sbyin dang mi ldan ngang 'gror ltung/ /skyes bu kun gyi tha ma'o/ /'dod dang ser snas bcings pa rnams/ /bu dang chung ma'i
243b6(mdo 'grel): dbang du 'gro/ /bza' ba 'ba' zhig 'dod pas ni/ /mi dag? brlag nas 'gro ba ste/ /'dod pas bcings pa dgrol phyir dang/ /nga rgyal shing ni zad bya dang/ /sdig pa'i phung po gzhom bya la/ /rab tu sbyin pa stobs kyi mchog /sbyin pa mdun nas 'gro bste/ sbyin pa po ni de
243b7(mdo 'grel): rjes 'gro/ /lam ston pa ni sbyin pa'o/ /'jig rten pha rol rab 'gro ba'i/ /sbyin pa'i chu yis mi bkrus nas/ /tshul khrims rlabs kyis yod bsgos te/ ye shes kyis brgal dri ma med/ /sdug bsngal pha rol rab tu 'gro/ /skyes bu phan par 'dod pa yis/ /sgron ma
244a1(mdo 'grel): gsum ni rab brten bya/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims ye shes te/ /'di dag skyon rnams sel byed pa'o/ /sbyin pa ma byas ngo tsha yis/ /nyon mongs skyon gyis bslus pa rnams/ /lhar skyes nas kyang dman 'gyur te/ /de phyir sbyin pa
244a2(mdo 'grel): mchog tu 'gyur/ /sbyin pa rim gyis 'phel ldan pas/ /ser sna'i stobs ni spangs pa rnams/ /lha yi rtsed mo la gzhol zhing/ /sems ni tshim pa nyid du 'gyur/ /yi dags yang dag rab gzir ba'i/ /skres skom rang bzhin me gang yin/ /ser sna dgra yi 'bras
244a3(mdo 'grel): bur ni/ /thams cad sangs rgyas nyid kyis gsungs/ /snying rje'i mchog ldan gang zhig ni/ /sdug bsngal can la bde sbyin pa/ /sbyin pas de la bde bar 'gyur/ de phyir sbyin pa rab tu bsngags/ /sbyin pa 'jig rten sgron ma byed/ /gang du 'gro ba'i rjes su 'gro/ /
244a4(mdo 'grel): nyes pa zad pa'i tshig gi gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /ser sna'i sgra ni nges bcom par/ /byas nas sems ni legs bsgoms te/ /gang zhig sbyin pa rab gtong ba/ /de ni srid pa'i mtsho las brgal/ /dang po rtag tu sbyin pa sbyin/ /'bad
244a5(mdo 'grel): pas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya/ /sred pa ye shes kyis gzhom bya/ /lam 'di bde bar 'jug pa'i lam/ /ser sna dang ni ldan pa'i sems/ /rtag par kun tu de gzhom bya/ /bdag med bsgom pa goms pa yis/ /chags pa thams cad gzhom par bya/ /sbyin pa ma btang
244a6(mdo 'grel): bkres skom gyis/ /yi dags gnas su gdung bar 'gyur/ /sbyin pas chos dang ldan pa yi/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /sbyin pa'i sa la brten nas ni/ /tshul khrims srung rnams mkhas pa yin/ /tshul khrims ldan pa dus kyis ni/ /ye shes kyis ni yongs
244a7(mdo 'grel): su grol/ /sdug bsngal las 'byung lam du ni/ /'di ni thob pa rnams kyis bsngags/ /de ltar rig nas mkhas pas ni/ /rtag tu sbyin la dga' bar bya/ /sngon du bag med spyad pa gang/ /sbyin pa la sogs ma sbel ba/ /phyi nas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ /de ni rang sems
244b1(mdo 'grel): gdud bar 'gyur/ /sbyin pa byed min nor de ni/ /rtag par longs ni mi spyod pa/ /'bad pas yongs su bsrungs pa yis/ /nor de rnams ni chung zos 'gyur/ /bla ma'i tshogs la sbyin pa'i phyir/ /rtag tu nor ni spyod ber? pa'i/ /nor de mdzes par ltar yin/ /de las bzlog pa
244b2(mdo 'grel): rtswa dad mtshungs/ /stobs chud pa dang dul rnams las/ /sdig dang ma 'dres spyin byin na/ /sems can rnams kyi mig ji bzhin/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol na/ /sbyin pa mi yi 'jig rten du/ /byin pas dge bar 'gro ba'o/ /lha rnams sbyin pa mi gtong ste/ /'di ni 'bras bu'i
244b3(mdo 'grel): sa ru 'dod/ /mi rnams las kyis yin te/ /lha rnams 'bras bu'i sa yin no/ /las kyi dbang gi 'bras bu ste/ /rgyu med pa las 'bras bu yin/ /bsam gtan dang ni nyan pa spang/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims rnams spang zhing/ /rtsod dang rtsub dang rmongs pa yin/ /gson yang shi dang
244b4(mdo 'grel): mtshungs pa'o/ /gang zhig chos kyi rjes 'brang na/ /'jig rten 'dir ni srog dang bcas/ /rang gi thams cad rab byin pas/ /rtag par sems can don bya ste/ /sems can la gnod sbyin pa ni/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis mi bya'o/ /'jigs dang skrag dang ngo ches min /lam la re
244b5(mdo 'grel): bas sbyin mi bya/ /lhag bsam ma yin g.yo dang sgyu/ /rgyags dang bcas pas mi sbyin no/ /de yi 'bras bu spyod 'dod dang/ /brdzun dang rgod pa'i sems kyis min/ /bdag stod pa dang gzhan smod dang/ /khre dang zhe sdang gti mug dang/ /yid la gcags dang 'gyod pa dang/ /grags
244b6(mdo 'grel): dang bde pa'i bdun pas min/ /de ni sbyin pa byas nas kyang/ /sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su bsngo/ /khams gsum kun du khyab pa yi/ /bdag med pa ni yongs su bsgom/ /rgyu mthun 'bras bu rnam grol te/ /bdud kyi 'jigs pa kun bzlog pa'o/ /gcig tu ma nges kun khyab
244b7(mdo 'grel): pa/ sems can thams cad nyer 'gro ba'i/ /rnam thar bzhi ni yongs dag pa'i/ /tshangs gnas bzhi po bsgom par bya/ /nyon mongs kun dang bral byed cing/ /khyad par 'gro ba'i gzhung lam ste/ /mdza' med chad pa med pa yi/ /kun mkhyen ye shes byed pas so/ /ji ltar
245a1(mdo 'grel): gsungs pa'i skyon bral zhing/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i yon ldan/ /sbyin pa de ni mi bzad de/ /mi mthun phyogs kyi mi shigs so/ /rgya mtsho chen por chu khyor gang/ /blugs pa mi zad ji bzhin no/ /'di ni sbyin pa'i gtam mo/ /bde ba
245a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad thob bya dang/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bya'i phyir/ /mtho ris tshogs kyi byed pa po/ /tshul khrims rtag par bsrung bar bya/ /sdom dang sems can don kun byed/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ tshul khrims rnam pa gsum du grags/ /nyi ma'i
245a3(mdo 'grel): gnyen gyis gsal bar gsungs/ /nor gyi nang na tshul khrims mchog /'od nang nyi ma ji bzhin no/ /nor de spangs nas 'gro ba ste/ /tshul khrims nyid ni mdun nas 'gro/ /ji ltar nyi mas mun 'joms pa/ /de bzhin tshul khrims sdug bsngal 'joms/ /mthe ris
245a4(mdo 'grel): sod nams ljon shing kun brlag byed/ /rang bzhi
245a5(mdo 'grel): l bar byed/ /srid pa'i longs spyod phyir phyogs phyir/ /tshul khrims de ni mchog tu bsrung/ /de nyid 'jig rten phyi mar yang/ /tshul khrims nyid ni des rten 'gyur/ /tshul khrims kyis ni 'dir yang skyob/ /pha
245a6(mdo 'grel): rol tu yang ngan song sbyong/ /tshul khrims bde 'gro'i skas yin no/ /de bas tshul khrims lhag par spyod/ /tshul khrims me zad mdzod du 'gyur/ /tshul khrims mi zad bde ba'o/ /rgyal po chom rkun chu sogs kyis/ /tshul khrims nor ni 'phog mi nus/ /khrims kyis lus
245a7(mdo 'grel): sogs dge las rnams/ /nyon mongs med pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur/ /snyan dang skal bzang mchog tu 'di/ /bag yod shin tu 'od bzang dang/ /dri med srid la chags bral sogs/ /tshul khrims sangs rgyas kyis rab bsngags/ /'khro ba kun gyi spyod pa las/ /zhi
