245a8(mdo 'grel): dben thob par bya phyir ro/ /tshul khrims dam pa'i gos gyon pa/ /ngo tsha dang bcas skyes bu mchog /gzhan du gcer bur tha ma ste/ /dud 'gro dang mtshungs ngo tsha bral/ /yan lag lnga yi sgo nas ni/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag bya ste/ /bla mar gus shing nyan
245b1(mdo 'grel): par 'dod/ /dang pa shin tu bskyed par bya/ /kha na ma tho rdul tsam gyis/ /'jigs bas ma sbas tshul khrims so/ /theg pa gzhan la ma brten pas/ /ma nyams pa yi tshul khrims nyid/ /ma rungs mi bzad mi skye ba/ /skyon med pa yi tshul grims nyid/ /nyon mongs
245b2(mdo 'grel): skye bos ma bcings pa/ /de bzhin ma 'dres tshul khrims nyid/ /dben zhing lhang ma zhugs pa'i phyir/ /dkar po'i chos ni snum 'phel nyid/ /ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'gro ba'i phyir/ /smin pa yi ni tshul khrims nyid/ /mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa ni/ /kun la yang dag
245b3(mdo 'grel): bsngags pa'o/ /kun nas kha na ma tho ba/ /med phyir ma smad par brjod do/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis de/ /rnam par gzigs nas rab tu bsgrags/ /de dag la sogs rnam pa ni/ /drug cu rtsa lnga dag pa ni/ /tshul khrims phung po rnam par dag /'gyur zhing yongs su
245b4(mdo 'grel): mi bzad brjod/ /gzhung bsdus phyir na bdag gis ni/ /de dag thams ma bsdus so/ /tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rab rib kyis/ /bag med pa ni rnam par spyod/ /sdig pa byed cing ngan 'gro cher/ /rab tu lhung zhing 'jigs byed myong/ /de bas kun tu rab 'bang pas/ /
245b5(mdo 'grel): rgyal sras rnams kyis tshul khrims bsrungs/ /chos kun bdag med rnam bsgoms pas/ /theg pa chen po'i rjes su 'gro/ /srid pa'i longs spyod ma lus pa'i/ /gzung yul lus la sogs pa sdom/ /tshul khrims phung po rnam dag pas/ /rang bzhin med pa gsal bar
245b6(mdo 'grel): ldan/ /de nyid rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu/ /don ni thams cad sgrub pa po/ /de ni dpag med rnam pa ste/ /de ltar mdo ru bsdus te brjod/ /de bas kun tu rtog pa kun/ /rab tu bsdus la goms bya ste/ /gang phyir tshul khrims kun gyi ni/ /spros rnams 'dir ni 'dus
245b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba'o/ /de ni tshul khrims kyi gtam mo/ /khro ba'i me ni bzod dka' bas/ /bsod nams ljon shing kun brlag byed/ /rang bzhin lus sogs spong gdung pa/ /skal ba ngan pa'i rgyu gcig po/ /zhe sang las skyed khro ba dang/ /bon du 'dzin pa dgra chen po/ /gang zhig khong
246a1(mdo 'grel): khro la sogs kyis/ /dbang phyug gzhan la gnod byed de/ /gzhan gnod las skyes sdug bsngal ni/ /mi bzad shin tu bzod par dga' / /de ni sna tshogs tshul gyis ni/ /'bad pas bzod pa bsgom par bya/ /dpal ldan
246a2(mdo 'grel): zhi ba lhas gsungs pa/ /zhe sdang lta bu'i sdig ba med/ /bzod pa lta bu'i dka' thub med/ /de las bzod la nan tan du/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis bsgom par bya/ /bde gshegs sras kyis gshe ba la/ /slar yang gshe bar mi bya ste/ /sgra rnams sgra
246a3(mdo 'grel): snyan lta bur ni/ /yang dang yang du bsam par bya/ /rdeg pa la ni slar yang ni/ /'dis ni brdeg par mi bya ste/ /lus ni gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs par/ /mkhas pas yun ring yang dag bsam/ /khros la khro bar mi bya ste/ /sems ni sgyu ma dang
246a4(mdo 'grel): mtshungs zhes/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis ni/ /don dam pa la dmigs pas kyang/ /shin tu bzod pa 'byung ba yin/ /de yang chos rnams kun gyi ni/ /rang bzhin rnam par rig pa yis/ /ngo bo nyid med la bzod pa/ /mchog gi bzod pa
246a5(mdo 'grel): skye bar 'gyur/ /bzod pa khro ba'i sbrul gyi ni/ /nam mkha' lding gi gsang sngags mchog /khong khro'i rab rib mun pa ni/ /sel ba'i sman mchog bzod pa'o/ /dam chos nor ni nyams pa yis/ /'khor ba'i 'gro ba lnga po la/ /gang dag bzod nor rang bzhin
246a6(mdo 'grel): can/ sems can de rnams phyug por shes/ /skyes bu rnams la thar pa ston/ /'khor ba'i 'jigs pa sel ba po/ /mtho ris skyabs su gyur pa de/ /dmyal ba'i me ni brlag byed pa'o/ /bdud dgra kun gyi dpung stobs ni/ /rab tu 'joms byed rgyu yi mchog /
246a7(mdo 'grel): zhe sdang sogs kyi gnyen por ni/ /mkhas pas brtag tu bzod bsgom bya/ /sngag bsngal lhag bzod chos la ni/ /nges par sems dpa' i mchan nyid can/ /gzhan gyi gnod pa ji mi snyam/ /zhes bya bzod pa gsum du brjod/ /de bas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las
246b1(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba bsgral bar 'dod pa nyid/ /gzings dang 'dra ba'i bzod pa ni/ /bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis bsgom/ /'di ni bzod pa'i gtam mo/ /skyes bu kun gyi yang dag don/ /'grub ba'i rgyu yi brtson 'grus brtsam/ /kun tu brtson 'grus nyid med na/ /'dod pa cung
246b2(mdo 'grel): zad mi 'grub ste/ /le lo dang ni gnod spro dang/ /yi chad dang ni cung zad mchog /mi mthun phyogs te gzhom bya'i phyir/ /'di ltar brtson 'grus rnam bsgoms bya/ /brtson 'grus brgyad ni yang dag par/ /blang bar de bzhin gshegs par gsungs/ /de las
246b3(mdo 'grel): cung zhig yang dag drangs/ /mdor bsdus nas ni mngon par brjod/ /byang chub sems dpa' i go cha dang/ /gzhan don sogs la mchog 'gro dang/ /yang dag rnyed dang 'gro ba smin/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs mchog dang/ /shes rab ces bya nyid kyi tshogs/ /
246b4(mdo 'grel): yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos/ /yang dag blangs pa'i bsod nams tshogs/ /mi zad par ni yongs su brjod/ /de la go cha mi zad pa/ /de ni bskal pa la sogs pa/ /grangs med 'khor bar mi skyo nyid/ /sems can kun gyi rgyu yin phyir/ /bsod nams
246b5(mdo 'grel): ye shes tshogs gang yin/ /pha rol phyin pa mngon rdzogs byed/ /yang dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dam chos nyan dang 'dzin la sogs/ /dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma la/ /mchod dang nye bar gnas pa sogs/ /'di dag mi zad go cha ste/ /bskal pa la sogs
246b6(mdo 'grel): gangs med pa'o/ /'di lta'i bya ba rnams la ni/ /rab tu spro ste nam mkha' i bzhin/ /bskal pa'i sa mtshams yangs pa 'di/ /byang chub sems dpa' i brjod pa'o/ /go cha'i brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni lta phyir dang/ /dam pa'i chos ni mnyan phyir
246b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ sems can yongs min bya phyir dang/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thob bya'i phyir/ /khor yug chen po'i bar du ni/ /sa mtshams med par me mdag khengs/ /'jig rten khams su 'jug 'gro yang/ /yang dag spro ba brtan pa ste/ /rtag par brtson ba
247a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan don phyir/ /'gro ste mchog tu 'gro ba'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la byang chub sems/ /bsgom bya gsungs pa'i rim pas so/ /mchog tu 'gro ba'i brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/ /gang dag cung zad blangs pa yis/ /
247a2(mdo 'grel): bsod nams tshogs de bsngo bar bya/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bzhin du/ /byang chub bsngos de mi zad gsungs/ /sems can rnams ni byang chub la/ /dgod pa'i phyir ni yongs su bsngo/ /mi zad yang dag thob pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes par bya/ /
247a3(mdo 'grel): yang dag rnyed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/ /nyi ma re rer stong gsum gyi/ /stong chen du ni gtogs pa yi/ /'jig rten khams ni ji snyed pa/ /sems can gnas pa de yang ni/ /sna tshogs thabs kyi sangs rgyas ni/ /nyid du thub sras yongs smin byed/ /'di
247a4(mdo 'grel): ltar rim pas bskal pa ni/ /grangs med bye ba brgyar yod do/ /de lta mod kyi sems can khams/ /mdza' yas grangs med pa yi ni/ /stong gi cha yi cha gcig kyang/ /de ni yongs su smin ma gyur/ /rjes bstan 'di ltar thos nas kyang/ /de las mchog tu spro ba thob
247a5(mdo 'grel): mi zad yongs su smin pa ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' i yin par brjod/ /'gro ba smin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/ /ji snyed nam mkha' i mthar thug pa'i/ /'jig rten gsum na gnas pa yi/ /sems can de dag kun dang yang/ /slob pa rnams dang byang sems dang/ /
247a6(mdo 'grel): bse ru nyan thos byang chub ni/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa de kun gyi/ /bsod nams tshad ni ji tsam pa/ /de tsam bsod nams bcu 'gyur du bsags pa yi ni thub pa yi/ /ba spu'i bu ga gcig skye'o/ /de ltar ba spu'i bu ga rnams/ /thams cad skye ba'i dge ba
247a7(mdo 'grel): yis/ bsod nams brgya 'gyur dag las ni/ /dpe byad gcig ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpe byad thams cad bsdus pa yi/ /bsod nams phung pos mtshan yin te/ /stong phrag gcig tu bsdom pas ni/ /mtshan rnams kun gyi rgyu yin no/ /stong phrag bcu ni bsdom
247b1(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /thub pa'i mdzod pu gcig yin no/ /mdzod pu'i dge ba'i phung po ni/ /'bum gyis gtsug tor 'byung pa'o/ /bsod nams 'bum de bye bas ni/ /chos kyi dung ni rab tu skye/ /mi zad pa yi bsod nams tshogs/ /brtson chen thub pas gsung pa nyid/ /de smed? par
247b2(mdo 'grel): ni che spro ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' la skye'o/ /bsod nams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/ /stong gsum 'jig rten khams kyi ni/ /sems can dad rjes 'brang gyur par/ /yongs su brtag pa nyer bzung ste/ /thams cad 'di ltar gyur kyang ni/ /chos kyi rjes 'brang rtogs pa
247b3(mdo 'grel): yi/ cha dang dpe yis bstan mi bzod/ /de bzhin du ni ji srid du/ /sa bcu'i yi shes bthob pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang ni/ /gnas min mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi ni/ /de dag kun kyi cha dang ni/ /dpe bstan par yang nye mi 'gyur/ /de ltar mi bzhin
247b4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas chos/ /ma 'dres pa ni thams cad la/ /'jug cing de rnams la yang ni/ /tsher spro ba yang mi zad pa'o/ /de yang ye shes tshogs kyi ni/ /brtson 'grus brtson pa brjod pa nyid/ /'di dag byang sems ma gtogs pa/ /gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod yul
247b5(mdo 'grel): yin/ ye shes kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/ /rgya chen nam mkha' kun gnas pa'i/ /dus gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /kun gyi sems kyi spyod pa ni/ /gang gi kun du shes 'gyur ba/ /de ltar shes rab kyi ni tshogs/ /blo ldan byang chub sems
247b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' yis/ /thob par bya ba de ni yang/ /spro ba chen po skye bar 'gyur/ /shes rab kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so/ /dge pa'i rtsa ba'i tshegs gang gi /byang chub sems la sogs bsdus pa/ /sems ni dang po nas brtsams nas/ /byang chub snying po yin bar/ /bsags
247b7(mdo 'grel): ste yang dag gzungs rnams dang/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kun/ /yang dag blangs pa'i chegs de ni/ /mi bzad yang dag blangs par brjod/ /yang dag blangs pa'i tshog gis so/ /brtson 'grus 'di kun mdza' dag la/ /chos kyi bdag med bsgoms pa nyid/
248a1(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' bzhin du rnam dag 'gyur/ /gzhan du lta ba ldan pas min/ /'gro kun ngo bo nyid med pas/ /dbang po drug ni rab bsdus nas/ /zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /'di de rtag par bsgom pa'o/ /'di ni brtson
248a2(mdo 'grel): 'grus kyi gtam mo/ /skyon rnams sel pa'i bsam gtan dang/ /de bzhin gnas pa'i bsam gtan mchog /dbang 'byor dang gsum shes par bya/ /tshangs pa'i bde ba rab sgrub pa'o/ /rtog dang dpyod dang dga' ba dang/ /bde dang rtse gcig sems dang ni/ /
248a3(mdo 'grel): yan lag lnga po 'di dag ldan/ /bsam gtan dang po rab tu skye/ /nang ni yongs su dang ba dang/ /dga' dang bde ba rtse gcig sems/ /rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag ldan/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa la gnas gsungs/ /btang snyoms dang ni dran pa dang/ /shes bzhin
248a4(mdo 'grel): bde ba rtse gcig sems/ /yan lag lnga po 'di dag ldan/ /bsam gtan gsum pa nyid du 'gyur/ /btang snyoms dran ldan sdug bsngal min/ /bde min pa ni myong ba ste/ /rtse gcig sems ldan yan lag ni/ /bzhi ldan bsam gtan tha ma'o/ /yang na
248a5(mdo 'grel): gzugs sogs spyod yul gyis/ /g.yang byed 'dod pa'i sdig chos ni/ /bzod dka' de rnams spangs pa yis/ /dben pa'i bsam gtan dang po ste/ /rtog dang dpyod pa gnyis po yis/ /shin tu dben pa las skyes pa'i/ /dga' dang bde ba mtshungs ldan pa/
248a6(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan dang po mnyam par bzhag /bsam gtan dang po'i rjes mthun gang/ /rtog pa nye bar brtags pa dang/ /shes dang mthong dang dpyod pa nyid/ /don gcig pa yi tshig rnams so/ /brtags pa de nyid la spyod dang/ /yongs su sbyor dang rjes su 'gro/ /'jug dang
248a7(mdo 'grel): rnam dpyod kyang don gcig /gnas pa nye bar rdzogs pa ste/ /yang dag myong ba legs skyong ba'o/ /de la gnas nas mthong ba'i lam/ /thob par 'dod pa'i 'dun pa 'thob/ /mthong lam 'dun pa thob nas ni/ /sngar gyi bsam gtan la mi chags/ /dang po las ni khyad
248b1(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i/ /bsam gtan gnyis ba tshol bar byed/ /rtog pa dang ni dpyod pa yi/ /sgrib pa rab tu 'joms pa yi/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa thob pa ni/ /nang yongs dang zhing sems kyi rgyun/ /gcig tu gyur pa'i blo de ni/ /dga' zhing bde pa'i bdag nyid do/ /rtog dpyod nye
248b2(mdo 'grel): bar zhi ba dang/ /nad ni yongs su dang bar gyur/ /rgyun ni gcig tu 'gyur zhes pa/ /'di yang ro nyams gyur ba yi/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i chu bzhin du/ /ti nge 'dzin gyi ro gcig 'gyur/ /dga' ba dkon mchog gsum la ste/ /de phyir de ni dben skyes bde/ /bsam gtan
248b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa thob nas ni/ /de la gnas na slar yang ni/ /mi skye'i chos la bzod pa ni/ /thob par bya phyir thams cad du/ /'dun pa skye bo de nas ni/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa yid skyo nas/ /bsam gtan nge bas bla med pa'i/ /bsam gtan gsum pa de tshol byed/ /bsam
248b4(mdo 'grel): gtan gnyis pa'i sgrib pa ni/ /dga' ba yin te de spangs nas/ /bsam gtan gsum pa thob pa ni/ /de bzhin dga' med bde ba'o/ /de bas bsam du med 'di dag /dga' ba med pa'i bde ba brjod/ /'di dag mchog gyur ma yin te/ /zad pa'i chos phyir de las yang/
248b5(mdo 'grel): mi skye'i chos la bzod pa ni/ /thob par bya phyir de bzhin du/ /'dun pa drag mchog mi bzad pa/ /blo ldan rnams la skye pa nyid/ /de ni bde yang ma chags pas/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa thob 'gyur te/ /btang snyoms dran pa yongs su dag /sdug min bde min zhi ba'o/ /
248b6(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan 'di dag snyoms 'jug pas/ /de yi sems ni 'jam par 'gyur/ /dga' zhing shin tu dul ba ste/ /brtan zhing drang la 'od gsal ba/ /lus can rnams kyi phan bde ba/ /skyed la rab tu zhugs pa yi/ /skye ba med pa'i chos la ni/ /bzod pa snad ba skye
248b7(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /de nas mchog tu lhun grub cing/ /shin tu sbyangs pa'i lam la 'jug /nyan thos la sogs lam dang ni/ /bsam gtan thun mong ba ru brjod/ /zag med rnam pa bcu drug rnams/ /byang chub sems dpa' i ma 'dres pa'o/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin
249a1(mdo 'grel): gsungs pa/ /nyan thos sogs kyi spyod yul min/ /gzhung ni yang dag bsdus pa'i phyir/ /'dir ni lung las ma bsdebs so/ /'di ni bsam gtan gyi gtam mo// //thos bsam sgom las 'khrungs pa yi/ /shes rab
249a2(mdo 'grel): gsal bar thar pa'i blo/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam bcom pas/ /gnyis med ye shes snang ba ste/ /gcig dang du ma las nges grol/ /dngos dang dngos min rnam par spangs/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu las 'das pa/ /mtshan bzhi mtshan nyid las grol ba/ /dus
249a3(mdo 'grel): gsum khams gsum shin tu 'das/ /kun rtog rten ni nges par spang/ /spros pa nyer zhi zhi ba ste/ /dag cing shin tu dri ma med/ /gnod pa med cing yang dag don/ /don dam pa yi ngo bo nyid/ /ma lus chos kyi bdag med kyi/ /ye shes shes rab 'dras
249a4(mdo 'grel): bu'i bdag /'di ni shes rab kyi gtam mo// //rang gi skyon ni gzhom pa dang/ /sems can thams cad la ma gzhug dang/ /myur du bde ba mngon rtogs byed/ /thabs ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /'di ni thabs kyi gtam mo// //smon
249a5(mdo 'grel): lam dbye pa gsum zhes pa/ /rang gi tshogs rgyun mi chad dang/ /'gro ba'i don gyi rgyu dang ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam spyod ba'o/ /zhes pa ni smon lam gyi gtam mo// //las kyi zlog par byed pa dang/ /nyon mongs pa ni sel ba dang/ /rgol ba dang ni
249a6(mdo 'grel): bdud dgra kun/ /bzlog pa'i stobs dang gsum zhes gsungs zhes pa 'di ni stobs kyi gtam mo// //rtog dang rtog med mnyam nyid du/ /sna dang rnam par mi rtog dang/ /sems can don thabs nges snang ste/ /ye shes gsum du dbye ba'o/ /zhas pa ni
249a7(mdo 'grel): ye shes kyi gtam mo// //sbyin pa la sogs 'di dag rnams/ /byang chub sems ni sngon 'gro bas/ /byams pa'i bsam pa mngon bsgoms rnams/ /slar yang phar phyin 'jig rten pa/ /'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams so/ /dmigs ba'i yul ni gsum po rnams
249b1(mdo 'grel): chos kyi bdag med bsgoms pa yis/ /de rnams 'jig rten 'das par shes/ /de nyid rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so/ /byams pa'i bsam pa khyad med kyang/ /chos kyi bdag med dang ldan pa'i/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin sogs
249b2(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /yongs dag pa yi khyad par ro/ /'di ni sa rnams kyi khyad par gyi rgyu'o/ /sbyin pas rab dga' i rnal 'byor te/ /tshul khrims ldan pas dri med 'gyur/ /bzod pas 'od byed brtson 'grus kyis/ /'od 'phro 'di ni bsod nams ldan/ /bsod nams las ni sbyang
249b3(mdo 'grel): dka' ba/ /shes rab kyis ni mngon 'gyur mthong/ /ring du song ba thabs chen pos/ /stobs dang ldan pas mi g.yor 'gyur/ /smon lam gyis ni legs blo can/ /ye shes ldan pas chos kyi sprin/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu po ni/ /dag pa'i rim pas sa bcu'o/ /gzhan
249b4(mdo 'grel): yang 'dir/ /las kyi rdzu 'phrul sems dang tshe/ /bsod nams ye shes yo byad dang/ /chos dang ye shes dbang phyug nyid/ /stobs kyang bcu ste nan tan dang/ /spobs dang dad dang thos dang sgom/ /yongs dag so sor brtag pa dang/ /bsod nams ye shes bzod pa'o
249b5(mdo 'grel): 'di ni dbang bcu stobs bcu dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o/ /sa 'di rnams kyi dmigs pa ni/ /khyad par med stong nyid do/ /chos dang gang zag bdag med kyi/ /mtshan nyid de bzhin gnyis med pa'o/ /de dang de yi rtog
249b6(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /gzhom phyir de yi ngo bo dgongs/ /dngos su rtog pa'i dbye ba yis/ /rnam pa mdza' yas rnam par smin/ /'di ni rgyal pa'i lam la 'jug pa las pha rol tu phyin pa bcu 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //blang bya dang ni dor bya'i cha/ /
249b7(mdo 'grel): 'di ni mngon du shes dang ni/ /da dung ye shes sar 'jug phyir/ /cho ga yang dag rab bstan bya/ /de la 'jug pa mi sdug dang/ /dbugs rngub 'byung ba dran pa ste/ /de la chags can mi sdug pas/ /chags pa yongs su zad par byed/ /chags pa kha dog dbyibs dang ni rag bya'i dri
250a1(mdo 'grel): sogs yul yin no/ /mi sdug goms pas de zad de/ zhi gnas yang dag 'byung ba'o/ /rang lus sha dang rul dang zags/ /rul ba'i dra ba tsam du bsam/ /de ni rim pas 'phel nas ni/ /sa ni gang pa nyid du lta/ /dad mos 'phel phyir
250a2(mdo 'grel): 'di gsungs te/ /slar yang de bzhin bsdus nas ni/ /rang nyid la ni bsgom bya ste/ /rul pa yi ni lug rgyud du'o/ /bsgom pa'i dngos po gsal pa na/ /las dang po ni rdzogs pa'o/ /keng rus dang ni thod phyed par/ /btang pas sbyang pa byas par bshad/ /shin
250a3(mdo 'grel): tu 'das nas yid byed pa/ /smin mtshams dkyil du sems bzung bya/ /rnam par spel dang sdu ba yi/ /rim pa nyid ni rnam par bsgom/ /mi sdug rnam gsum gsungs pa ni/ /dman dang 'bring sogs dbye ba nyid/ /mi 'dong bdag nyid rang bzhin ni/ /de ni
250a4(mdo 'grel): chags pa'i gnyen po ste/ /mi sdug bsgom pa gsum pa'o/ /'di ltar lus pa yang dag brtag so dang skra dang sen mo skye/ /khrag dang pags pa sha dang ni/ /rdul dang tshil dang zhag chu ser/ /rgyus pa rkang dang mcher pa dang/ /snying rus mkhris glo mchin pa dang
250a5(mdo 'grel): pho ba rgyu ma zhag dang ni/ /glad pa dang ni mig rnag dang/ /phyis dang ni bad kan dang/ /rnabs dang mchi ma gcin dang ni/ /mchil ma dang ni khu ba dang/ /srin bu rnag sogs de dag gi/ phung po la ni lus zhes brjod/ /dri ma ngan dang mi sdug dang/ /rang dbang med pa'i
250a6(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin nyid/ /mngon sum mi gtsang bsdus pa 'i/ /son med kun gyi snod yin no/ /'di la chags te bzlog dka' ba/ /ma rig pas bsgribs ya mtshan che/ /ga bur la sogs dri bzangs dang/ /gang dang 'grogs pas brlag par 'gyur/ /'di ltar dur khrongs
250a7(mdo 'grel): dbus su/ /song nas shi pa'i ro la ni/ /blta zhing rang gi gnyen gyis slong/ /gzhan yang 'jigs pa byed pas so/ /rlung gis shin tu g.yengs pa ste/ /rnam par bsngos shid rnam par gzegs/ /phyed zos pa dang 'bu yis ni/ /rab tu mngon par gzhig pa nyid
250b1(mdo 'grel): sha med rnam par gtsigs pa dang/ /rus pa keng rus rang bzhin nyid/ /rnam par 'thor ba mthong nas ni/ /mkhas pas rang gi lus dang mnyam/ /de ltar mi sdug yang dag par/ /bsgoms pa yis ni mi 'chags 'gyur/ /de yis zhi gnas rdzogs pa
250b2(mdo 'grel): ste/ /de ni bsgom pI snod yin no/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las mi sdug pa bsgom pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //rtog dpyod mang na dbugs rngub dang/ /dbugs 'byung dran pas brtan par bya/ /thams cad du ni sems
250b3(mdo 'grel): bsdus te/ /de bas srog la dmigs pa mchog/ 'jug pa 'am ni 'byung ba yi/ /srog gi rlung ni bgrang bar bya/ /dran pa tsam du gcig la sogs/ /gcig bcu'i mthar bgrang slar de bzhin/ /gal te bar du g.yengs na ni/ /slar yang de ni bgrang bar bya/ /
250b4(mdo 'grel): sems ni 'dus dang g.yengs pa dang/ /chang dang lhag pas ma yin no/ /yang na dbugs 'byung la sogs rung/ /'gro ba rtag tu rjes 'gro bya/ /ji tsam ring bar 'jug pa dang/ /'byung ba yang ni sems kyis brtag/ gzhag pa zhes bya sna rtse ni/ /rkang sor mthar ni
250b5(mdo 'grel): yang dag gnas/ /nor bu'i thag pa bzhin du ni/ /rtse gcig sems kyis bsam par bya/ /ci 'di rjes su mthun pa 'am/ /nye bar 'joms pa'i rlung rnams zhes/ /dbugs rngub 'byung pa dran pa bsgom/ /zhi gnam dang ni nad med rgyu/ /bgrang dang rjes 'gro 'jog pa
250b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ rtog pa dang ni bsgyur pa dang/ /yongs su dag dang drug 'di ni/ /dbugs rdub dbugs 'byung dran par 'dod/ /'dir ni gzhung bsdus 'dod pas ni/ /rnam pa gsum ni rnam par phye/ /drug po rnams las gang rung bas/ /yang dag 'dod don 'grub pa yin/ /
250b7(mdo 'grel): 'di ni rgyal bing? lam la 'jug pa las dbugs 'jug pa dang 'byung /pa dang bgrang pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //zhi gnas rdzogs par byas pa las/ /dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom pa ni/ /lus dang tshor ba sems dang chos/ /mtshan yid bral
251a1(mdo 'grel): ba yongs su bsgom/ /lus 'di yang ni brtags pa tsam/ /don de bzhin du brten pa med/ /yul gcig na med thams cad kyi/ /cha la yang ni ma gnas so/ /lag pa la sogs gcig la yang/ /lus kyi blo ni kye mi 'gyur/ /cha
251a2(mdo 'grel): shas las gzhan lus kyi blo/ /gang la nges pa skye mi 'gyur/ /cha shas rnams ni lus nyid na/ /'di dag ma lus lus su 'gyur/ /phyogs kyi cha yis rnam phye bas/ /phra rab rdul yang cha dang ldan/ /cha ji snyed ni gcig min te/ /de bas du ma nyid kyi min/ /gcig
251a3(mdo 'grel): dang du ma rnam bral gang/ /dngos med nam mkha' i me tog bzhin/ /drug gis cig car sbyar ba na/ /phra rab rdul yang drug char 'gyur/ /drug po dag ni go gcig na/ /gong bu rdul phran tsam du 'gyur/ /de bas na ni ngo bo nyid/ /med kyang lus kyi blo skye dang/ /
251a4(mdo 'grel): thog med ma rig pa las 'byung/ /'jig tshogs lta bar rab tu skye/ /lus mi srid na mig la sogs/ /srid pa yang ni shin tu ring/ /de phyir mig sogs 'dus reg las/ /'byung ba'i tshor ba ga la yod/ /gzung bya'i dngos med sems de med/ /de phyir
251a5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa po mi srid/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa nges grol na/ /slar yang 'dzin pa ga la zhig/ rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba yi/ /phung po skye mched khams rnams ni/ /rten cing 'brel pa'i spyod yul rnams/ /thams cad skye med ngo bo nyid/ /dngos po rang las ma
251a6(mdo 'grel): skyes te/ /ngon med phyir te de mi sring/ /rdzogs par skye bar 'gyur ba ni/ /slar yang rgyu nyid du ni 'gyur/ /gang tshe rgyu nyid 'bras bu na/ /de yi rgyu ni so so ru/ /kha dog dbyibs dang ro nus pa/ /rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro/ /snga ma'i gzugs ni yongs spangs
251a7(mdo 'grel): nas/ phyi ma'i gzugs ni yongs 'dzin pa/ /de yi de nyid ji ltar yin/ /de phyir rang nyid las mi skye/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis gcig par/ /'jig rten pa yang mi rtog go /gang phyir rgyu de nyams nas kyang/ /'bras bur gsal ba ma mthong ste/ /de bas 'jig rten
251b1(mdo 'grel): du mi rigs/ /de kho na nyid du yang min/ /rang las skyes pa'i phyogs 'di ni/ /dpag tu med pa'i skyon du 'gyur/ /gzhan las kyang ni mi skye ste/ /gzhan nyid la ni khyad med na/ /dngos po kun las dngos po kun/ /skye ba du ni 'gyur ba'o/ /gang las gang ni skye bar
251b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /rjes su 'gro las ldog pa dang/ /pha rol nyid las khyad med kyang/ /gang las gang ni skye 'gyur ba/ /de nyid de yi rgyu yin na/ /gang las de nyid skye 'gyur ba/ /de dag nyid ni gang na ste/ /gang ste mthong phyir zhe na min/ /gang phyir sgyu mas ma nges nyid/ /shU? lug
251b3(mdo 'grel): sogs las kyang ni/ /shA luka skyes ci las kyang/ /skye mthong rwa las mda' mthong ste/ /sa dag pa las pad+ma'o/ /rang nyid grub nas gzhan 'byung ste/ /gzhan grub nas ni rang nyid 'dod/ /de gnyis bltos nas grub pa ste/ /pha rol tshu rol bzhin du du gsungs so/ /
251b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis ka las kyang skye min te/ /skyon ni gnyis ka 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rgyu med las kyang rigs min te/ /kun tu rab tu thal 'gyur te/ /rgyu gzhan la ni mi bltos phyir/ /rtag tu yod dang med par 'gyur/ /bltos pa yi ni dngos po rnams/ /ras 'ga' ba nyid du ni 'gyur/
251b5(mdo 'grel): dngos rnams yod pa skye min te/ /rang nyid thob phyir don med nyid/ /skyes pa yang ni skye ba na/ /de ni thug pa med par 'gyur/ /dngos rnams med pa skye min te/ /ri bong rwa sogs ji bzhin no/ /thams cad nyid las 'di dag kun/ /rtag par skye bar rab tu thal/ /yod dang med
251b6(mdo 'grel): las mi skye ste/ /'gal pa'i phyir na mi srid do/ /gnyis ka min las mi skye ste/ /de lta'i don mi srid phyir ro/ /lus la sogs rnams ji tsam bzhin/ /dbu ma rtsa ba la sogs su/ /gsungs pa gang de yongs shes bya/ /bsdus pa'i phyir na 'dir ma brjod/ /gang gang cung zad gang gi tshe
251b7(mdo 'grel): gang du de ltar nyid snang pa/ /de kun de tshe de ru ni/ /de lta nyid du rab tu med/ /de phyir gang la gang gzugs kyi/ /ji srid cung zad rab rtogs na/ /de yi gzugs kyis de stong ste/ /sgyu ma'i grong khyer sprul bzhin no/ /'di ltar lus la sogs pa ni/ /ngo bo nyid med rnam bsgoms pas/ /
252a1(mdo 'grel): de la ngo bo nyid med pa'i/ /rang bzhin nyid du dran pa skye/ /thos bsam sogs kyi shes rab ni/ /dran pa'o de las nye bar 'jog/ nye bar gzhag pa'o lus la sogs/ /'di dag dbye ba rnam pa bzhi/ /phyin ci log ni bzhi po yi/ /gnyen
252a2(mdo 'grel): po yi ni ngo bo nyid/ /gtsang sogs 'khrul pa gzhom pa nyid/ /bzhi po 'di dag dbye ba'o/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i dran nyer gzhag /bsgoms pa byas te legs par gnas/ /mdor na lus la sogs pa ni/ /mi rtag sogs su blta bar bya/ /de nas drod du 'gyur
252a3(mdo 'grel): zhes pa'i/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal la sogs bden bzhi ni/ /rnam pa bcu drug spyod yul lo/ /gtsub shing gtsubs pa la sogs pas/ /ji ltar phyi rol mi 'byung bzhin/ /yang dag shes pa'i me las ni/ /'byung ba'i rtags ni dang por
252a4(mdo 'grel): brjod/ /mngon shes la sogs bcos pa yi/ /rnam pa nye bar mtshon pa ste/ /lus sogs las su rung dang zhi/ /mngon par shes sogs yon tan yang/ /chud dang 'bring dang chen po ste/ /de ni rim pas skye bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor shin tu dang pa yis/ /bden
252a5(mdo 'grel): pa nyid du shing tu bsgoms/ /de las de yi mi mthun phyogs/ /skyes pa rnams ni spong bar byed/ /slar yang de dag mi skyed cing/ /kun tu skyes pa 'joms par byed/ /gnyen po'i phyogs rnams ma skyes pa/ /bskyed phyir yang dag 'bad par byed/ /skyes pa rnams ni nan
252a6(mdo 'grel): tan gyis/ /bsrung zhing yongs su 'phel bar byed/ /'dun pa bskyed cing brtson 'grus ni/ /rtsom ste thub pa'i sras kyis so/ /brtan pas yang dag spong ba ni/ /bzhi po 'di dag bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rtse mor gyur zhes pa'i/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur/ /de 'phel ba las
252a7(mdo 'grel): skyes de ni/ /spong ba'i brtson 'grus ldan pa zhes/ /gsungs pa'i brtson 'grus can la ni/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa 'di dag 'byung/ /'dun dong brtson 'grus sems dang ni/ /spyod pa'i ting 'dzin 'di dag go /'dun pa drag po'i stobs ldan pas/ /dge ba'i chos ni rnam bsgoms pas
252b1(mdo 'grel): de la rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ /ting 'dzin nye bar skye bar 'gyur/ /yang dag spong ba'i brtson 'grus de/ /yang dag ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de yi bdag rkyen brtson 'grus kyi/ /ting 'dzin nye bar skye bar 'gyur/ /sems skyod ldan pa yi ni sems/ /de kho na nyid gcig
252b2(mdo 'grel): bu'i sems/ /sems ni bdag pos ma skyes par/ /de la ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur/ /da lta bdag la sdag pa'i chos/ /yod pa nyid dam 'on te med/ /dpyod pa zhes pa'i ting 'dzin gyi/ /rgyal por sems ni rtse gcig 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi/ /rang?
252b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i rgya dang rkyen rnams so/ /rdzu 'phrul rkad pa bzhi po dag/ gsungs pa 'di dag ting 'dzin te/ /'di las bzod par 'gyur zhes pa'i/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshags pas yang dag bstan/ /chos kun mngon par 'dod par 'gyur/ /bzad thob ngen sod mi
252b4(mdo 'grel): 'gro zhing/ /rgyal bas byang chub lung ston 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sras ni sems bskyed nas/ /grangs med bskal pas nges 'byung 'gyur/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang/ /de bzhin ting 'dzin shes rab bcas/ /dbang po lnga ste mthong lam gyi/ /skyed pa yi ni bdag po nyid/ /
252b5(mdo 'grel): bden dang dkon mchog dge sogs la/ /dad dang ye shes bdag nyid de/ de yang rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /dang dang yod nyid nus pa nyid/ /le lo don med brtson pa dang/ /yi chad pa dang zhum bdag nyid/ /de dag gnyen po brtson 'grus te/ gal spo ba'i
252b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid do/ /dran pa dus gsum sa la ni/ /sems ni nyams pa med pa'o/ /sems rtse gcig pa'i chos la ni/ /ting nge 'dzin du yongs su brjod/ /shes rab thos bsam las byung zhing/ /chos rab 'byed pa'i bdag nyid do/ /'di dag sngon du skyes kyang na/ /rim pa
252b7(mdo 'grel): 'dis ni rgyas pa'o/ /de nas chos mchog de bzhin nyid/ zhes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung/ /'jig rten pa yi chos kun gyi/ /mchog nyid phyir ni de bzhin brjod/ /dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams su/ /rim pas 'phal ba nyid du 'gyur/ /bzod pa chos mchog la gnas te
253a1(mdo 'grel): dad pa la sogs stobs ldan pa/ /gang tshe lha dang bdud dang ni/ /nyon mongs kun gyis thub dka' zhing/ /ting 'dzin grangs las 'das pa ni/ /blo ldan la ni skye bar 'gyur/ /'di ni nges par 'byed pa yi/ /cha bzhi ru ni brjod pa yin/ /chung
253a2(mdo 'grel): dang 'bring sogs dbye ba yis/ /tha dad so so'i dge ba yis/ /tha dad so so'i dge ba gsum/ /'di dag sbyor ba'i lam du 'gyur/ /tshogs kyi sa ni zhes kyang ngo/ /de bzhin so so'i skye ba'i sa/ /mngon par dga' ba rin chen 'od/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug
253a3(mdo 'grel): pa las sbyor lam brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi ba'o// //da ni byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /mthong ba'i lam ni brjod par bya/ /yang dag de nyid yang dag mthong/ /mi mthun phyogs ni spong bar 'gyur/ /mthong lam de yi dri ma ni/
253a4(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba'i bag la nyal drug ste/ /chags dang khong khro nga rgyal lta/ /ma rig the tshom zhes nyon mongs/ /'dod chags la yang rnam gnyis te/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags gang/ /de ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags mchog /gzugs dang gzugs med gyur
253a5(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ srid pa'i chags pa'o lta ba ni/ /bdag dang bdag gi rtag chad dang/ /med dang dman la mchog lta dang/ /rgyu min lam min der lta ba/ /de rnams lta ba lnga yin no/ /nyon mongs bcu ni khams gsum du/ /brgyad cu rtsa brgyad du dbye ste/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams
253a6(mdo 'grel): kyis/ lta ba 'di dag slar yang spangs/ /gang 'di 'dod par spyod pa yi/ /sdug bsngal bden pa yid byed na/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang/ /bdag med rnam par skye bar 'gyur/ /sdug la chos shes bzod pa dang/ /sdug bsngal la chos shes 'di gnyis/ /'dod pa'i chu bo'i
253a7(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs gang/ /sngar bstan de rnams kun spong byed/ /de bzhin gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal bden bsgom pas/ /sdug bsngal rjes su shes bzod dang/ /de shes pa ni yang dag skye/ /gzugs dang gzugs med nyon mongs ni/ /de nyid khong phro ma gtoT pa/
253b1(mdo 'grel): rab tu 'joms te so so ru/ /rnam pa dgu gnyis bco brgyad do/ /'di ltar khams gsum nyon mongs ni/ /sdug bsngal bden pa mthong ba yi/ skad cig bzhi po 'di nyid kyis/ /nyi shu rtsa brgyad rab tu spong/ /'dod pa'i kun 'byung bden pa ni/ /rgyu dang kun 'byung dang yang ni/ /rab tu skye dang de
253b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin rkyen/ /rnam pa bzhir ni yid la bya/ /kun 'byung la chos shes bzod dang/ /de shes pa ni yang dag skye/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs 'jigs tshogs lta/ /mthar 'dzin lta rnams ma rtogs pa/ /'dod chags khong khro nga rgyal dang/ /ma rig the tshom 'di dag dang/ /log
253b3(mdo 'grel): lta lta ba mchog 'dzin te/ /'dod pa'i bdun rnams zad par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang gzugs med gyur pa yi/ /kun 'byung bden pa bsgoms pa las/ /kun 'byung la rjes shes bzod dang/ /de shes pa ni rab tu skye/ /gzugs dang gzugs med nyon mongs ni/ /
253b4(mdo 'grel): khong khro ma gtogs rab 'joms te/ /so sor drug drug bcu gnyis so/ /de lta khams gsum nyon mongs rnams/ /kun 'byung bden pa mthod ba las/ /skad cig bzhi po 'di dag ni/ /nyid kyis bcu dgu zad par byed/ /'gog dang zhi dang de bzhin du/ /gya nom pa dang
253b5(mdo 'grel): nges 'byung ste/ /'gog pa'i bden pa 'dod pa de/ /rnam pa bzhi 'di yid la bya/ /'gog la chos shes bzod pa dang/ /de shes yang dag skyes pa las/ /gang de kun 'byung du gsungs rnams/ /nyon mongs bdun ni rab tu spong/ /blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' gang/
253b6(mdo 'grel): gzugs dang gzugs med khams phyin nas/ /slar yang 'gog pa'i bden pa ni/ /yid la byas pa de la ni/ /'gog la rjes shes bzod pa dang/ /de shes yang dag skyes pa las/ /gzugs dang gzugs med srid nyon mongs/ /rnams ni so sor drug rim bzhin/
253b7(mdo 'grel): gnyis por de ltar bcu gnyis te/ /khams gsum por ni skad cig bzhi'i/ /'gog bden de ni mthong ba las/ /bcu dgu rab tu spod pa'o/ /lam gyi bden pa bsgom pa ni/ /'dod pa'i khams su rnam pa bzhi/ /lam dang nges par 'byin pa dang/ /rigs pa sgrub pa'i
254a1(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin las/ /lam la'ang chos shes bzod pa dang/ /de shes yang dag skyes pa las/ /tshul khrims brtul zhugs mchog 'dzin dang/ /bcas pa brgyad ni 'dod pa'i 'o/ /gzugs dang gzugs med gyur pa ni/ /
254a2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin lam bden bsgom pa las/ /gzhan yang lam la rjes shes pa'i/ /bzod dang de shes skyes pa las/ /gzugs dang gzugs med gyur pa na/ /bdun bdun de ni bcu bzhi'o/ /de ltar khams gsum nyon mongs rnams/ /lam gyi bden pa
254a3(mdo 'grel): mthod pa las/ /skad cig bzhi po 'di yis ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis rab tu spong/ /'di dag gis ni byang sems kyi/ /mthong ba'i lam ni rab tu skye/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams/ /da ltar mthong ba'i lam de nyid/ /nyon mongs pa ni brgyad cu
254a4(mdo 'grel): brgyad/ /bden pa yis ni rab 'joms so/ /'gro kun ngo bo med pa ste/ /gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs gsal ba'o/ /dag cing gnyis med nam mkha' mnyam/ /de nyid de nas mthong bar 'gyur/ /mthong lam du ni bden mthong ba'i/ /bden pa'i rgya mtsho skye
254a5(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /mthu dang sems can don dang ni/ /ting 'dzin yon tan mdza' yas ldan/ /dran dang chos rab 'byed pa yi/ /shes rab brtson 'grus gong du brjod/ /dga' ba sems las byung bar gsungs/ /shin tu sbyangs pa lus bde ste/ /snyoms par gnas
254a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i btang snyoms so/ /ting 'dzin sems ni rtse gcig pa'o/ /byang chub yan lag bdun ldan pa'i/ /chos 'di dag ni zag pa med/ /de nas kun bden mi 'gyur ba'i/ /ting 'dzin de nas de la skye/ /dbu ni bcad nas sbyin byed kyang/ /sdug bsngal bar ni mi
254a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /de ltar dga' ba'i sa de la/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rjes 'brang/ /byang chub sems dpas dang po yi/ /mchog tu dga' ba thob pa nyid/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las mthong lam brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// //
254b1(mdo 'grel): de nas yang ni bsgom pa'i lam/ /theg pa gsum la rjes gnas pa'i/ /phra zhing phra ba'i dri ma ni/ /zad byed 'bad pas bsgom par bya/ /mthong ba'i don gyi de nyid la/ /sems kyis yang yang bskyed cing bsgom/ /goms nas thar pas 'gro ba'i lam/ /chung dang 'bring
254b2(mdo 'grel): dang chen po ste/ /slar yang gsum du dbye ba ni/ /chung ngu'i chung ngu chung ngu'i 'bring/ /chung du yi ni chen po dang/ /de bzhin 'bring dang chen po yang/ /'dod pa'i sar ni dgu ru dbye/ /bsam gtan gzugs med snyoms 'jug gi /sa brgyad pa la de bzhin no/ /so so so so'i
254b3(mdo 'grel): sa la ni/ /dgu dgu yi ni rnam par 'gyur/ /'di ltar sgom la khams gsum du/ /brgyad cu rtsa gcig dbye ba ni/ /mi mthun spang bya las phye ba/ /chags dang khong khro nga rgyal dang/ /ma rig bag la nyal 'di bzhi/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi mi mthun phyogs/ /bsgom
254b4(mdo 'grel): pas spang bar bya rnams so/ /de bzhin gzugs kyi khams su ni/ /khong khro ma gtogs gsum de nyid/ /gsum ni gzugs med khams su ste/ /bcu po 'di ni khams gsum du'o/ /chung ngu'i 'bring dang chen po ni/ /slar yang gsum du dbye ba ste/ /chung ngu'i chung sogs
254b5(mdo 'grel): dbye ba ni/ dgu ru 'dod pa'i sa rnams su'o/ /bsam gtan gzugs med sa brgyad la/ /mi mthun phyogs ni dgu dgu'o/ /'dod pa la sogs sa dgu la/ /rnam pa brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'gyur/ /lam la bzlog pa'i rim pa nyid/ /chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs kyis/ /chen
254b6(mdo 'grel): ngo'i che sogs dri ma spong/ /gsungs pa'i mthong dang bsgom pa'i lam/ /mthong ba zhes ni gsungs pa dang/ /sgom lam zhes pa la rten nas/ /nyan thos sogs kyi tshul gyis ni/ /sa brgyad po ni thob par 'gyur/ /de yang rigs kyis dang po/ /gnyis pa de bzhin brgyad pa
254b7(mdo 'grel): ste/ mthong ba zhes bya gsum pa'o/ /bzhi pa de bzhin bsrabs pa'i sa/ /lnga pa 'dod chags bral zhes pa/ /drug pa byas pa bsrung ba ste/ /bdun pa nyan thos zhes pa'o/ /brgyad pa de bzhin rang rgya las/ /nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub kyi/ /lam zhugs pa la gsungs pa'o/
255a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' shes bya ni/ /dri ma med sogs sa dgu ste/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad po dang/ /mtshungs par ldan par bsgom pa'i lam/ /lta brtog pa ngag dang las/ /'tsho ba dang ni rtsol pa dang/ /dran pa
255a2(mdo 'grel): /yongs s
255a3(mdo 'grel): ang dag ldan/ /lam gyi yan lag brgyad por shes/ /gnyis pa dri ma kun zang phyir/ /nyes dang dri ma kun zang phyir/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin dag pa/ /ston ka'i zla 'od ongs su ngs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin dag pa/ /gsum pa 'od byed
255a4(mdo 'grel): pa yang ni/ /ye shes me lce rab 'bar bas/ /'dzin pa gnyis ni legs par bsregs/ /bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba yang ni/ /yang dag ye shes 'od 'phro'i phyir/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin lhag cing/ /byang chub phyogs kyis rgyan du byas/ /lnga pa rgyal bar dga' ?
255a5(mdo 'grel): pa yang/ /bdung kun gyis thub shin tu dka' / /bsam gtan phar phyin gyis bcings pa/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi bsgrubs pa nyid/ /drug po mngon du 'gyur zhes pa/ /sangs rgyas chos la mngon phyogs nyid/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dag ga 'gog
255a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i bden pa thob ste rgyas/ /bdun pa ring song thabs chen po/ /rjes su ring du song ba'i phyir/ /blo ldan skad cig skad cig der/ /'gog pa yang ni thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin brgyad pa mi g.yo'i phyir/ /gzhon nu'i sa ste mi g.yo ba/ /smon lam rnam par dag pa'i
255a7(mdo 'grel): sa/ 'gog las rgyal ba skul byed pa'o/ /dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros zhes/ /bgyi ba'i sa ste stobs la brten/ /'dir ni blo ldan legs pa yi/ /blo gros so sor rig pa thob/ /bcu pa chos kyi sprin yang ni/ /dam chos char ni mngon par 'bebs/ /'dir ni byang
255a8(mdo 'grel): sems dbang bskur te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi dag par byed/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las sgoms lam brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// //lam gzhan kun la khyad 'phags shing/ /rtse mo nyid du phyin pa las/ /khyad par lam du
255b1(mdo 'grel): grags pa yang/ /sa ni bcu bcu nang du'o/ /sangs rgyas zhing dang mngon shes dang/ /dam pa'i bsod nams ye shes tshogs/ /brjod pa'i byang chub phyogs kyi chos/ /rnams dang zhi gnas lhag mthong bcas/ /gzugs dang sbobs pa rnams dang ni/ /shal sogs pa'i
255b2(mdo 'grel): spyan lnga dang/ /'di dag la sogs chos rnams kun/ /thams cad du ni yongs su sbyong/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las khyad par gyi lam bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// //sa 'di rnams kyi spyod pa'i lam/ /'phags pa mi pham zhabs
255b3(mdo 'grel): kyis ni/ /mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan du gsungs/ /yongs su spyod pa rnam bcu yis/ /sa ni dang po 'thob 'gyur te/ /bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang/ /sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid/ /gtong dang pa shes gnyen bsten pa dang/ /dam chos dmigs pa
255b4(mdo 'grel): chol ba dang/ /rtag tu nges 'byung sems nyid dang/ /sangs rgyas bkur 'dod dga' ba dang/ /chos ston pa dang bden pa yi/ /tshig ni bcu pa yin par 'dod/ /'di dag rang bzhin mi dmigs pas/ /yongs su spyod par shes par bya/ /tshul khrims byas pa gzo dang bzod/
255b5(mdo 'grel): rab tu dga' dang snying rtse che/ /bkur sti bla ma la gus nyan/ /brgyad pa sbyin la sogs la brtson/ /thos pa mi ngoms nyid dang ni/ /zang zing med par chos sbyin dang/ /sangs rgyas zhing kun sbyong ba dang/ /'khor bas yongs su mi skye dang/ /ngo tsha khrel yod ces bya ba/ /rlom med
255b6(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid de rnam lnga/ /nags gnas 'dod chung chog shes dang/ r/sbyangs pa yang dag sdom rten dang/ /bslab pa yongs su mi gtong dang/ /'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang/ mya ngan 'das dang bdog kun gtong/ /mi zhum pa dang lta ba med/ /'dris dang khyim dang 'khren pa dang/ /'du
255b7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin gyur pa'i gnas dang ni/ /bdag bstod gzhan la brnyas pa dang/ /mi dge las kyi lam bcu dang/ /rlom pas khengs dang phyin ci log /blo ngan dang ni nyon mongs bzod/ /bcu po 'di ni rnam spangs nas/ /sa lnga pa ni yang dag 'thob/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus
256a1(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan shes rab rab rdzogs pas/ /sleb ma dang ni bse ru la/ /dga' dang skrag pa'i sems spangs dang/ /bslangs na mi zhum bdog pa kun/ /btang yang mi dga' med pa dang/ /dbul yang slong ba mi spong bas/ /sa ni
256a2(mdo 'grel): drug pa yang dag 'thob/ /bdag dang sems can 'dzin pa dang/ /srog dang gang zag chad rtag dang/ /mtshan ma rgyu dang phung po dang/ /khams dang skye mched dag dang ni/ /khams gsum pa la gnas dang chags/ /sems ni kun tu zhum pa dang/ /dkon mchog gsum
256a3(mdo 'grel): dang tshul khrims la/ /der lta ba yi mngon zhen dang/ /stong pa nyid la rtsod pa dang/ /de dang 'gal ba'i nyes pa ni/ /nyi shu gang la rnam chad pa/ /de yis sa ni bdun pa thob/ /rnam thar sgo gsum shes pa dang/ /'khor gsum rnam par dag nyid dang/ /snying rje dang
256a4(mdo 'grel): ni rlom med dang/ /chos mnyam nyid dang tshul gcig shes/ /mi skye ba dang bzod shes dang/ /chos rnams rnam pa gcig tu ston/ /rtog pa kun tu 'joms pa dang/ /'du shes lta dang nyon mongs spong/ /zhi gnas nges bar sems pa dang/ /lhag mthong la
256a5(mdo 'grel): ni mkhas pa dang/ /sems dul ba dang thams cad la/ /thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang/ /chags pa'i sa min gar 'dod pa'i/ /zhing gzhan du ni mnyam 'gro dang/ /kun du bdag gi ngo bo ni/ /ston pa nyid dang nyi shu'o/ /sems can kun yid shes pa dang/ /
256a6(mdo 'grel): mngon par shes pas rtse ba dang/ /sangs rgyas zhing bzang bsgrub pa dang/ /yongs su brtag phyir sangs rgyas bsten/ /dbang po shes dang rgyal ba yi/ /zhing skyong sgyu ma ltar gnas dang/ /bsam bzhin srid pa len pa dang/ /las ni rnam pa 'di brgyad bshad/ /
256a7(mdo 'grel): smon lam dag ni mdza' yas dang/ /lha la sogs pa'i skad shes dang/ /spobs pa chu bo lta bu dang/ /mngal du 'jug pa mchog dang ni/ /rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang dang/ /'khor dang skye ba dag dang ni/ /nges 'byung byang chub shing rnams dang/ /yon tan phun sum
256b1(mdo 'grel): tshogs pa yin/ /sa dgu 'das nas ye shes ni/ /gang gi sangs rgyas sar gnas pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' i sa/ /bcu pa yin par shes par bya/ /'di ni rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa las sa bcu yongs su spyod ba'i lam brjod pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa
256b2(mdo 'grel): brgyad pa'o// //tshogs ni thams cad ma lus pas/ /lam ni yongs su dag pa'i rgyun/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku bzhi ni/ /blo chen rnams kyis rdzogs par 'gyur/ /khams gsum spyod pa las grol ba/ /rdag cing zhi la mkha' mnyam pa/ /
256b3(mdo 'grel): brtag dka' rtogs par dka' ba yi/ /bden zhing dpe med mthug po ste/ /mchog gi bde bas khyab pa'o/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur bde dam pa/ /rnam par rtog med cha las 'das/ /yang dag mdza' ste 'od gsal ba/ /rnam par shes pa'i chos gnyis 'das/ /phra rab
256b4(mdo 'grel): rdul ni rnam par spangs/ /skyed cing 'jigs med snying rtse yi/ /mthar phyin chos rnams rang bzhin bdag /lhan skyes ngo bo nyid ces pa'i/ /sku de sangs rgyas spyod yul lo/ /mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan du ni/ /'phags pa mi pham pas gsungs te/ /thub pa'i ngo bo nyid
256b5(mdo 'grel): sku ni/ zag pa med pa'i chos gang dag/ thob gyur rnam kun rnam dag pa/ /de dag rang bzhin mtshan nyid can/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o/ /byang chub phyogs sogs chos rnams ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams spyod yul lo/ /sgrib pa kun las nges grel pa/ /stong pa nyid
256b6(mdo 'grel): dang ro gcig mchog /chos rnams de dag kun gyi ni/ /rten du yang dag rab tu brjod/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ /khyab bdag stong nyid ro gcig ste/ /rnam dag stong nyid gcig pa'i bdag /sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin dam pa ste/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med
256b7(mdo 'grel): pas/ dngos dang dngos min gcig mtshan nyid/ /bden pa nyid kyi bdag nyid du/ /dpal ldan chos sku ston pa'o/ /gtso bo ye shes tshogs nyid ni/ /yongs su smin pa mkha' dang mtshungs/ /gtso bo sems gang gsal dag pa/ /thub pa zung 'jug bdag nyid do/ /
257a1(mdo 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de sras kyis/ /chos kyi sku de gsungs pa ste/ /mngon rtogs rgyan du gsungs pa ni/ /byang chub phyogs mthun tshad med dang/ /rnam par thar dang mthar gyis ni/ /snyoms 'jug dgu yi bdag nyid dang
257a2(mdo 'grel): zad par bcu yi bdag nyid dang/ /zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni/ /rab tu dbye bas rnam brgyad dang/ /nyon mongs med dang smon mkhyen dang/ /mngon shes so so yang dag rig /rnam pa thams cad dag bzhi dang/ /dbang bcu dang ni stobs bcu
257a3(mdo 'grel): dang /mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi dag dang/ /bsrung ba med pa rnam gsum dang/ /dran pa nyer gzhag rnam gsum dang/ /bsnyel pa mi mnga' i chos nyid dang/ /bag chags yang dag bcom pa dang/ /skye la thugs rje chen po dang/ /thub pa kho na'i ma 'dras
257a4(mdo 'grel): chos/ bco brgyad bshad pa gang yin dang/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang/ /chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin/ /chos kyi sku'o/ /theg chen kun gyi rnam pa ni/ /sdud pa'i chos ni yang dag gsungs/ /sa bcu dbang phyug rnams dang ni/ /de ni bde ba longs spyod
257a5(mdo 'grel): nyid/ thogs med zag med khyab pa ste/ /gsal zhing 'byung ba'i rdul phran spangs/ /dbang po'i gzhu dang nam mkha' yi/ /skar tshogs dri ma med pa bzhin/ /me long rnams su phan tshun du/ /de ni gzugs brnyan gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /sum cu gnyis
257a6(mdo 'grel): mtshan brgyad cu yi/ /dpe byad rgyan du byas te 'bar/ /bsod nams tshogs ni gtso bo ru/ /rnam par smin pa gsung bdag nyid/ /ma lus nam mkha' yongs gang zhing/ /mdza' yas 'od gsal mdza' yas pa/ /de ltar mngon rtogs rgyan las gsungs
257a7(mdo 'grel): mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ /dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di/ /theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir/ /thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/ /ji lta ji lta'i gzugs kyis ni/ /sems can 'dul bar
257b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba ste/ /sems can bsam pa'i rjes brtags nas/ /shAkya thub pa la sogs pa'i/ /thub pas 'khor ba ma stongs par/ /kun du skye dang byang chub sogs/ /bstan nas 'gro don byed pa ste/ /lus gtsor sprul pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /'phags pa rgyal ba
257b2(mdo 'grel): byams pas gsungs/ /gang gis srid pa ji srid par/ /'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag /mnyam du mdzad pa'i sku de ni/ /thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi 'chad/ /sprul sku'o/ /gzhan yang rgyal bas lung bstan pa/ /'phags pa klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa/ /khams
257b3(mdo 'grel): gsum spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam gyur dngos kun ngo bo nyid/ /dag cing zhi la rnam bden mchog bzhi'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa nyid yul/ /rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la bdag gzhan rab phan khyab cing mtshan ma med/ /rgyal ba'i bden
257b4(mdo 'grel): pa mnyam med mnyam sku mi rtog sku gcig la phyag 'tshal/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sku'o/ /gang zhig gcig min du ma ma yin bdag dang gzhan phan phun tshogs chen po'i gzhir gyur pa/ /dngos dang dngos med ma yin nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam rtog par
257b5(mdo 'grel): dka' ba'i rang bzhin can/ /'gyur med gos pa med cing zhi la mi mnyam mnyam pa khyab pa po ste spros med pa/ /so sor rang rig dpe med rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos sku'o/ /gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das bsam gyis mi khyab
257b6(mdo 'grel): legs byas dam pa'i 'bras bu'i bdag nyid du/ /'byor bas 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs gsal mdzad blo ldan chen po rnams ni dga' ba'i sku/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jig rten kun las rab byung rgyun mi 'chad par rgya chen dam chos sgrogs/ /chos kyi rgyal srid
257b7(mdo 'grel): che la rab bzhugs longs spyod rdzogs sku de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/ /gang zhig sems can smin pa'i ched du la lar me bzhin du ni gsal bar snang gyur cing/ /yang ni la lar rdzogs par byang chub chos 'khor bskor nas slar yang
258a1(mdo 'grel): mya ngan 'das gang mthong/ /rnam pa du mar bzhugs nas srid gsum 'jigs pa sel ba'i thabs su sna tshogs gzugs kyis ni/ /phyogs bcur rjes song don chen thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku la 'dir ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /
258a2(mdo 'grel): sprul pa'i sku'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la gnas/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyi yang/ /spros pa rgya che ba yi phyir/ /so so ru ni mngon par brjod/ /bla ma'i rjes 'gro la sogs pas/ /phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan pa'o/ /mi phyed sdom pa blangs pa yis/ /
258a3(mdo 'grel): zhabs ni rab tu legs par gnas/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni/ /yun rings du ni bsten pa yis/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ni/ /ngang ba bzhin du dra bas 'brel/ /gya nom pa yi bza' bca' sogs/ /rab tu byin pas phyag zhabs ni/ /gzhon zhing 'jam
258a4(mdo 'grel): ste byis pa ni/ /skye ma thag pa ji bzhin no/ /lngag pa la sogs byin pa yis/ /phyag zhabs gnyis kyi rgyab dang ni/ /lhag khung phrag pa gnyis te bdun/ /mtho ba yi ni sku can nyid/ /bsod pa'i skye bo thar byas pas/ /lag pa'i sor mo ring ba nyid/ /skye 'gro'i mtsho
258a5(mdo 'grel): la phan btags pas/ /rtag tu rted pa yangs pa nyid/ /srog gcod pa ni spangs pa yis/ /sku che shin tu drang ba nyid/ /dge chos blangs pa'i gtso bo yis/ /zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon nyid/ /dge ba blangs te spel ba yis/ /spu ni gyen du phyogs pa nyid/ /rig dang
258a6(mdo 'grel): bzo srogs gus byas te/ /byin pa e Ne'i byin pa nyid/ /slong la bdog pa'i nor byin pas/ /phyag ni ring zhing mdzes pa nyid/ /gsang ba'i tshig ni bsrungs pa dang/ /'gro ba tshangs spyod la bskod pas/ /'doms kyi lpa ba sbubs su ni/ /nub pa nyid du grags pa'o/ /
258a7(mdo 'grel): gding ba gya nom pa byin pas/ /mdog ni gser 'dra ba nyid dang/ /khang bzangs dam pa byin pa yis/ /pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog nyid/ /'du 'dzi la sogs spangs pa yis/ /sbu ni re re nas g.yas 'khyil/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad ni/ /gnas?
258b1(mdo 'grel): ji lta bzhin bskod pa yis/ /zhal mdzod spus mtshan drag tshig ni/ /med pas seng ge'i ro stong 'dra/ /snyan dang rim pas legs smras pas/ /dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa nyid/ /smin la sogs pa rab 'byin pas/ /thal gong yang dag rgyas pa dang/ /de bzhin   nad pa'i g.yog byas pas/ /ro ni bro ba'i mchog nyid do/ /nags tshal kun dga' ra ba sogs/ /mi rnams yang dag byed bcug pas/ /sku yi dkyil 'khor mnyam nyid de/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /gtsug lag khang sogs byin pa yis/ /dbu ni gtsug
258b2(mdo 'grel): tor ldan pa nyid/ /'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig smras pas/ /ljags ni ring zhing srab pa nyid/ /dam chos legs par go byas pas/ /de bzhin tshangs pa'i gsung nyid do/ /sems can kun la tshig bkyal pa/ /spangs pas seng ge'i 'gram pa nyid/ /sems can kun la
258b3(mdo 'grel): legs bkur ba'i/ /sbyin pa sogs kyis tshems dkar nyid/ /'tsho ba dag pa don gnyer bas/ /tshems ni mnyam pa nyid du brjod/ /bden tshig kun du spyad pa yis/ /tshems ni thags ni bzang ba nyid/ /phra ma'i tshig ni spangs ba yis/ /tshems ni bzhi
258b4(mdo 'grel): bcu tshang ba nyid/ /sems can kun la mnyam nyid du/ /bltas pas spyan ni mthon mthong nyid/ /khong khro sogs dang bral ltas pas/ /rdzi ma ba yi lta bu nyid/ /gsungs pa 'di dag thub chen gyi/ /mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /'du byed kun la ma chags pas/ /thub
258b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sen mo zangs mdog nyid/ /sems can kun la phan bsams pas/ /sen mo'i mdog ni snum pa nyid/ /rigs kyi mchog las 'khrungs pa'i phyir/ /sen mo mtho ba nyid yin no/ /tshul ni kha na ma tho ba/ /med pas sor mo blum pa nyid/ /legs par dge ba bsaT
258b6(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /sor mo rnams ni rgyas pa ni/ /mthar gyis zhugs pa nyid kyis ni/ /sor mo byin gyis phra ba nyid/ /lus sogs las dang 'tsho ba ni/ /rab bsrungs rtsa mi mngon pa nyid/ /nyon mongs mdud pa rnam dgrol bas/ /rtsa yi mdud pa med pa nyid/ /sems
259a1(mdo 'grel): la chos ni spas pa yis/ /long bu mi mngon pa nyid do/ /skye bo kun bgrod dka' bsgral bas/ /zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa nyid/ /mi zil gnon mkhas bsod nams kyis/ /seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid/ /klu zil gnon
259a2(mdo 'grel): mkhas bsod nams kyis/ /glang po'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid/ /mkha' la gshegs mkhas bsod nams kyis/ /dang ba'i stabs su gshegs pa nyid/ /skyes bu khyu mchog bsod nams kyis/ /khyu mchog stabs su gshegs pa nyid/ /bskor
259a3(mdo 'grel): phyogs lam mthun gshegs pa yis/ /g.yas su ldog cing gshegs pa nyid/ /mdzes pa'i dge mkhas nyid kyis ni/ /yang dag mdzes par gshegs pa nyid/ /rtag tu gya gyu'i sems med pas/ /mi g.yo bar ni gshegs pa yin/ /rnam dag yon
259a4(mdo 'grel): tan thob pa'i phyir/ /sku ni 'khril bag chags pa nyid/ /sdig pa'i chos dang ma 'phags pas/ /sku ni byi dor byas 'dra nyid/ /'dul bya kun gyi sems brtags nas/ /dam pa'i chos ni ston pa dang/ /lus sogs gtsang sgra'i tshul gyis ni/ /sku ni rim par 'tsham pa
259a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ sku sogs kun spyod gtsang ba'i phyir/ /sku ni shin tu gtsang ba nyid/ /thugs ni brtse chen gyis brlan phyir/ /sku ni shin tu 'jam pa nyid/ /thugs ni shin tu yongs dag phyir/ /sku ni rnam par dag pa nyid/ /chos 'dul ba ni rdzogs pa yis/ /thub pa'i
259a6(mdo 'grel): mtshan ni rdzogs pa nyid/ /yangs mdzes yon tan brjod pa yis/ /sku yi kho lag yangs pa nyid/ /kun la thugs ni snyoms ba'i phyir/ /gom pa shin tu snyoms pa nyid/ /rnam dag chos ni yang dag ston/ /spyan ni shin tu yongs dag nyid/ /go sla'i
259a7(mdo 'grel): chos ni ston pa'i phyir/ /shin tu gzhon sha can nyid dang/ /thugs ni rtag tu ma zhum phyir/ /sku ni zhum pa med pa nyid/ /dge ba yang dag 'phags pa yis/ /shin tu rgyas shing mtho ba'i sku/ /yang srid pa ni zad pa'i phyir/ /sku ni shin tu grims pa nyid/
259b1(mdo 'grel): ten cing 'brel 'byung gsal ston pas/ /yan lag rnam par byed pa nyid/ /tshig don shin tu rnam dag par/ /ston pas gzigs pa dag pa nyid/ /brtul zhugs phun tshogs slob ma ni/ /bsdus pas sku ni zlum pa nyid/ /bdud stobs 'joms pas sku ma zhom/
259b2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin dam pa'i sku nyid do/ /chos zad pa ni bzlog pa'i phyir/ /phyal ni phya de ba nyid do/ /shin tu zab pa'i chos ston pas/ /lte ba zab pa nyid yin no/ /slob ma mthun par 'dzin pa yis/ /lte ba g.yas phyogs 'khyil pa nyid/ /thams cad du ni rab mdzes pa'o/ /
259b3(mdo 'grel): 'khor 'byung ba yi chos nyid kyis/ /de'i phyir kun tu rtag par ni/ /kun nas mdzes pa nyid yin/ /thugs ni kun du yang dag phyir/ /kun tu spyod pa gtsang pa nyid/ /dus min chos dang bral ba'i phyir/ /sku la sma ba nag spag med/ /lus sogs tho?  mdog bde
259b4(mdo 'grel): ba yis/ /rgyu yi chos ni bstan pa'i phyir/ /phyag gnyis shing bal lta bur ni/ /shin tu legs par 'jam pa nyid/ /dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa yis/ /phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod nyid/ /chos zab mo la gnas pa'i phyir/ /phyag gi ri mo zab pa nyid/ /phyi rjes su ni
259b5(mdo 'grel): yang dag par/ /yongs dag chos ni ston mdzad dang/ /sems can kun la brtse ba yis/ /phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid/ /bslab pa rab mang kun ston pas/ /zhal ni ha cang mi ring nyid/ /khams gsum po ni thams cad kyi/ /shin tu rab tu gsal bar ni/ /gzugs
259b6(mdo 'grel): brnyan lta bur shes pa'i phyir/ /mchu ni bim pa ltar dmar nyid/ /'jam por smras pas ljags mnyen nyid/ /yon tan mchog mangs ljags srab nyid/ /chags pa'i byis pas gting dpag dka' i/ /chos kyi 'dul bas ljags dmar nyid/ bsnyengs ba
259b7(mdo 'grel): thams cad mi mnga' bas/ /'brug gi sgra dang ldan pa nyid/ /shin tu snyan la sogs gsungs pas/ /gsung snyan mnyen la 'jam pa nyid/ /srid pa'i kun sbyor bsngams pa'i phyir/ /mche ba zlum pa nyid yin no/ /gdul dka' i sems can 'dul ba'i phyir/ /mche ba
260a1(mdo 'grel): rno ba nyid yin no/ /shin tu dkar ba'i chos kyis ni/ /btul phyir mche ba dkar ba nyid/ /mnyam pa'i sa la rab gnas phyir/ /mche ba rab tu mnyam pa nyid/ /rim pas chos ni nges? rtogs shing/ /gsal bas mche ba
260a2(mdo 'grel): byin gyis phra/ /shes rab mchog la gnas pa'i phyir/ /shangs ni mtho zhing yid du 'ong/ /skye 'gro gtsang ma phun tshogs pas/ /shangs ni yang dag gtsang ba nyid/ /chos ni shin tu rgya che'i phyir/ /spyan ni spangs pa nyid yin no/ /don gi tshogs ni bsdus
260a3(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /mchog tu rdzi ma stugs pa nyid/ /gzhon nu ma kun mngon mgu bas/ /spyan ni pad 'dab rgyas 'dra nyid/ /rtag tu phyi rjes gzigs pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin smin tshugs ring ba nyid/ /chos 'dul 'jam po la mkhas pas/ /smin ma shin tu 'jam pa
260a4(mdo 'grel): nyid/ thugs rgyud dge bas brlan pa'i phyir/ /smin ma shin tu snum pa nyid/ /thams cad du ni skyon gzigs phyir/ /smin ma'i spu ni mnyam pa nyid/ /mchog tu gnod pa bzlog mdzad pas/ /phyag ni ring zhing rgyas pa nyid/ /chags sogs g.yul
260a5(mdo 'grel): las nges rgyal bas/ /snyan gnyis mnyam pa nyid yin no/ /sems can kun gyi rgyud la ni/ /rab tu gnod pa spangs pa yis/ /sgra gsan snyan gyi dbang po ni/ /nyams pa rnam par spangs pa nyid/ /lta bas byas pa thams cad kyis/ /gzhan du mi 'gyur
260a6(mdo 'grel): ba nyid kyis/ /dpral ba legs pa? byes rtsod pa kun/ /zhi byas dbyes ni che ba nyid/ /smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa yis/ /dbu ni yongs su rgyas pa nyid/ /'dod la zhen pa bzlog pa yis/ /dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag nyid/ /mthong dang bsgom pa'i spang bya ni/ /
260a7(mdo 'grel): bcom pas dbu skra stag pa nyid/ /bstan pa blo ni 'jam po yis/ /yongs su shes pas dbu skra 'jam/ /dri mas thun ni ma 'khrugs pas/ /skra ni ma 'dzings pa nyid do/ /rtag par tshig rtsub ma brjod pas/ /sgra ni mi gshor ba nyid do/ /byang chub yan lag
260b1(mdo 'grel): me tog ni/ /bgram phyir dbu skra dri zhim nyid/ /rtag par kun tu mdzes par ni/ /'gyur ba'i bsod nams nyid kyis ni/ /dpal be'u dang ni bkra shis mtshan/ /dpal gyis mdzes pa'i phyag zhabs gnyis/ /'di dag ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe
260b2(mdo 'grel): byad bzang po brgyad cu ste/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la gnas pa'o/ /'di ni rgyal po'i lam la 'jug ba las sku bzhi brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //rgyal ba'i lam 'jug yang dag par/ /sbyar las bsod nams chad med gang/ /
260b3(mdo 'grel): de yis 'gro kun rgyal ba yi/ /lam la legs par 'jug par shog /bdag gi bsod nams 'di yis ni/ /nam mkha' kun khyab skye bo rnams/ /ngan 'gro kun las nges grol zhi/ /mi khom thams cad rnam par spangs/ /skye bar lha dang mi yin/ /skye ba yongs su thob par
260b4(mdo 'grel): shog/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyis skrag pas/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing/ /dam chos nyan sems don bsgom dang/ /sems ni dben par gnas par shog/ theg pa chen po la gnas te/ /tshangs pa'i spyod dang ldan par shog/ lam kun
260b5(mdo 'grel): rnam par bsgoms pa yis/ /sa la sogs pa kun thob nas/ /zhing kun yang dag sbyangs nas su/ /myur du rgyal ba thob par shog /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas skabs su/ /bsam pa'i don kun thams cad ni/ /nam mkha' i mdzad bzhin mkha' nyid nas/ /sems
260b6(mdo 'grel): can kun la 'byung bar shog /phyogs bcu nam mkha' i mthar gnas pa'i/ /'jig rten khams ni de dag rnams/ /don grub 'jig rten khams bzhin du/ /de dag thams cad rnam dag shog /bdag kyang byang chub snying po'i bar/ /zang zing mi 'jigs dam
260b7(mdo 'grel): chos dang/ /byams pas sems can thams cad kyi/ /bsam kun yongs su rdzogs byed cing/ /rtag pa nyid du tshangs spyod dang/ /sdom pa kun gyis bsngams par shog /sems can don kun byed pa dang/ /chos kun don ni ston par shog/
261a1(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten khams kyi sems can kun/ /bdag la gnod pa byed kyang ni/ /bdag ni de dag thams cad la/ /phan 'dogs byed pa nyid du shog /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsran nas bdag /rtag par sems can don la brtson/ sems
261a2(mdo 'grel): ni dam chos bsam gtan la/ /ro gcig bstan pa nyid du shog /ji ltar brtson ldan brtson 'grus bzhin/ /bdag kyang go cha sbyar ba dang/ /de bzhin mi ldog pa zhes pa'i/ /brtson 'grus dang ni ldan par shog /ting 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yi/ /tshogs kyi
261a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub bsgrubs pa yis/ /bsam gtan kun la gcig tu gnas/ /bdag sems rdo rje lta bur shog /shes rab nam mkha' i mdza' khyab pa/ /rdo rje yi ni mtshan nyid dang/ /rab mthug kun dga' tshogs dang ni/ /snying rje'i ro yis nges gang zhing/ /thabs dang smon
261a4(mdo 'grel): lam de bzhin du/ /stobs ni rab tu 'byor ba dang/ /ye shes bdag nyid 'di dag ni/ /bdag la rnam par dag par shog /mngon shes kun gyi mthar phyin te/ /khyad par lam ni thob par shog /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyangs te/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas nyid
261a5(mdo 'grel): gyur cig /'di nyid kyi ni rim pa yis/ /bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni/ /'khor ba pa yi sems can kun/ /myur du rgyal ba nyid du shog /bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba 'di/ /bdag nyid kyi ni blo yis byas/ /kun nas kun du ma lus pa/ /sangs
261a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen pas na/ /kun du bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i/ /smon lam rgya mtsho ji lta ba/ /de bzhin du ni bdag la yang/ /dge ba rgya mtsho de myur du/ /'bras bu dang ni bcas par shog /phyogs bcu nam mkha' kun khyab pa'i/ /sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyal
261a7(mdo 'grel): rnams gang/ /de dag ji ltar smon lam ni/ /mngon du byas pa'i rim pa rnams/ /de tsam nyid du bdag gis kyang/ /bsam pa brtan pa de bzhin gyi/ /bsod nams mthu yis 'di dag ni/ /de bzhin du ni 'grub par shog /ji ltar dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs
261b1(mdo 'grel): kyi/ smon lam de ltar bdag gi yang/ /dus ni yun mi ring ba yis/ /smon lam 'di ni yongs rdzogs shog /sangs rgyas kun rnams rang rang gi /zhing bzhugs mya ngan mi 'da' zhing/ /mkha' mnyam chos kyi char gyis ni/ /rtag tu sems can phan byed shog/ sems
261b2(mdo 'grel): can rnams kyang sangs rgyas chos/ /dge 'dun bcas pa thams cad la/ /lha rdzas mchod sprin mdza' yas pas/ /yang dag par ni mchod byed shog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyis/ /'jig rten khams kun gang bar shog /mchog gi chos rnams sems
261b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ /srid pa sbyong bar byed par shog /lung don gang dang 'gal ba dang/ /don med pa'am yang na ni/ /god 'og 'chol dang sgra ngan ldan/ /gzhung gi skyon ni cung zad gang/ /brtsa ba can gyis dag byed pa'am/ 'on te sgro skur spangs te byas/ /chos kyi blo tsam gyis
261b4(mdo 'grel): byas phyir/ /mkhas pas bdag la bzod par rigs/ /blo ni zhan par gyur pa dang/ /so so skye bo yin pa'i phyir/ /'dir ni bdag gis skyon bsdus gang/ /sbang zhing chos dang mthun bzung ste/ /blo can brtse bas bzod par mdzod/ /'di ni rgyal pa'i lam la 'jug pa las
261b5(mdo 'grel): smon lam gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //ji skad bshad pa'i spang bya dor/ /gzung bya thams cad blang bar bya/ /rtog pa thams cad bsdu bya zhing/ /chos kyi bdag med goms par byas/ /rang gzhan phyir ni slob dpon ni/ /sangs rgyas ye shes dpal gyis byas
261b6(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa yi/ /chos bsdus pa ni rdzogs pa'o/ /rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug pa zhes bya ba kha che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta chen po rigs pa'i gnas lnga la sbyangs shing byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa bud+d+ha sh+rI dz+nyA na zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
261b7(mdo 'grel): e ma/ rtsom pa'i tshad ldan paN chen gyis mdzad rgyal ba'i lam 'jug 'di/ /nyud la gsal rdzogs lung rigs dang 'brel don chen ldan mthong ste/ /legs sbyar skad kyis dben pa'i mi rnams la ni phan 'dod nas/ /rtsod dus skyes kyang rig gnas lnga sbyangs sdom gsum la
262a1(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i/ /bod yul dbus kyi dge slong dag bcom legs par mnyan te bsgyur/ /phrag dog 'gran khengs dreg sems spangs te blangs na don chen 'gyur/ /gang dag srid zhen blo zhan 'tsho med long med bsgom 'dod sogs/ /
262a2(mdo 'grel): thos bral rnams kyang 'di tsam cig nyan nus na thos mang 'gyur/ /gzhung 'di'i tshad ni tshig bcad stong dang chig brgyas lhag pa ste/ /sgra don dpyad nas bsgyur kyang nongs na mkhas rnams bzod par bzhes/ /brtsams zhus bsgyur ba'i mkhan po gsum
262a3(mdo 'grel): gyis 'bad 'bras 'di dar nas/ /dge des bdag sogs 'gro kun rgyal ba'i lam zhugs kun mkhyen shog /bsgyur ba'i dgos 'brel dang gzhan la gdams pa dang bzod par gsol ba dang bsngo ba la shOo ka gsum lo ts+tsha bas bgyis so// //
262a4(mdo 'grel): swa pa ra he ta b+ha tu bdag kyang gzhan la phan par shog/ //*/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa slob dpon dpal sgra gcan 'dzin bzang pos mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/
262a5(mdo 'grel): bo d+hi satwa go tsA ri pa ri shu d+d+hi sU twA rtha sang gra ha/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdza' dag spyod yul ma yin pa/ /spyod yul
262a6(mdo 'grel): spyod yul min spangs pas/ /spyod yul thams cad dag gyur pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /zhing ni yongs su sbyor 'dod pas/ /rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud dag la/ /byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar yid/ /so so'i spyod yul 'gyur bar bya/ /thog mar
262a7(mdo 'grel): gnyid gsang de yi tshe/ /'di ltar yid la bya ba ni/ /bsod nams ye shes mngon 'phel don/ /'bad pa med par mkhas gyur cig /bag med gnyid las rnam grol zhing/ skye dgu'i mi shes mtshan mo zad/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyi shar bzhin/ /bla med de
262b1(mdo 'grel): mthong ldan par shog /gnyid yongs su gsang pa yi'o/ /ldang tshe nyon mongs nyer len gyi/ /'khor ba'i gnas mal spangs nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pas brnyes de ltar/ /stobs dang brtson sogs bla med shog /gnas mal las yongs su ldang ba'i 'o/ /ngo tsha dang
262b2(mdo 'grel): ni khrel yod gos/ /byams dang snying rje'i ska rags ni/ /sems can thams cad bla med par/ /rgyal ba ji bzhin gyon gyur cig /smad g.yogs gyon pa'i'o/ /byams chen dang ni brtse ba'i gos/ /bde gshegs ji bzhin gyon pa dang/ /mdza' dag sems can
262b3(mdo 'grel): yan lag ni/ /legs sbas mnyam pa nyid gyur cig /stod g.yogs gyon pa'i'o/ /bla med theg pa chen por ni/ /rkang pa 'jug par byed gyur cig /lha yi bzhon dang tshangs pa yi/ /bzhon pa la sogs nges 'byung gi /rim pas mthar gyis bgrod par shog/
262b4(mdo 'grel): mchil lham gyon pa'i'o/ /lus can thams cad thams cad du/ /thams cad bde 'gro myang 'das dang/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer gnas/ /sgo chen po ni 'byed par shog /sgo dbye ba'i'o/ /khams gsum rmongs pa chen po yi/ /srid pa'i khyim las
262b5(mdo 'grel): phyir byung ste/ /thams cad mkhyen pa gsal 'dod pa/ /'jig rten mdza' dag des 'gro shog /khang pa las phyir 'byung ba'i'o/ /mi khom ngan 'gro'i g.yangs sa las/ /mdza' dag skye bo rnams kyi sgo/ /mi dge gang byas byang sems dang/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang
262b6(mdo 'grel): bcad gyur cig /sgo 'gegs pa'i'o/ /bla med de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /goms pas thams cad du bgrod shog /'gro ba'i'o/ /nyon mongs ngan du spyod pa yi/ /bshad gci dri ma 'dor gyur cig /dri ma 'dor ba'i'o/ /mi gtsang dri mi zhim sogs 'dor/ /tshul khrims
262b7(mdo 'grel): 'chal pa'i dri bsal te/ /rtse dang bya ba dag pa yi/ /phyag zhabs sems can ldan gyur cig /khrus kyi'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas sgor/ /rnam 'phel bde bar gshegs pa bzhin/ /kun mkhyen tshul khrims dri zhim dang/ /ye shes snad pa 'char bar shog
263a1(mdo 'grel): 'khru ba dang so shing za ba'i'o/ /rtag tu sems can mnyam par ni/ /na rgas nyon mongs thams cad dang/ /bral zhing thams cad mtshungs par yang/ /rdo rje snying po'i lus su shog /sman nye bar spyod pa'i'o/ /kun nas rab
263a2(mdo 'grel): tu dang ba dang/ 'dod chags la sogs rdul spangs te/ /sems can rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin/ /blta bas mi ngoms skur gyur cig /chag chag dang phyag ngar bskyang nul gyi'o/ /spyi gtsug 'jig rten mi mthong dang/ /lha dang mi la sogs rnams kyi
263a3(mdo 'grel): phyag 'os rtag tu sems can kun/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas mchod rten bzhin mchod shog /mchod rten la phyag byed pa'i'o/ /skyes bu chen po seng gi yi/ /chos 'dzin rdo rje gdan 'dug ste/ /'os su gyur pa'i sems can gyi/ /bdud stobs stobs las rgyal
263a4(mdo 'grel): thob shog /stan dang gding ba'i'o/ /kun mkhyen dam chos thams cad kyi/ /mdzod ni 'byed dang 'don pa dang/ /skye bo rnams kyi bka' lung ni/ /tshangs dbyangs lta bu thob par shog /glegs bam 'byed pa dang 'don pa la sogs pa'i'o/ /rdul dang nang
263a5(mdo 'grel): kyi skyon spangs te/ /gser gyi mdog can mnyen nyid dang/ /sna tshogs yan lag mtshan nyid bzang/ /sems can rgyal ba ji bzhin shog /bla med rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi spyan/ /dag pa lnga dang rtag ldan zhing/ /nyon mongs gdung ba dri ma'i tshogs/ /
263a6(mdo 'grel): lus can rnams ni dag par shog /dril phyis dang spyan 'byed dang khrus la sogs pa'i'o/ /lam gyi yan lag brgyad ldan chus/ /yun ring zug rdur bying phyung ste/ /chos shes mdon par dag byed dpal/ /lus can rnams kyis rnyed par shag /khrus bya pa
263a7(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa'i'o/ /ma lus bkres dang skom pa las/ /bde gshegs bzhin du rnam grol dang/ /ye shes bdud rtsis legs tshim zhing/ /sems can rnams ni nad med gyur/ /bza' dang btung ba la longs spyod pa'i'o/ /kun mkhyen ye shes spyod pa yis/ /kha mgrin
263b1(mdo 'grel): dbal ni brgyan ba dang/ /mi gnas mya nga na 'das par ni/ /shes brtse'i gom pas rim bgrod shog /lung bstan rnam pa bzhi dag dang/ /so sor yang dag rig rnam bzhi/ /pha rol phyin pa chen po'i lam/ /bzhon mchen por 'dzeg par sheg/ brtse dang shes rab yang
263b2(mdo 'grel): dag 'byung/ /ma lus lus dang dag gi las/ /gzhan don phyir mi ldog par ni/ /sems can thams cad mnyam gyur cig /tam po la za ba dang/ 'chag pa dang/ 'bel ba'i gtam dang/ lam dang/ bzhon pa la 'dzeg pa dang/ bya ba rnams kyi'i/ /thams cad
263b3(mdo 'grel): du ni sgrib bral gyi'o/ /dran dang shes rab yon tan ldan/ /sems can thams cad don phyir yang/ /sems can kun dge byed gyur cig /de dang de'i spyod yul gyi sgo'i rnam pa'o/ /bla med de bzhin gshegs pa yi ni tshul khrims dri/ /byang chub yan lag me
263b4(mdo 'grel): tog mdzes khebs de yan lag/ bzang po'i mtshan rnams kyis ni mngon par brgyan pa dang/ /sems can rnams ni 'gro ba'i don 'dod gyur par shog /dri 'am bdug pa dang me tog dang rgyan byin pa'i'o/ /grang dang cha ba'i gdung ba sel bar byed pa'i dri
263b5(mdo 'grel): zhim dang/ gdugs dang 'dra ba'i phyogs kyi gnas yang bdag po dang/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas phyogs su brgyan pa yis/ /sems can rnams ni 'gro la rab tu gsal gyur cig /me tog dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgred pi'o/ /
263b6(mdo 'grel): shes rab rab tu gsal bas mun pa rnam bcom zhing/ /des ni sdig pa'i snum dang sdod bu bsregs nas ni/ /spyan sngar nye bar 'phel ba rnams ni thob pa dang/ /rgyal ba lta bur sems can rnams ni rab gsal shog /de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med
263b7(mdo 'grel): pa mi 'gyur ba'i/ /snyan dang ldan zhing legs pa'i yid shes dag dag dang/ /tshangs dbyangs ltar 'gyur de dge yon tan chen po ni/ /sems can bde bar gshegs pa dag dang mtshungs gyur cig /sgron ma dang bstong pa 'bul ba'i'o/ /'gro ba khyab par rgyun
264a1(mdo 'grel): chags min/ /mdza' dag smon lam chen po rnams/ /rgyun chags med 'das brtse ba yi/ /mal bder ltag par nyal gyur cig/ ma smad spyod pa thams cad du/ /pha rol sems can rjes 'dzin nges/ /rang tshul spyod dang spyod
264a2(mdo 'grel): yul ni/ /sems can sangs rgyas bzhin gyur cig /smon lam dang gnas mal dang ma smad pa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi'o/ /spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo'i don mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon dpal sgra gcan 'dzin bzang po'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa
264a3(mdo 'grel): rdzogs so// //dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba kha che shAkya sh+rI bzang po dang/ lo ts+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// // */ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so/ /
264a4(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi tsit+ta uta pa ta bid+hi/ bod skad du/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mdza' yas mu med pa dag na bzhugs pa'i
264a5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ dam pa'i chos dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun chen po dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la
264a6(mdo 'grel): dgongs su gsol bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ thog ma dang tha ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba 'khor ba'i tshe/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ pha ma dang/ sems can dag la sdig pa mi dag ba'i las bgyis pa
264a7(mdo 'grel): dang bgyid du stsal pa dang/ bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang bci mchis ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsngoms shing bsdus te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar bla na med pa'i so sor bshags par 'chags so/ /mi 'chab bo/ /slan chad
264b1(mdo 'grel): 'di lta bu mi bgyid do/ /de skad lan gsum bzlas/ sdig pa bshags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba bla na med pa thugs su chud pa de
264b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang/ 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /de skad lan gsum bzlas/ bsod nams la rjes su
264b3(mdo 'grel): yi rang ngo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi pa'i slad du dus 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du yang dag
264b4(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi ste/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po/ skyes bu khyu mchog sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bla na
264b5(mdo 'grel): med pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku mnga' bal skyabs su mchi'o/ /chos 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mchog la skyabs su mchi ste/ bla na med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pal mda' ba/ zhi bal chos kyi sku so so rang gis rig pa la skyabs su mchi'o/ /dge 'dun dul ba tshogs kyi mchog
264b6(mdo 'grel): la skyabs su mchi ste/ phyogs bzhi'i 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad lan gsum bzlas/ /skyabs su 'gro ba'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag
264b7(mdo 'grel): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas gzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dus ji lta ba dang stobs ci mchis pa bzhin du bdag 'bul zhing mchis na/ mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa
265a1(mdo 'grel): dag bdag la bzhes su gsol/ de skad lan gsum bzlas/ bdag dbul pa'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
265a2(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag sngon byang chub sems dpa' i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad bsgral pa dang/ sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang/ sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang/ sems can thams cad yongs
265a3(mdo 'grel): su mya ngan las bzla ba dang/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgong pa'i slad du ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dus 'di nas bzung
265a4(mdo 'grel): ste/ byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang/ sems can thams cad dgrol pa dang/ sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung ba dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang/ sems can
265a5(mdo 'grel): thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag gis dngos po
265a6(mdo 'grel): thams cad dang bral ba phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/ chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi sems gzod ma nas ma skyes pa/ stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de
265a7(mdo 'grel): bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dus 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bdud
265b1(mdo 'grel): dpung dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyib yang bdud dbung dang bcas pa mdza' dag pham par bgyis te/ bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshad rgya bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar
265b2(mdo 'grel): ston gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
265b3(mdo 'grel): te ches kyi 'khor la rab tu bskor bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes
265b4(mdo 'grel): bgyi ba yang nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bgyi'o/ /byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ sems can thams cad bdag gis 'gron du gnyer/ byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi/ /'gro la phan
265b5(mdo 'grel): phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /de skad lan gsum bzlas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/ /bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang/ gzhan yang bdag gis bsod nams cung zad ci bgyis pa dang/ bgyis pa dang bgyid
265b6(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/ pha mal sogs pa sems can thams cad dang bdag gi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs bsngo'o/ /bdag gis bsod nams 'dis pha ma la sogs pa sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni sgra lo
265b7(mdo 'grel): ma grol ba rnams ni dgro'o/ /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung ngo/ /yongs su mya ngan las mi 'das pa rnams ni/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o/ /mdon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa rnams mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o/ /skyabs ma
266a1(mdo 'grel): mchis pa dang gnas ma mchis pa dang dpung gnyen ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten gyi skyabs dang gnas dang/ dpung gnyen du gyur cig /bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/ /thob nas nyes pa'i dgra
266a2(mdo 'grel): rnams pham byas te/ /rga nad 'chi ba'i rlabs chen 'khrugs pa yi/ /srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par bgyi/ /de nas bdag sbyin pa stsol ba dang/ tshul khrims bsrung ba dang/ bzod pa bsgom pa dang/ brtson 'grus rtsom dang/ bsam gtan la
266a3(mdo 'grel): mnyam par bzhag pa dang/ shes rab rnam par spyod pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa la slob pa ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
266a4(mdo 'grel): brtsams te/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sa chen po la gnas pa rnams kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go /'phags pa dag bdag
266a5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' lags kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' lags par gzung du gsol/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /rtsi dang nags kyi shing lta bur/ /rtag tu srog chags thams cad kyi/ /'dod dgur dpag med spyod par shog /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang/
266a6(mdo 'grel): thos pa dang ni dran pas kyang/ /bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /nad rnams gso bar bgyid gyur cig /sems can thams cad bde dang ldan gyur cig /ngan 'gro thams cad rtag tu stongs par shog /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag su bzhugs
266a7(mdo 'grel): pa/ de dag kun gyi smon lam 'grub gyur cig /de skad lan gsum bzlas/ /bsod nams bsngo ba'o/ /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad brdzogs so// //
266b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+t+ra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ba ne ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //*/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa'i cho ga slob dpon byang chub bzang pos mdzad pa bzhugs so// //
266b2(mdo 'grel): /rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi sa twa sam ba ri ba d+hi/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa'i cho ga /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung
266b3(mdo 'grel): po rnams su brjod pa ste/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang/ dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang/ sems can don byed pa'i tshul khrims so/ /de rnams la slob par 'dod pa'i khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab
266b4(mdo 'grel): pas/ lhan cig tu chos mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa nus pa/ ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi don mdzad pa dang/ go bar nus pa'i zhabs dag la phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ bdag rigs kyi khyod dam/ tshe dang ldan pa 'am/ btsun
266b5(mdo 'grel): pa gang nye bas byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par len par 'tshal bas/ de stsal ba la rung zhing/ dka' ba ma mchis na/ thad cig bdag la rjes su brtse bas stsal cing gson cig ces so/ /'di ltar lan gsum gsol ba btab nas/
266b6(mdo 'grel): bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rnams na 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la btud nas/ de rnams kyi yon tan rnams
266b7(mdo 'grel): mngon sum du byas nas sems dpa' chen po bskyed nas/ pus mo btsugs pa 'am sa la tsog tsog por 'dug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdun du bzhugs su gsol nas mchod do/ mngon sum du byas nas tshig 'di skad ces brjod do/ /rigs kyi buAm tshe
267a1(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'am btsun pa gang nye bas byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang ba bdag la rjes su stsal du gsol zhes so/ /de nas rtse gcig tu nye bar bzhag nas sems dang ba rjes su bskyed de/ bdag ni
267a2(mdo 'grel): da ring por mi thogs par zad pa med cing dpag tu med pa bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi gter thob par 'gyur ro zhes don 'di nyid bsam zhing cad mi smra bar bya'o/ /slar yang byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa des/ de ltar gnas ba'i byang chub sems
