267a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' de la sems ma yengs par 'dug pa 'am/ 'grang bas 'di skad brjod de/ /byong ming 'di skad ces bya bas byang chub sems dpa' i bslab pa'i gnas thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims thams cad de/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
267a4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi tshul khrims dang bslab pa'i gnas rnams dang/ tshul khrims gang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gyur ba dang/ gang bslab pa'i gnas rnams dang/ tshul khrims gang da ltar phyogs bcu na da ltar byung ba'i byang
267a5(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims dang bslab pa'i gzhi gang yin pa rnams te/ bslab pa'i gnas rnam pa dang/ tshul khrims gang rnams la 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bslab pa dang ldan
267a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis slob par 'gyur ba dang/ da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams da ltar slob pa rnams nod dam/ des kyang nod lags zhes dam bca' o/ /lan gsum du'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig
267a7(mdo 'grel): rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ gang cung zad lus dang ngag dang yid rnams
267b1(mdo 'grel): kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ ma dang pha dang/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams la brten nas bskyed pa 'di dang srid pa gzhan rnams su bdag gis sdig pa bgyis pa dang bgyid du stsal pa dang/ rjes su yi rang pa yang rung ste/
267b2(mdo 'grel): de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bzlums te bsdoms nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ slob dpon gyi spyan sngar mchog dang gtso bo'i bshags par bgyi'o/ /shes shing dran pa rab tu mi 'cha bo/ /'di ltar lan gsum du'o
267b3(mdo 'grel): bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la nye bar mchis kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po can/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa/ sgra'i 'jigs
267b4(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad las 'das pa skyes bu chen po mi phyed pa'i sku/ bla na med pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas/ dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying
267b5(mdo 'grel): po la mchis kyi bar du zhi ba 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas/ dus 'di nas nye bar bzung ste byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du phyir ma ldog pa'i byang chub
267b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' i dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi'o/ /'di ltar lan gsum du'o/ /bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas 'di ltar sdig pa bshags nas/ gsum la skyabs su mchis te/ mdza' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams bsgral pa'i phyir
267b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ dbang pa'i phyir dang/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa la bzhag pa'i phyir/ ji ltar 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis byang chub
268a1(mdo 'grel): tu sems bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas nyid rtogs pa dang ldan pa dang/ rtogs par gyur pa dang/ rtogs par 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad sgrib pa dang bral ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sbyan gyis
268a2(mdo 'grel): mkhyen cing gzigs pa rnams dang/ ji ltar chos kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa'i cho ga des/ bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba slob dpon dang nye bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
268a3(mdo 'grel): sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /'di ltar lan gsum mo/ /bdag gis sdig pa bshags pa 'di dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/
268a4(mdo 'grel): skyabs med pa dang/ skyob pa med pa dang/ gnas med pa dang/ dpung gnyen med pa dang/ gling med pa'i 'jig rten la skyabs dang/ skyob pa dang/ gnas dang dpung gnyen dang /gling du gyur cig /sems can thams cad kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho lab ma sgral ba
268a5(mdo 'grel): las bsgral bar gyur cig /sgrib pa las yongs su ma 'das pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar gyur cig /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin par gyur cig /'di ltar lan gsum mo/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi
268a6(mdo 'grel): pas 'di ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/ sems can gyi khams mdza' med pa la ji ltar ma dang pha dang srid mo dang/ spun dang/ bu dang bu mo dang/ gzhan gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams su gyur pa rnams 'di ltar so sor bzung bar bgyi'o/ /gzung
268a7(mdo 'grel): nas kyang nus pa ji lta ba dang/ stobs ji lta ba dang/ brten pa ji lta bar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed par bgyi'o/ /'di nas bzung ste cung zang sbyin pa btang bar bgyi'o/ /tshul khrims bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bzod pa bskyed par bgyi'o/ /brtson 'grus
268b1(mdo 'grel): brtsam par bgyi'o/ /bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go /shes rab brtan par bgyi'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yang slob bo/ /de dag thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde pa dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
268b2(mdo 'grel): brtsams te/ sa chen por chung pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po can de rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i 'jug pa'i rjes su mchi'o/ /'di ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdag byang chub sems dpar dus 'di nas bzung ste/ bdag slob dpon gyis gzung du
268b3(mdo 'grel): gsol/ 'di ltar lan gsum mo/ /de nas slob dpon nges sku de'i spyan sngar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs shing/ 'tsho zhing 'dzin pa dang/ gzhes pa rnams la zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas btu de gsol bar bya'o/ /ming 'di skad
268b4(mdo 'grel): ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpas bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang nye ba las ji srid du lan gsum du yang byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa la/ bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems
268b5(mdo 'grel): dpas/ ming 'di skad ces bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' i bdag nyid dbang du gyur par yang dag par shes te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mdza' med pa rnams su 'phags pa'i mchog lkog tu gyur kyang/ sems can gyi don la lkog tu ma gyur pa rnams la/ 'di byang
268b6(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang ba la mkhyen par gsol lo/ /'di ltar lan gsum mo/ /'di ltar yang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa'i las kyi rjes la/ 'di ni nges par chos nyid yin te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mdza' 
268b7(mdo 'grel): yas pa la gtugs pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs shing 'dzin pa rnams gzhes pa rnams dang sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi ltas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis de rnams la 'di lta bur 'gyur ba ste/
269a1(mdo 'grel): ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang nye bas ming 'di skad ces? bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang nye ba las byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang ba blangs so zhes so/ /'di ltar me zhig gzhan par
269a2(mdo 'grel): blang ba'i cho ga brjod pa/ gal te yon tan dang ldan pa gang zag de dang nye bar ma gyur na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nges de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mdun du rang nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa blang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar bya ste bla
269a3(mdo 'grel): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ sa chen por bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la btung bar bya ste/ bus mo
269a4(mdo 'grel): g.yas pa'i ldang sa? la btsugs pa 'am/ tsog tsog pos tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ bdag ming 'di skad ces bgyi bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ sa chen por chung pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
269a5(mdo 'grel): rnams la gsol bar bgyi'o/ /de rnams kyi yang spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' i bslab pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams cad blang ba la/ tshul khrims gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bzhin no/ /ji srid du byang chub
269a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' bdag byang chub sems dpa' 'di nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas kyang bdag bzung du gsol zhes pa ni las so /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa'i cho ga /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub bzang po'i zhal snga nas
269a7(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po bla ma su nA ya sh+rI mi tra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //*/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang yid dam
269b1(mdo 'grel): blang ba'i chog byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa bzhugs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi tsit+ta ud ba ta sa ma da na bid+hi/ bod skad du/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed par dang yi dam blang ba'i cho ga/ thugs rje chen po la phyag
269b2(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mes po ni/ /'jam mchog mgon la rab btud nas/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed dang/ /yi dam gsal po bri bar bya/ /de la dang po re zhig rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rten dang bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas/
269b3(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa dang ldan pa'i thad du song nas/ dkyil 'khor bya ba sngon du btang ste pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi du skyabs gsum sngon du 'gro ba can gyi byang chub
269b4(mdo 'grel): kyi sems bdag la stsol cig ces lan gsum du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des kyang nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyi no zhes khas blang ngo/ /de nas sa phyogs yid du 'ong bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod
269b5(mdo 'grel): rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/ ri mo bzhugs su gsol te/ chu dri zhim pos sku khrus gsol la/ gos dkar pos phyis nas na bza' sna tshogs gsol te/ 'og na chad pa'i tshogs dkyil 'khor rnams byas nas/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog la sogs
269b6(mdo 'grel): pas phyi rol gyi mchod pa bya'o/ /me tog bdun pa mar me dang/ dri dang lha bshos nyid dang ni/ /na mdza' dang ni rgyan dang gdugs/ /gar dang rol mo glung dbyangs ni/ /yid 'ong sangs rgyas spyod yul dag /nam mkha' mdza' dag kun khebs pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams
269b7(mdo 'grel): kyi spyan sngar ni/ /blos sprul nas ni bdag 'bul lo/ /zhes yid kyis mchod pas mchod par mdzad do/ /mchod par bya ba dang/ mchod par byed pa dang/ mchod pa rnams rang bzhin gyis dbyer med par dmigs te/ /ji ltar 'jam dbyangs la sogs pa/ /rgyal ba rnams
270a1(mdo 'grel): la mchod mdzad pa/ /de bzhin bdag gi de bzhin gshegs/ /mgon po sras dang bcas rnams mchod/ ces sgrub pas mchod par bya'o/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /chos dang tshogs kyi mchog bcas la
270a2(mdo 'grel): zhing rdul kun gyi grangs snyed kyi/ /lus btud nas ni bdag phyag 'tshal zhes lan gsum phyag byas la/ /rgyal dang de sras rnams la bdag gis ni/ /bdag gi lus kun rnam pa kun tu 'bul/ /sems dpa' mchog rnams bdag ni yongs bzhes shig /
270a3(mdo 'grel): gus pa khyod kyi 'bangs su mchi bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'dis bdag gi lus sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes la thog ma med ldan 'khor ba nas/ /tshe rabs 'di 'am gzhan dag la/ /bdag gi ma 'tshal sdig bgyis pa'am/ /bgyid du stsal ba
270a4(mdo 'grel): nyid dang ni/ /gti mug 'khrul pas bdag non te/ /rjes su yi rang gang bgyis pa/ /de ni 'gyod pas shin tu yang/ /'gyod par bgyis te bdag 'chags kyis/ /'dren pa rnams kyi nyes pa la/ nyes pa lags par gzung du gsol/ /'di ni bzad po ma lags
270a5(mdo 'grel): bas/ mgon po slan chad bdag mi bgyid/ /ces nyes pa thams cad bshags pa byas nas/ /zag bcas zag pa med pa yi/ /dge la dga' bas yi rang ngo/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor slad du/ /sangs rgyas rnams la bdag bskul lo/ /rgyal ba mya ngan 'das
270a6(mdo 'grel): bzhed rnams/ /bskal pa mdza' yas bzhugs gsol/ /bdag gis dge kun bltos med par/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo'o zhes brjod pas bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ sangs rgyas la bskul pa dang/ gsol ba gdab pa dang/ yongs su bsngo ba
270a7(mdo 'grel): byas nas/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sbyin no/ /de la rang la mngon du phyogs shing tsog tsog bur 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas gnas pa la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di skad ces brjod cig ces smrar gzhug ste/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs
270b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po can rnams kyang bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas la sogs pa la mchod pa la sogs pa bgyis pas/ /byang
270b2(mdo 'grel): chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /sangs rgyas la ni skyabs su mchi/ /chos dang byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /tshogs la'ang de bzhin skyabs su mchi/ /zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la/ lus dang de bzhin longs spyod dang/ /dus gsum gyis ni dge
270b3(mdo 'grel): pa rnams/ /sems can don sgrub bya ba'i phyir/ /bltos pa med par btang bar bgyi/ /sa sogs 'byung ba chen po dang/ /nam mkha' bzhin du rtag par yang/ /sems can dpag tu med pa yi/ /rnam mang nyer 'tsho'i bzhir yang shog /de bzhin nam bis
270b4(mdo 'grel): mdza' gtugs pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rnam kun tu/ /thams cad mya ngan 'das par du/ /bdag ni nyer 'tsho'i rgyur yang shog /mgon po'i spyan sngar rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed de/ sems can de dag thams cad kun/ /sangs rgyas bde
270b5(mdo 'grel): la 'gron du 'bod /ces smon pa'i mtshan nyid mngon du byas so/ /de nas ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis/ /byang chub thugs ni bskyed pa dang/ /de dag byang chub thugs bsrungs la/ /dus kun ti ni gnas pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'gro la phan don du/ /bdag gis € byang chub sems bskyed cing/ /de bzhin du ni dus kun tu/ /bdag gis de ni bsrung bar bgyi zhes lan gsum gyi bar du smon pa dang 'jug pa'i sems bzung bar bgyi'o/ /nas gal te byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa gzung ba la mos pa bstan po yod na
270b6(mdo 'grel): de'i tshe sdom pa spyi no/ /ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' i bslab bzung ste/ /de dag byang sems bslab pa la/ /rim pa bzhin du gnas pa ltar/ /de bzhin 'grol phan don du /byang chub sdom pa bzung bgyi zhing/ /de bzhin bslab pa de
271a1(mdo 'grel): dag la/ /rim pa bzhin du gnas par bgyi/ /zhes lan gsum brjod pas sdom pa sbyin no/ /ltung ba dang ltung ba med pa'i gzugs brnyan yang skabs ji lta ba bzhin du de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan par bya'o/ /de
271a2(mdo 'grel): nas langs te dkon mchog gsum la phyag btsal nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs te nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du yon phul nas/ de ring bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /mi yi srid pa legs par thob/ /de ring sangs rgyas
271a3(mdo 'grel): rigs su skyes/ /sangs rgyas sras su bdag gyur to/ /skyon med btsun pa'i rigs 'di la/ /ji ltar rnyog par mi 'gyur bar/ /de bzhin nga ni rang rigs dang/ /mthun pa'i las ni bdag gis bya/ zhes bya bas mjug rgyas par bya'o/ /rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i
271a4(mdo 'grel): bshes gnyen med na ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i spyan sngar bya'o zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog la skyabs su 'gro ba sngon du song pa can gyi byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa gzung ba'i cho ga'o/ /de ltar byang chub kyi sems dang sdom pa gzung pa'i byang
271a5(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' i tshogs gnyis po spyod pas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nges na spyod pa la mngon par sbyar bar bya'o/ /de yang rnam pa gsum ste/ las dang po pa la ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims gtso bo yin pa'i phyir na/ yi dam gyi spyad pa'o/ /mos pas
271a6(mdo 'grel): spyod pa'i spyod pa can la ni dge ba chos sdud ba'i tshul khrims gtso bo yin pa'i phyir na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod pa'o/ /sa la bzhugs pa la ni sems can gyi don bya ba nyid gtso bo yin pa'i phyir na/ sems can ston pa'i spyod pa'o/ /de la las dang po pa'i yi dam gyi
271a7(mdo 'grel): spyod pa brjod pa'o/ /nad par langs te/ oM bra kri te pa ri shu d+d+ha sarba d+ha rmA(mdo 'grel): pra kri te pa ri shud d+ho nyra haM zhes bya ba'i sngaT kyis byin gyis brlabs shing yongs su brtags pa'i chus gdong la sogs pa dag par bya zhing kun du spyod pa gtsang bas/ sa phyogs yid du 'ong
271b1(mdo 'grel): pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i sku gzugs sam/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ thad ka bkram zhing/ bar snang la yang phyogs dus kun na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid kyis dmigs te
271b2(mdo 'grel): oM a ma le/ bi me le/ nir ma le/ swa b+ha ba shud d+ho swAhA zhes brjod la/ chu di zhim pos sku khrus gsol te/ gos dkar pos phyis nas/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i gos dang rgyan rnams sdigs 'dis dbul lo/ /oM a badzra wa stra hUM/ oM a badzra laM ka? re hUM/ de nas
271b3(mdo 'grel): mdun du mngon par phyogs te/ bsdad la/ oM badzra b+hU mi hUM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa'i char/ oM badzro nga ka hUM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lci ba dang/ chus kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor nya bar byugs la/ oM badzra re khe hUM/ zhes
271b4(mdo 'grel): bya bas dkyil 'khor btang nas lag pa bkru'o/ /de nas dbus nas brtsams te/ dbus nyid kyi mthar thug par me tog sngags 'dis dgra mo/ /oM haM ma hA me ra be swAhA/ dbus su'o/ /shar dang lho dang byang dang nub rnams su ni/ oM yaM pUrba pi te ha ya swAhA/ oM raM
271b5(mdo 'grel): dzaM pu d+haM pa ya swAhA/ oM laM ut+ta ra ku ra be swAhA/ oM baM a pa ra go ta pa ri ye swAhA/ me dang bdan bral dang dbang ldan dang rlung gi phyogs dag tu ni/ oM ya(mdo 'grel): u pa dwI pa ya swAhA/ a ra(mdo 'grel): u pa dwI pa ya swAhA/ oM la(mdo 'grel): u pa dwi pa ya swAhA/ oM
271b6(mdo 'grel): ba(mdo 'grel): u pa dwI pa ya swAhA/ bar gyi shar dang lho dang byang dang nub rnams su ni/ oM ya ga dza ratnA ya swAhA/ oM ra pu ru Sha ratnA ya swAhA/ oM lastrii ratnA ya swAhA/ oM ba a shwa ratnA ya swAhA/ me dang den bral dang dbang ldan dang rlung rnams su ni/ oM ya khraDga ratnA
271b7(mdo 'grel): ya swAhA/ oM rA ma Ni ratnA ya swAhA/ oM lA ma hA ni ratnA ya swAhA/ oM bA tsa kra ran+tA ya swAhA/ oM hE a d+ho me ra be swAhA/ zhes bya bas yang dbus su bzhag la dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas/ oM badzra puShpe hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badzra dI pe hUM/ oM badzra gand+he
272a1(mdo 'grel): hUM/ oM/ badzra ne wi dya hUM/ zhes bya bas ji lar rnyed pa'i me tog dang bdug pa dang mar me dang dri dang lha bshos dag dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas/ rgyal ba gang zag bla na med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang/ /
272a2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/ /kun gyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs sangs gang du bltams pa dang/ gang du byang chub la reg dang/ /zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /zag med mya ngan 'das pa dang/ /bde gshegs gang du bzhugs pa dang/ /'chag
272a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang ni bzhengs pa dang/ /seng ge lta bur gzims pa yi/ /gnas de la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /steng dang bar dang 'og dag dang/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su yang/ /skur bcas sku ni med pa yi/ /mchod rten la ni bdag phyag 'tshal zhes bya bas
272a4(mdo 'grel): lan gsum du phyag byas la 'dug ste/ rten gyi stobs la sogs pa rdzogs par bya ba'i don du phung po gsum pa gdon par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yang rjes su dran par bya'o/ /de nas par snang la rang gi gzhi bdag dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams
272a5(mdo 'grel): yid kyis dmigs te/ oM A(mdo 'grel): hUM zhes bya bas lan gsum byin gyis brlabs pas bdud rtsir gyur par bsam yid kyis de dag nyid la byin nas/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha rmI NAM sA dya nuta pan+na twA ta oM A(mdo 'grel): hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod pas bdud rtsi
272a6(mdo 'grel): des tshim pa rnams rang gi gnas su song bar lta'o/ /de nas theg pa chen po'i mdo lnga dang/ de dang rjes su mthun pa dag las mdo gang yang rung ba ci nus kyis brton nas/ sdug bsngal ba dang mgon med pa dag la gos dang zas la sogs pa tha na kham

272b4(mdo 'grel): swAhA/ zhes bya bas thog mar za ba rnams la zan changs gcig sbyin la ran pa chod zin par zos nas/ oM u ts+tshi Sh+Ta paN+Da a shi b+hya(mdo 'grel): swAhA/ zhes bya bas lhag ma za ba rnams la lhag ma sbyin no/ /gal te nus pa yod na nyi ma phyed dang dgongs ka'i thun dag la
272b5(mdo 'grel): yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /nus pa med pa ni sngar ji skad brjod pa'i tshogs dkyil 'khor bskyang nul byas la/ mchod pa dang phyag 'tshal pa yang byas nas phung po gsum pa bton te smon lam gdab po/ /de ni yi dam len pa'i cho ga'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang sems
272b6(mdo 'grel): can mgu bar bya ba'i cho ga 'di/ /mdo sde dang byang chub spyod 'jug dang bslab pa kun las btus pa la sogs pa las shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dang yi dam gyi/ /cho ga bdag gis byas pa las/ /dge ba thob pa gang yin nges/ /'gro pa byang chub
272b7(mdo 'grel): bsten par shog /byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang yi dam blang ba'i cho ga /slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dgra las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po su ma ti kI rti dang/ zhu chen
273a1(mdo 'grel): gyi lo tsa ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ tsit+to twa ta sampa ra b+hid+hi kra ma/ bod skad du/ sems bskyed pa dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i rim pa/ 'jam
