273a4(mdo 'grel): gnyen la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ 'di skad ces gsol pa gdab par bya ste/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po la bzhugs pa rnams
273a5(mdo 'grel): kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs skyed pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang slob dpon gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du gsol zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod do/ /de ltar
273a6(mdo 'grel): gsol ba btab nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas gzung nas/ ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas bcom
273a7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams la skyabs su mchi'o/ /slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas/ ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mchis gyi bar du chos rnams kyi mchog zhi pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos rnams la skyabs bcu
273b1(mdo 'grel): mchi'o/ /slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du tshogs rnams kyi mchog 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun
273b2(mdo 'grel): rnams la skyabs su mchi'o/ /zhes lan gsum du brjod do/ /de ltar skyabs su 'gro ba khyad par can byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid kyi dmigs te phyag btsal ba dang/ ci
273b3(mdo 'grel): 'byor pa'i mchod pa la sogs par byas la/ slob dpon mdun du byas te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa 'am tsog por yang rung bas 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas sems bskyed par bya ste/ phyogs bcu rnams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang
273b4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas skye ba 'di dang skye ba gzhan dang gzhan dag tu sbyin pa'i rang bzhin dang/ tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang/ bsgom pa'i rang bzhin
273b5(mdo 'grel): gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag gis bgyis pa dang/ bgying du stsal ba dang/ bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sa chen po la rab tu
273b6(mdo 'grel): bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed par mdzad pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di nas gzung nas ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mchis
273b7(mdo 'grel): kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chen po la sems bskyed par bya'o/ /sems can ma rgal pa rnams bsgral bar bgyi'o/ /ma grol pa rnams dgrol bar bgyi'o/ /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su
274a1(mdo 'grel): mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /de ltar slob dpon med kyang bdag nyid byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i cho ga 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang
274a2(mdo 'grel): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bsams te phyag 'tshal ba dang/ mchod pa'i cho ga la sogs pa byas nas/ gsol pa gdab pa dang slob dpon zhes pa'i tshig spangs pa'i skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i go rim gong ma bzhin du
274a3(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ de ltar sems bskyed pa'i gang zag gi byang chub kyi sems spel bar bya ba'i phyir tha na nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/ sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la/ /byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /bdag gis sbyin sogs
274a4(mdo 'grel): bgyis pa 'di dag gis/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /ces byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi sems nyams par byed pa'i chos bzhi las ldog par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bla ma dang mchod par 'os pa slu ba dang/ bzhan
274a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyod pa'i gnas ma yin pa la 'gyod pa bskyed pa dang/ sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la zhe sdang gis tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang/ sems can thams cad la g.yo dang sgyus sbyong ba'o/ /byang chub kyi sems mi nyams par
274a6(mdo 'grel): byed pa'i chos bzhi la bslab par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ srog gi phyir yang bsams bzhin du brdzun du brdzun mi smra ba dang/ sems can thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas gnas par bya'i g.yo dang sgyus ma yin pa dang sems bskyed pa'i
274a7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed cing phyogs bcur yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod par bya ba dang/ sems can 'ga' zhig dge ba la 'god pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs
274b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas la ni ma yin no/ /byad par du mngon par shes pa myur du thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa'i chos bdun pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub tu sems
274b2(mdo 'grel): bskyed pa'i phan yon ni/ sdong po bkod pa'i mdo la sogs pa las shes par bya'o/ /de la dang por cho ga bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi bslab pa la legs par slob bar
274b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa la gnas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa'i cho ga shes pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa 'bogs pa'i sgo nas slob ma rjes su gzung bar nus pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phyag byas te/ de'i
274b4(mdo 'grel): rkang pa la gtugs nas gsol ba gdab pa ni/ slob dpon khyod las bdag byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom par yang dag par blang ba de len par 'tshal gyis/ de la gnod pa ma mchis na bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du cung zad cig gsan cing
274b5(mdo 'grel): stsal ba'i rigs so zhes de ltar lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu khyod nyon cig /khyod 'di ltar sems can ma rgal ba rnams bsgral pa dang/ ma grol ba rnams dgrol pa dang/ dbugs ma phyung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang
274b6(mdo 'grel): yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bla ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'dod dam/ de las khyod kyi sems bskyed pa brtan pa dang yi dam brtan par bya'o/ /gzhan yang 'dren pa'i ched du ma yin nam/ gzhan
274b7(mdo 'grel): gyi nan gyis len du bcug pa ma yin nam zhes 'dra'o/ /de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i lugs sku 'am ras bris la sogs pa mdun du bzhugs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa shA kya thub pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
275a1(mdo 'grel): khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mdun du bsams pas ci nus pa'i phyi'i mchod pa lngas mchod pa dang phyag byas la/ de ma thag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen stan mthon po la 'dug
275a2(mdo 'grel): pa la ston pa'i 'du shes kyis phyag byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs pa 'am tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa nod pas 'di ltar bskul bar bya ste/ slob dpon
275a3(mdo 'grel): gyis byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa bdag la myur du stsal du gsol zhes de ltar lan gsum du dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bskul nas/ de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dug pa 'am langs pa yang rung ste
275a4(mdo 'grel): de byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa nod pa de dag la 'di skad ces dri ba bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod byang chub scems dpa' yin nam/ byang chub tu smon lam btab bam zhes dris pa na/ len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nges kyang btab lags so zhes
275a5(mdo 'grel): khas blang bar bya'o/ /de nas mi zad pa dpag tu med pa bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi gter chen por gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa ring po mi thogs par thob par 'gyur ro zhes snyam du
275a6(mdo 'grel): bsam zhing sems rab tu dang bar gyur bas dga' ba dang bcas pas cang mi smra bar thal mo sbyar te 'dug par bya'o/ /de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad dang tshul khrims
275a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad de/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang/ dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang/ sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshul khrims mdor bsdus pa slob ma la go bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi slob pa'i gzhi rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' 
275b1(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyi tshul khrims de dag ci bdag las len par 'dod dam zhes slob ma la 'dri bar bya'o/ /des de ltar len par 'tshal lo zhes khas len par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa sbyin par bya ste/ btsun pa 'am/ tshe dang ldan pa 'am/ rigs kyi bu
275b2(mdo 'grel): ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod bag byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yin pa dang/ tshul khrims su gyur pa gang yin pa dang/ ma byon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams
275b3(mdo 'grel): cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yin pa dang tshul khrims su gyur pa gang yi pa dang/ da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa'i gzhir gyur pa gang yi pa dang/ tshul khrims su gyur pa gang yin pa'i
275b4(mdo 'grel): bslab pa'i gzhi gang dag dang tshul khrims gang dag la/ 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bslab par gyur pa dang/ ma byon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i thams cad kyis slob par 'gyur ba dang/ phyogs bcu dag na da ltar byang ba'i byang chub sems
275b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' thams cad da ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims thams cad de/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang dge ba chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang/ sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims
275b6(mdo 'grel): nod dam zhes smras shig /des kyang nod lags so zhes smros shig /de ltar slob dpon gyis lan gsum gyi bar du len nam zhes brjod cing slob mas rab tu len lags so zhes lan gsum brjod pas sdom pa blang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des/
275b7(mdo 'grel): slob ma la byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa byin nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces lan gsum brjod par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di
276a1(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bas/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba las/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blang bar bya ba lan gsum gyi bar du mnos lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba
276a2(mdo 'grel): 'dis/ byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa la/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dbang du gyur par 'phags pa'i mchog lkog tu gyur kyang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthas gtugs pa'i chos thams cad lkog
276a3(mdo 'grel): du ma gyur pa'i thugs mnga' ba thams cad la mkhyen par gsol lo zhes lan gsum gyi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brjod de/ phyag btsal nas bla ma dang slob ma ldang bar bya'o/ /de nas langs la dge ba'i bshes
276a4(mdo 'grel): gnyen gyis byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa mnos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sed?  da'i?
276a5(mdo 'grel): sngom pa yang dag par len pa'i las brjod pa rdzogs pa de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di lta bu'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di ltar
276a6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa mnos so zhes yang dag par mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ /de la sangs rgyas bcom
276a7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis chos kyi brtse bas bu dang spun zla'i dgongs pa mdzad la de ltar dgongs pa mdzad pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dge ba'i bshes
276b1(mdo 'grel): gnyen des byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa 'di dad pa med pa rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste/ gang gi
276b2(mdo 'grel): phyir dad pa med pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa rab tu bstan na/ dad pa med pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa la ma dad pas spong bar byed de/ des na ji snyed byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa la
276b3(mdo 'grel): gnas pa la bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ba de snyed kyi bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po ma dad pa de dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can sdug bsngal thams? cad las yongs su bsrung bar bya ba yin pas
276b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan sdig pa las bzlog par bya ste/ de'i phyir mchog tu dge ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang bar bya ba yin no/ /de nas bslab pa'i gzhi pham pa'i gnas su gyur pa sdom pa 'jig pa'i rgyu bstan cing/ nyes byas kyi ltung ba nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs
276b5(mdo 'grel): pa can ma yin pa yang bstan par bya'o/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdor bsdus pa byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa nyi shu pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i sa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang byang chub sems
276b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' i sdom pa'i cho ga /slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/ zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur ba lags so// //slad kyi
276b7(mdo 'grel): baNrI? ta de nyid dang/ lots+tsha pa dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bcos shing gtan la phab pa'o// // */ /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa gzung ba'i cho ga slob dpon 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa bzhugs so// //
277a1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi satwa saM ba ra gra ha ca bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa gzung ba'i cho ga/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla med bsam gyis mi khyab 'bras bu skye ba yi/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
277a2(mdo 'grel): dpag bsam shing ljon sa bon ni/ /sdom pa dam pa bskyed cing spel bar byed pa ste/ /'bras bu mchog des sems can tshogs rnams tshim par byed/ /'dir nges par sdom pa gzung ba ni sdom pa 'bogs pa'i cho ga la mkhas shing/ len 'dod kyi
277a3(mdo 'grel): sdom pa dang ldan pa'i bla mas gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod par bya ste/ dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma'i maN+Dal sngon du 'gro bas sam maN+Dal med kyang rung ste/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i
277a4(mdo 'grel): bar du rkang gnyis mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du zhi ba 'dod chag dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de ltar gsum mo/ /skyabs
277a5(mdo 'grel): gsum yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge bsnyen du bdag bzung du gsol lo/ /de'i rjes su bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spod do/ /srog gcod pa las rab tu ldog par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang/
277a6(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa las log par g.yem pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ 'bru'i chang dang/ bcos pa'i chang myos par gyur pa bag med pa'i gnas las rab tu ldog par bgyi'o/ /de ltar gsum mo/ /deng nas gzung nas bdag mchog gi dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol zhes
277a7(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /de ltar 'di yan lag gsum yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ yan lag lnga yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge bsnyen du 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa nyin zhag gcig pa ni rtag tu mi 'dogs pa'i rgyan bzhag ste/ nyi ma shar ba nas sngar bzhin du gzung ste/ slob dpon dgongs
277b1(mdo 'grel): su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid sang gi nyi ma shar gyi bar du srog gcod pa spong ngo/ /srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang/ mi changs par spyod pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/
277b2(mdo 'grel): 'bru'i chang dang/ bcos pa'i chang myos par gyur pa bag med pa'i gnas dang/ khri stan mthon po dang/ mal stan chen po dang/ dri dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ kha dog 'chang ba dang/ gar dang glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ ltad mo blta ba dang/ dus ma
277b3(mdo 'grel): yin pa'i kha zas las rab tu ldog bar bgyi'o/ /dgra bcom pa yon tan brgyad kyis brgyan nas bzhugs pa bzhin bgyi'o/ /bdag gso sbyong gi tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa 'di yang sems kyi rgyan dang/ sems kyi yo byad dang/ rnal
277b4(mdo 'grel): 'byor gyi tshogs dang/ ma thob pa'i don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ de ltar gsum mo/ /de ltar 'di ni bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa'i sdom pa ste 'phags pa rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /nyin par tsam yang dag par
277b5(mdo 'grel): len pa la dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid nyi ma nub kyi bar du zhes brjod par bya'o/ /mtshan mo tsam la ni dus 'di nas gzung nas ji srid sang nyim ma shar gyi bar du zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gso sbyong gi sdom pa kho na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du len pa ni go mi'i sdom pa ste/
277b6(mdo 'grel): de blang ba ni dus 'di nas gzung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du zhes brjod par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sdom pa don du gnyer bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mdun du byas nas mchod pa byas te/ de'i mdun du dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma'i maN+Dal
277b7(mdo 'grel): byas nas nye bar spyod pa lngas yang dag par mchod de/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rab tu dang ba yang dag par bskyed nas phyag byas te/ bus mo gnyis sa la btsugs pa 'am tsog tsog por yang rung bas thal mo sbyar ta
278a1(mdo 'grel): mdun du 'dug nas bla ma la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu bdag khyod las byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par len pa de la spro yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa
278a2(mdo 'grel): thugs brtse ba'i slad du stsal du gsol zhes de ltar gsum mo/ /bla ma des 'di ltar brjod de/ khyod kyis byang chub tu smon lam btab bam/ bdag las byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa 'dzin par 'dod dam zhes pa yang gsum mo/ /des kyang
278a3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin bar 'tshal lo zhes dam bca' bar bya'o/ /bla ma las 'di skad du brjod par bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ slob dpon
278a4(mdo 'grel): dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ ma dang pa dang sems can gzhan la brten nas skye ba 'di dang gzhan rnams su sdig pa'i las gang cung zhig bgyis par
278a5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa dang bgyid du stsal ba dang rjes su bde dag thams cad bshags par bgyi'o/ /shes shing dran pas mi 'chab bo zhes lan gsum mo/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bdus bdi nas gzung sto/ snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du rkang gnyis
278a6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mkhyen pa thams cad ston pa 'jigs pa thams cad las 'das pa skyes bu chen po mi phyed pa'i sku bla na med pa'i sku la skyabs su mchi'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi
278a7(mdo 'grel): mchog zhi ba'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /tshogs rnams kyi mchog phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o zhes lan gsum mo/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas mdza' yas ba'i sems can gyi khams 'khor ba'i sdug
278b1(mdo 'grel): bsngal las bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ gdon bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ yongs su bskyab par bya ba'i phyir dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bla na med pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba'i phyir/ ji ltar 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma byon pa'i byang chub
278b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpas byang chub tu sems bskyed sangs rgyas pa dang 'tshang rgya ba dang 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba/ ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi sbyan gyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang
278b3(mdo 'grel): ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid mkhyen cing rjes su mkhyen pa'i cho ga des/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas slob dpon ming 'di zhes bgyi pa las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdun du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
278b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o zhes lan gsum mo/ /bdag gis sdig pa bshags pa dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
278b5(mdo 'grel): tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/ /'jig rten na skyob pa med pa dang/ skyabs med pa dang/ gnas med pa dang/ dpung gnyen med pa dang/ gling med pa rnams kyi skyobs pa dang/ skyabs dang gnas dang/ dpung gnyen dang/ gling du 'gyur bar bgyi zhing
278b6(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang/ yongs su mi ldog pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bgyi ba dang/ dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung bar
278b7(mdo 'grel): bgyi'o zhes lan gsum mo/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas mdza' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams la ji ltar ma dang pha dang srid mo dang spun zla dang bu dang bu mo dang/ gzhan yang nye du dang snag gi gnyan mtshams
279a1(mdo 'grel): su gnas pa de ltar rab tu gzung ngo/ /rab tu bzung nas kyang nus pa ji lta ba dang stobs ji lta ba dang snod ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed par bgyi'o/ /'di nas gang cung zhig sbyin pa gtong bar 'gyur
279a2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ tshul khrims srung bar 'gyur ba dang/ bzod pa bsgom par 'gyur ba dang/ brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ba dang/ bsam gtan la sems mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ba dang/ shes rab rnam par dpyod par 'gyur ba dang/ thabs
279a3(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa la slob par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du'o/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams te sa chen po la rab tu bzhugs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de
279a4(mdo 'grel): rnams theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa des byang chub sems dpa' bdag slob pas 'di nas bzung nas bdag byang chub sems dpar slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol zhes lan gsum mo/ /'di dag thams cad byes nas de bzhin gsheT
279a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sku gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag byas nas bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las ming 'di skad ces bgyi pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs so zhes bya'o/ /de 'dra
279a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i bla ma yang med na rang gis yang dag par blang bar bya ste/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol zhes bya ba dang/ slob dpon ming 'di zhes bgyi ba bzhag nas/ 'di nas bzung nas bdag byang chub sems dpar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub
279a7(mdo 'grel): sems dpas.. gzung du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o /de ltar mkhyen par gsol ba'i mthar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa dang/ rtag tu 'di'i dge ba mngon par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems
279b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' i sde snod las gsungs pa'i cho ga bsdus pa'o/ /gzhung 'di'i bsod nams bdud rtsi yis/ /sems can yongs su tshim byas te/ /mkhas pa 'jigs pa med pa ni/ /kun rig dpag bsam go 'phang shog/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med
279b2(mdo 'grel): 'byung gnas sbas pas bsdus pa'i sdom par bzung ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// //kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shI b+ha dra dang/ chag lots+tsha ba dge slong dgra bcom gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
279b3(mdo 'grel): gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bdun cu bslob dpon zla ba grags pas mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tri sha ra Na sapta ti/ bod skad du/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bdun cu pa/ 'phags pa 'dzam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge bsnyen
279b4(mdo 'grel): gsum la skyabs 'gro ba/ /de ni sdom brgyad rtsa ba yin/ /sangs rgyas de'i chos dge 'dun ni/ /thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs/ /dus gsum lam las nges grol zhing/ /shes bya la ni blo rnam rgyal/ /rmongs pa'i zum pa bcom pas na/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma ltar
279b5(mdo 'grel): rnam rgyas/ /thog mdza' med pa'i srid pa ru/ /ma rig gnyid kyis log pa yi/ /'gro la gang gang snang de de/ /brdzun te rmi lam lta bur 'dod/ /ma rig gnyid ni rgyun chad cing/ /yang dag ye shes nges 'byung bas/ /gang zhig rnam sad de sangs rgyas/ /skyes bu gnyid
279b6(mdo 'grel): sangs ji bzhin no/ /yang dag de nyid ston mdzad cing/ /mi mkhas sems can rtogs mdzad pas/ /des kyang sangs rgyas sangs rgyas dang/ de yang sangs rgyas dang mtshungs 'dod/ /ye shes bla na med pa yis/ /yang na de nyid thugs chud pa 'am/ /zhi ba nyid kyis
279b7(mdo 'grel): rtogs sangs rgyas/ /de bas sangs rgyas sangs rgyas 'dod/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs kyi sku/ /mtshan dang dpe byad dag gis 'bar/ /'gro ba rang gi mos pa yi/ /dbang gi sna tshogs skur 'dzin gang/ /bsod nams tshogs ni tshad med las/ /'khrungs pa de ni
280a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i sras/ /sa bcu la ni gnas rnams kyis/ /mthong bar gyur pa sku de yis/ /chos kyi rdzogs longs spyod 'di ni/ /rgyal sras rnams ni spyod pa yin/ /rgyal ba sku de la bzhugs nas/ /bla med byang chub thugs su chud/ /ye shes
280a2(mdo 'grel): spros pa med pa gang/ /shes bya skye med pa las byung/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos sku de/ /ye shes tshogs las byung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /stobs dang ldan pa bco brgyad dang/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs sogs kyis/ /ye shes
280a3(mdo 'grel): de ni yang dag brgyan/ /ngo bo nyid ni rgyu rkyen las/ /'byung /rgyal bas dngos po de rnams ni/ /gzugs rnyan dang yang /rang bzhin bcos ma min par 'gyur/ /ngo bo nyid ni bcos ma ru/ /ji ltar yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /bcos ma ma yin ngo bo ni/ /gzhan la bltos
280a4(mdo 'grel): pa yod ma yin/ /chos rnams nyid kyi ngo bo ni/ /thams cad yod pa ma yin te/ /de phyir skad cig gcig gis ni/ /bde gshegs thams cad mkhyen par 'dod/ /ma rig nyon mongs can byas rtog/ rang gi ngo bo sgro btags 'dod/ /byis pa rnams kyi
280a5(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /de rtogs gyur pa log shes yin/ /ma rig nyon mongs med yod pas/ /rnam pa kun mkhyen spangs pa nyid/ /slob ma rang sangs rgyas dag gis/ /byang chub dngos po med pa yin/ /rgyal bas dngos po de rnams ni/ /gzugs rnyan dang yang
280a6(mdo 'grel): 'dra mkhyen pas/ /gnyis med ye shes ma rig zad/ /shes bya skye med par rab bya/ /de bas de ni cung zad kyang/ /mi mkhyen ci yang ston mi mdzad/ /sangs rgyas nam mkha' i ji bzhin du/ /de ltar chos nyid la rab bzhugs/ /yid bzhin nor bu ci yang ni/ /mi
280a7(mdo 'grel): 'byed rtog pa med na yang/ /'gro ba'i bsam ba ji bzhin du/ /chim par byed pa yin par bshad/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rin chen ni/ /rang gi mos bzhin dgongs mdzad pas/ /'gro ba'i bya ba de dang ni/ /de bzhin mdzad par go ba yin/ /de yi phyir na 'bags
280b1(mdo 'grel): ba rnams/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i rkyen las 'khrungs/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i bya ba ni/ /mthong la 'thad pa yod ma yin/ /chos rnams dngos med nyid la ni/ /blo gnas sangs rgyas yin par bshad/ /'og min gzhal yas khang du na/ /yang? dag? mngon?
280b2(mdo 'grel): sum yin par 'dod/ /sangs rgyas rtog pa mi mnga' ba'i/ /gzugs kyi skur ni yang dag 'byung/ /sbrul ba'i skus ni sa steng duAng/ /yang dag byang chub ston par mdzad/ /thub dbang rnams kyi sku gsum ste/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /mdor
280b3(mdo 'grel): bsdus nas ni bshad pa 'di/ /gus pas blo la bzhag par bgyi/ /sngon med pa las slar byung zhing/ /byung nas kyang ni yang dag med/ rang gi ngo bo 'dzin pas chos/ /don dam bar mi brjod do/ /gang zhig rmi lam sgyu ma dang/ /chu zla lta bur slu byed pa/ /skyes soT
280b4(mdo 'grel): dang ldan de spang bya'i/ /chos spang bar ni rigs ma yin/ /dus gsum du yang dngos gcig phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu 'byung/ /rga shi dag las grol ba nyid/ /chos rnams kyi ni chos shes bshad/ /zad dang chags bral mya ngan 'das/ /'gog dang stong pa
280b5(mdo 'grel): nyid zhe pa/ /de bzhin nyid kyang chos rnams kyis/ /rang gi ngo bo de nyid bshad/ /lam gang mya ngan 'das 'gro ba/ /thub pa rnams kyis yang dag gsungs/ /de yi rgyud las skyes gyur bas/ /des ni mngon sum dag tu gzigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa bzhi/
280b6(mdo 'grel): rtogs te shes nas dad gyur bas/ /skyes bu gang zag zung brgyad be/ /mi phyad dge 'dun zhes bshad do/ /nyon mongs gzham phyir slob pas na/ /gang zag bdun ni slob pa yin/ /nyes pa ma lus zad pa'i phyir/ brgyad pa mi slob par bshad do/ de rnams 'bras bur
280b7(mdo 'grel): gnas pa bzhi/ /bzhi ni zhugs pa po yin la /ston pa'i slob ma'i tshogs 'di ni/ grel dang grol ba'i lam la gnas/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni/ /bdud rnams bye ba brgya yis kyang/ /gang phyir dbye bar mi nus pa/ /de phyir dge 'dun zhes bshad do/ /thub dbang
281a1(mdo 'grel): gi ni sku gsum dang/ /mya ngan 'das dang gang zag brgyad/ /sdom brtson bcas la mos pa yis/ /gang zhig gsum la skyabs 'gro ba/ /dge bsnyen du ni dam bcas pas/ /skyabs ni gsum po bsrung bar bya/ /mu stegs
281a2(mdo 'grel): kun la gus pa yis/ /mchod dang phyag 'tshal mi bya'o/ /rten gyi dam pa blang nas ni/ /slar yang dman la brten gyur na/ /nyes byas phyogs la gnas pa'i phyir/ /de ni dam pa'i bzhad gang 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'phags lam ma skyes pa'i/ /byis rmongs
281a3(mdo 'grel): so so'i skye bo dag /de ni slob dang mi slob pa/ /min zhes bstan bcos las bshad do/ /ji ltar 'khor lo la sogs pa/ /nyer bzung 'khor lor btags pa ni/ /yang dag gzhan du rnam dpyad pas/ /rnam pa kun du mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin phung po nas brtsams
281a4(mdo 'grel): te/ sems can du ni btags pa yang/ /yang dag gzhan du dpyad byas pas/ /ci nas kyang ni dmigs mi 'gyur/ /de 'dir thar pa'i cha nas ni/ /brtsams te rtag tu dge ba la/ /nyan thos nyid phyir 'bang na ni/ /rim gyis nyan thos nyid du 'gyur/ /gang zhig rang
281a5(mdo 'grel): byung ye shes 'dod/ /rang rgyal byang chub don gnyer bas/ /rtsol ba de yang rang rgyal gyis/ /byang chub kho na des 'thob bo/ /rang don la gzhol 'di dag ni/ /snying rje chen po dang bral bas/ /rang rgyal rgyal ba'i gsung las skyes/ /theg pa chen por mi bsngags so/ /rgyal
281a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i yon tan mdza' yas pa/ /theg pa che las gsungs pa dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i mthu thos nas/ /des ni snod nyid 'gyur ba yin/ /des ni theg pa chen po'i shing/ /ma lus rang gi las kyi bsregs/ /byang chub sems dpa' i nang du ni/ /skyes bu dbul
281a7(mdo 'grel): po lta bur gnas/ /'di dag srid pas skrag pa yi/ /yid kyis byang chub gnyis thob pa/ /che zad par ni dgar 'gyur zhing/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i 'du shes can/ /de la mya ngan 'das yod min/ /'on kyang srid gsum skyes pa ni/ /de dag la yang med mod kyi//
281b1(mdo 'grel): zag pa med pa'i dbyings na 'khod/ /mi shes nyon mongs min spang phyir/ /phyis ni sangs rgyas kyis bskul bas/ /byang chub kyi ni tshogs bsags nas/ /de yang 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur/ /'khor los sgyur ba rgyal po yi/ /mtshan gyi yang dag
281b2(mdo 'grel): brgyan pa la/ /blo dang ldan pa'ang blon po yis/ /rgyal po lta bur mtho bar mthong/ /nyan thos rang sangs rgyas dag gis/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rigs byung ba'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan yang/ /thub pa'i dbang po lta bur mthong/ /byang chub sems
281b3(mdo 'grel): ni legs bskyed pa'i/ /sdom brtson mchil lham khur ba las/ /byang chub sems sogs la gus pas/ /dgra bcom pa yis bzlog par bshad/ /shA ri'i lung las dgra bcom pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag byas nyid/ /'di dag dkon mchog
281b4(mdo 'grel): gsum gzhan min/ /sangs rgyas khongs su gtogs par 'dod/ /ji ltar dgra bcom zad ye shes/ /sa bdun mngon du 'gro ba can/ /de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas ye shes/ /sa bcu sngon du 'gro ba yin/ /'di ni gcig pu mi 'gro yis/ /sa bcu po ni sbyong byed de
281b5(mdo 'grel): gang phyir pha rol phyin pa bcus/ /sa de rnams la rdzogs par byed/ /'bras bur gnas dang zhugs pa ni/ /'phags pa'i lam gyis rab phye ba'i/ /slob pa rnams kyis bdun ni/ /mngon pa'i chos las ji skad bshad/ /de bzhin sde snod rgyas pa las/ /sa
281b6(mdo 'grel): bcu'i bsngags pa brjod pa yin/ /thams cad 'phags lam bdag nyid can/ /de las 'phags min ji ltar 'gyur/ /nyan thos rnams kyi dbang mdzad nas/ /sde snod gsum du 'dod pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' i gnas skabs kyi/ /nges pa der ni yod
281b7(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ /'phags pa nub kyi rir bshad dang/ /shar gyi ri pa'i nyan thos kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dbang byas pa/ /sde snod bdun du bshad pa yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sde snod dang/ /de bzhin rig 'dzin zhes bya dang/ /mdo sde chos mngon 'dul ba dang/
282a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas dang de bzhin skyes pa'i rabs/ /de ltar sde snod bdun po ni/ /lung ni gnyis las bstan pa yin/ /gang la de ni tshad min 'gyur/ /de ni dgra bcom spangs pa nyid/ /shes bya mdza' yas dbang gis na/ /'khor ba na ni skad
282a2(mdo 'grel): cig yod/ /gal te re re'i dbye bas ring/ /de bzhin 'di yang srid mtshungs 'gyur/ /bya ba rgya chen byed pa'i phyir/ /srid pa ring mnyam mi sems so/ /bsod nams ye shes stobs kyis ni/ /lus sems sdug bsngal gyis mi non/ /de bas rnam pa thams cad du/
282a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' smad mi bya/ /khams gsum par gtogs nyon mongs zad/ /byang chub kyi ni snod gyur nyid/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /gzugs brnyan mtshungs par mthong bas na/ /nyan thos rang sangs rgyas dag ni/ /stong ni gnyis
282a4(mdo 'grel): dang gsum po mthong/ /rnam pa kun mkhyen ye shes ni/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yin par bshad/ /rgyal bas lam gyi rnam par shes/ /byang chub sems dpa' yin par gsungs/ /rab tu dga' ba thob pa na/ /kun sbyor gsum po legs zad pas/ /byang chub
282a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' 'phags 'gyur zhing/ /rdzogs sangs rigs las byung ba yin/ /sa ni gong ma gong ma la/ /byang chub sems dpa' i yon tan dang/ /nyes zad gang yin sa bcu pa'i/ /mdo nyid las ni shes par bya/ /yon tan dam pa re re zhing/ /mdza' yas
282a6(mdo 'grel): de ni mkha' dang mnyam/ /byang chub la sems rtag phyag 'tshal/ /blo ldan byang chub la skyabs mchi/ /theg chen tshul la brten nas ni/ /skyabs gsum rnam par phye ba las/ /bsod nams gang nges 'jig rten rnams/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchog
282a7(mdo 'grel): gzhol shog /gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bdun cu pa/ /slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur
282b1(mdo 'grel): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ Sha DaM ga sa ra NaM/ bod skad du/ skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa bshad/ /cis 'gro dgos dang yul
282b2(mdo 'grel): dus dang/ /phan yon bslab bya blang ba rnams/ /rtsa ba sdom du bshad pa yin/ /'jigs dang yon tan dran pas 'bro/ /gnas gsum bstan pa'i yul de la/ /'di nas byang chub thob par ro/ /mu stegs spyod las log pa yin/ /gsum du mi skye rten du 'gyur/
282b3(mdo 'grel): bar tshad med pas nad myung ring/ /'byang zhing sogs pa'i phan yon ni/ /skyabs gsum dang po'i bslab bya ni/ /gnod sbyin mi bsten phyag mi 'tshal/ /gnyis pa sems can thams cad la/ /'tshe ba spang zhing brtse bar bya/ /gsum pa bdag dang gzhan gyi
282b4(mdo 'grel): yul/ sdig pa can dang 'grogs pa min/ /sku gzugs tshigs su bcad pa dang/ /lhan pa ser po btab pa la/ /dad mos sgo nas brtan par brtag /zhal nas gsungs pa mdza' dag la/ /skur pa mi gdab spyi bor blang/ /gang zag dag dang ma dag la//
282b5(mdo 'grel): dam par blta bar bya ba yin/ /lus srog phyir yang gsum mi spang/ /dus 'dir rkyen yang ci byung yang/ /mgon skyabs gzhan du btsal ba min/ /che ba'i yon tan zad dag gis/ /rtag tu dran cing mchod pa yin/ /rgyun gyi skyabs 'gro brjod bya ba/ /dus drug rgyun
282b6(mdo 'grel): gyis bskul ma yin/ /blang ba dang por shes bya ba/ /'jigs pa byung tshe bskul ma yin/ /rgyud la shes bya mang mchis kyang/ /rgyal blon yid ches ma gyur bas/ /skyabs 'gro'i cho ga bdag gis bshad/ /legs par gris shig ku mA ra/ /bsod nams
282b7(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba yongs la bsngo/ /skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa/ slob dpon bi ma las mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ /ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga paN+Di ta de ba shAn+tis mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ a pat+ti de sha
283a1(mdo 'grel): na bid+hi/ bod skad du/ ltung ba bshags pa'i cho ga/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ /bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba byis pa nyid dang/ mi shes pa nyid kyis 'dod chags
283a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ zhe sdang dang gti mug dang/ phrag dog dang/ ser sna'i dbang gis/ lus ma bsgoms pa dang/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa dang/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa dang/ dran pa nyams pa nyid kyis/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis dge slong dang rjes su
283a3(mdo 'grel): mthun pa ma lags pa bgyis pa dang/ bgyid du stsal ba dang/ gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams la bzod par mdzad du gsol gyis bzod par mdzad du gsol/ /khyed la ji ltar bzod par gsol ba de
283a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du mkhan po dang/ slob dpon dang/ lhan cig skyes pa dang/ chos dang lta ba mthun pa dang/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba dang/ gtsug lag khang dang brang khang na gnyug mar gnas ba'i lha dang/ lam dang nye ba'i lam na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha dang
283a5(mdo 'grel): bstan pa 'di la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang/ gzhan gyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang/ pha dang/ ma dang/ gtong ba po dang/ sbyin bdag dang/ ji srid srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi sems can de/ 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang bcas
283a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ nag po chen po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad la nongs pa bgyis pa gang lags pa de bdag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bzod par gsol gyis
283a7(mdo 'grel): bzod par mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/ thabs yin no lags so/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ltung ba rigs lnga po lnga/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sbyor ba dang/
283b1(mdo 'grel): dngos gzhi dang mjug rnams su/ 'dod chags kyis kun nas bslang ba dang/ zhe sdang gis kun nas bslang ba dang/ gti mug gis kun nas bslang ba dang/ chad pas kun nas bslang ba dang/ skyed kyis kun nas bslang ba dang/ de'i tshan du gtogs
283b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ de'i sder gtogs pa dang/ de'i ris su gtogs pa dang/ de'i mtshan nyid dang/ de'i ngo bo nyid dang/ nang du btsos pa dang/ nang du zhag lon pa dang/ ched du byas pa dang/ btang nas za ba dang/ kham 'phrar bcad pa dang/ kha ba kang nas smra
283b3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ lag nyar blang ba dang/ byin len ma byas pa dang/ gsog 'jog byas pa dang/ dus ma yin pa'i zas dang/ mdor na phas pham pa'i chos bzhi dang/ des kun nas bslang ba'i ltung ba sbom po sbyor ba dang/ dngos gzhi dang/ mjug gis bsdus pa dang
283b4(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang/ des kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbom po sbyor ba dang/ dngos gzhi dang/ mjug dang/ spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu dang/ des kun na bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi dang/ mjug dang/ ltung byed kyi chos
283b5(mdo 'grel): dgu bcu dang/ des kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang/ dngos gzhi dang mjug dang/ so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi dang/ nges kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi dang mjug dang/ bslab par bya ba'i chos brgya rtsa mang po dang
283b6(mdo 'grel): nges kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi dang mjug dang/ rtsod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun dang/ des kun nas bslang ba'i nyes pa sbyor ba dang/ dngos gzhi dang mjug ste/ de dag dang gzhan yang gang sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i bslab
283b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ 'gal ba dang/ dge 'dun gyis bcas pa'i nang khrims dral ba dang/ goms pa dang/ gus par ma bgyi ba de dag thams cad/ bdag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar mi
284a1(mdo 'grel): 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol lo bshags so/ /mthol zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyi/ ma mthol ma bshags na de ltar mi 'gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum
284a2(mdo 'grel): du bzlas/ ltung ba de dag la ltung bar mthong ngam/ kha cig la khums lags/ phyin chad shin tu legs par sngom mam/ chos ji lta ba dang/ 'dul ba ji lta ba dang ston pa'i bstan pa ji lta ba bzhan du legs par sdom lags kyis/
284a3(mdo 'grel): yang 'di ltar shes bzhin du phyin chad mi bgyid lags so zhes dang/ thabs yin no lags/ /ltung ba bshags pa'i chog thams cad yang par smra ba'i paN+Di te de ba shAn+tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bodI bi
284a4(mdo 'grel): kar sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ a bat+ti de sha na bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ ltung ba bshags pa'i tshogs sangs rgyas la phyag
284a5(mdo 'grel): 'tshal/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ btsun pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas 'khor ba thog
284a6(mdo 'grel): ma ma mchis pa nas tha ma da lta la thug gi bar du 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas mi dge ba bcu bgyis pa dang/ mtshams med pa lnga dang/ de dang nye ba lnga dang/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pa
284a7(mdo 'grel): dang 'gal ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i bslab pa dang 'gal ba dang/ gsang sngags gyi dam tshig dang 'gal ba la sogs pa mdor na mtho ris dang mthar ba'i gegs su gyur cing/ 'khor ba dang ngan song gi rgyur gyur pa'i nyes ltung gi tshogs ni
284b1(mdo 'grel): mchis pa de dag thams cad bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ btsun pa'i spyan sngar mthol lo/ /bshags so/ /mi 'chab bo/ /mthol zhing bshags na bdag bde ba la dag par
284b2(mdo 'grel): gnas par 'gyur gyi/ ma mthol ma bshags na de ltar mi 'gyur ba lags so zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas mthong sngo ma dris la thabs yin no/ /legs so brjod do/ /dang por sbyor ba'i cho ga ni bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 'khor ba thog ma med pa
284b3(mdo 'grel): nas phyi nyon mongs pa mang ba 'am/ bag med pa la sogs pa'i stobs kyis nyes ltung gi tshogs mang po bdog ste mchi bas/ de dag dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar bshags par 'tshal bas thugs kyis/ bzang 'tshal zhes pa dang/ mjug ltung ba las bslang ba shan
284b4(mdo 'grel): tu bka' drin che lag zhes pa dang/ chos bzhin du mdzad pa rjes su mi rang zhes brjod par bya'o/ /ltung ba bshags pa'i chog slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha bdag
284b5(mdo 'grel): slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ tsa tu raM ga d+harmA tsarya/ bod skad du/ chos spyod yan lag bzhi pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ston pa bdag la dgongs su gsol bdag
284b6(mdo 'grel): mid 'ang? zhes bgyi bas ni/ /snying po byang chub mchis kyi bar/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum skyob pa bla na med/ /rab tu gus pas skyabs su mchi/ /rten gzung bar bya ba'i phyir skyabs su 'gro ba'i yan lag ste dang po'o/ /slob dpon bdag la dgongs su
284b7(mdo 'grel): gsol lo /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /thog med dus nas da lta'i bar/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis/ /lus dang ngag dang yid sgo nas/ /sdig pa mi dge ci bgyis pa/ /ma lus 'gyod pas so sor bshags/ /slan chad ci nus bsdam par bgyi/ /rgyud
285a1(mdo 'grel): dag par bya ba'i phyir sdig pa bshags pa'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o/ /slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol/ phyogs bcu nam mkha' i mthas gtugs na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /nyan thos rang sangs
285a2(mdo 'grel): rgyas rnams dang/ /'jig rten pa ni gang gis kyang/ /ma lus dge ba ci bgyid pa/ /de la rang nyid byed pa bas/ /lhag par dga' bas yi rang ngo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba tshogs chung dus bskyed pa'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o/ /slob dpon bdag la
285a3(mdo 'grel): dgongs su gsol/ ji ltar sngon gyi skyob rnams kyis/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /byang chub mchog rab thugs bskyed pa/ /de ltar bdag kyang ma rnams phyir/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub nges par bya ba'i phyir byang
285a4(mdo 'grel): chub tu sems bskyed pa'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o/ /mthar dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis don phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub mchog tu bsngo ba'i yan lag kyang bya ste/ bdag gis bsod nams 'di yis ni/ /sems can thams cad ma lus pa//
285a5(mdo 'grel): gdul dka' i sems ni rab zhi nas/ /'gro ba'i bla ma thob par shog /ces bya ba'o/ /chos spyod yan lag bzhi pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po sh+rI dza gta mi tA nan+ngas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor dbang phyug de nyid dang/
285a6(mdo 'grel): lots+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /rgya gar skad du/ saMptA ga sd+d+harma rzArya ba tar/ bod skad du/ dam pa'i chos spyod la 'jug pa'i yan lag bdun pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
285a7(mdo 'grel): chos dang 'phags tshogs ni/ /skyabs mchog bden gnyis yongs gzung bas/ /shes rab snying rje mnyam sbyor ba/ /bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag btsal ba'i yan lag ste dang po'o/ /skyabs gsum bla med rin chen la/ /phyi nang kho na nyid don can
285b1(mdo 'grel): mchod sprin bsam mi khyab rnams kyis/ /legs par mchod pa'i cho gas mchod/ /mchod pa 'bul ba'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o/ /'gro rnams bsgral 'dod bsam pa yis/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/
285b2(mdo 'grel): rtag tu gus pas skyabs su mchi/ /skyabs su 'gro ba'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o/ /bdag gi lus ngag yid sgo nas/ /mi zad sdig pa gang bgyis dang/ /bgyid stsal rjes su yi rang gang/ /de dag thams cad so sor bshags/ /sdig pa bshags pa'i yan lag ste
285b3(mdo 'grel): bzhi ba'o/ /rdzogs sangs byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rang rgyal rgyal ba'i slob ma dang/ /'jig rten bsod nams gang bgyid la'ang/ /dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo/ /rjes su yi rang ba'i yan lag ste lnga pa'o/ /shes rab snying rje dang bcas pa'i/ /brtson pas
285b4(mdo 'grel): sems can don du bdag/ sangs rgyas mdun du gnas bgyis te/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed bgyid/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i yan lag sta drug pa'o/ /bsod nams tshigs kyi chos 'di dag /byang chub gsum gyi rgyur gyur ba
285b5(mdo 'grel): bdag med gnyis kyi lam brten nas/ /mtho ris thar pa sgrub gyur cig /bdag gi bsod nams gang bgyis pas/ /skye bos rgyal ba thob gyur te/ /gus pas sems can thams cad don/ /rgya chen yang dag byed gyur cig /bdag ni tshe rabs thams cad
285b6(mdo 'grel): du/ sangs rgyas mthong ba nyid gyur cig /dam pa'i chos ni nyan pa dang/ /dge 'dun zhabs 'bring byed gyur cig /thabs mkhas yang dag bshes gnyen ldan/ /chos dang zang zing sbyin byed cing/ /longs spyod sems can thun mong dang/ /pha rol phyin pa
285b7(mdo 'grel): kun rdzogs shog /'byor pa phul ba'i bsod nams dang/ /tshul khrims legs par bzung ba dang/ /dam chos yang dag mnyan pa yis/ /bdag ni byang chub mchog thob shog /bdag ni 'di nas shi 'phos che/ /dga' ldan skyes nas yid dge bas/ /myur
286a1(mdo 'grel): du byams mgon mnyes byas te/ /byang chub lung bstan rnyed par shog /smon lam gdab pa'i yan lag ste bdun pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos spyod la 'jug pa'i yan lag bdun pa/ kha? che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya sh+rI b+ha dras mdzad
286a2(mdo 'grel): pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang/ bod kyi lotsTsa ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //byang chub sems dpa' i lam gyi rim pa mdor bsdus pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ po d+hi satwa sya
286a3(mdo 'grel): ma rga kra ma saM gra ha/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' i lam gyi rim pa mdor bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsum bdag nyid kun khyab rtag/ ye shes thugs rje dbyer med pas/ /sems
286a4(mdo 'grel): can don kun bsgrub mdzad pa/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la gus phyag 'tshal/ /gdul bya'i skye bo rjes bzung phyir/ /byams dpal lo tsAs? rab bskul bas/ /rgyal sras lam rim mdor bsdus ni/ /bdag gis ji ltar bzod ltar brjod do/ /thog mar bshes
286a5(mdo 'grel): gnyen bsten bya ste/ /de yi legs spyad yon tan blang/ /de yang sems can don bstan nus/ /shes sogs yon tan pha rol phyin/ /phun tshogs dal ba myur du 'jig/ las dang de 'bras sdug bsngal yin/ /de spong shes rab snying rje bsgom/ /kun mkhyen
286a6(mdo 'grel): bstan pa'i snying po'o/ /mi khom brgyad spangs 'byor bcas pa'i/ /dal ba phun tshogs rnyed dka' ste/ /rgya mtsho cher yangs shing bug tu/ /rus sbal mgrin chud dang mtshungs gsungs/ /de yang mi rtag mdun gnas te/ /skad cig mi sdong rnam par 'jig /
286a7(mdo 'grel): 'du byed sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'dir/ /chos dang gar zag bdag med nyid/ /de bzhin nyon mongs nye nyon mongs/ /lus dag yid kyis bskyed pa yi/ /dge dang mi dge kun 'byung ba/ /las dang nyon mongs ming gis gngags/ /sdig pas ngan 'gror lhung
286b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ /sdug bsngal sdug bsngal 'thob par 'gyur/ /dge bas lha dang mir 'phen mod/ /de yang yongs 'gyur sdug bsngal nyid/ /de bas sems can don sgrub phyir/ /byang chub sems bskyed de yi rgyun/ /stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can/ /bsgom bya lam gyi
286b2(mdo 'grel): mchog yin no/ /lus dang tshor ba sems dang chos/ /phyi nang gnyis bdag tshul lus kyi/ mtshan nyid nges brtags mnyam 'jog pa/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhi bsgom/ /dge chos bskyed cing rnam 'phel dang/ /sdig sems mi skyed nyar 'joms pa/ /bde gshegs
286b3(mdo 'grel): kyis gsungs skyon sel phyir/ /yang dag spong ba bzhi rab bsgrags/ /'dun dang brtson 'grus sems dang ni/ /dpyod pa'i bye brag gis phye ba/ /mi mthun mnyen po'i phyogs dbang gis/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhir 'dod do/ /dad dang brtson bgrus dran pa dang/ /ting 'dzin shes
286b4(mdo 'grel): rab ces grags pa/ /thar pa'i rgyu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rgyal sras dbang po lngar gsungs so/ /dad sogs rnam 'phel lnga thob pa/ /mi mthun phyogs 'joms zag bcas dang/ /zag pa med mdza' bcas 'di dag/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis stobs zhes bstan/ /dran dang shes
286b5(mdo 'grel): rab 'byed brtson 'grus/ /dga' dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang/ /ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms rnams/ /byang chub yan lag bdun du 'dod/ /yang dag ldan dang rtog pa dang/ /ngag dang las mdza' 'tsho ba dang/ /brtson 'grus dran dang ting 'dzin ni/ /'phags lam yan lag
286b6(mdo 'grel): brgyad du bzhed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bgrod pa'i lam/ /byang chub phyogs chos sum cu bdun/ /blo ldan rnams kyis mnyan rjes su/ /zab yang rjes 'brengs rtag tu bsgom/ /de la gsum ni tshogs kyi lam/ /gnyis rim nges 'byin yan lag dang/ /byang chub yan lag
286b7(mdo 'grel): mthong lam ste/ /yan lag brgyad ni bsgom lam du'o/ /sdug bsngal me gsum gyis skrag pas/ /skye bo 'khor ba las dbyung phyir/ /snying brtse brtson 'grus dang ldan gyis/ /sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub blo gros bskyed/ /phung po bdag min de la bdag/ ldan min bdag kyang
287a1(mdo 'grel): de min te/ /de ldan ma yin bya byed kyis/ /mthun dngos min bdag stong pa nyid/ /khyab dang rtag par byed po dang/ /rang dbang longs spyod chos nyid can/ /bdag ni phung po dang 'gal pas/ /de phyir de gcig ji ltar 'grub/ /bya
287a2(mdo 'grel): dang byed ba'i dngos po ni/ /rtag tu lhan cig srid ma yin/ /de yang de ldan ma yin pas/ /de yi gzhan phyogs gsum yong ngo/ /phung po yang der rigs min te/ /de yis de ltar 'dod byas nas/ /rtag tu thar pa thog 'gyur te/ /gzugs so/ /dngos bral mdza' 
287a3(mdo 'grel): phyir ro/ rgyu 'dra'i phyi rol gzung don med/ /de med der 'dzin yod ma yin/ /rnam rig tsam de shes de yang/ /gdod nas ma skyes de bdag med/ /brtse ba tsam gyis srid par 'phan/ /shes rab dman pas mya ngan 'da' / /de phyir phan tshun mnyam ldan pas/ /
287a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal bas bla med lam du gsungs/ the gu las sbrul 'dir bsal med/ /the guAng gsar gzhag ci yang med/ /mar mes the gu yang dag mthong/ /de mthong 'jigs pa rnam par spangs/ /'di la bsal bya ci yang med/ /bzhag par bya ba'ang cung zad med/ /
287a5(mdo 'grel): yang dag nyid la yang dag lta/ /yang dag mthong nas rnam grol bshad/ /'di dag dman par bsgom na ni/ /'phags lam byang chub dman nyid 'thob/ /bsams sogs yang ni dman nyid kyis/ /bdag tu lta ba spong bar byed/ /rgya chen 'gro ba'i don bsgrul
287a6(mdo 'grel): bas/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kho nas/ /sku gsum byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/ /bdag gis 'di bsdus bsod nams ni/ /bskrun gyur gang des skye bo kun/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob nas/ /'gro la phan bde sbyin par shog /dge slong shAkya'i dpal
287a7(mdo 'grel): bzang med/ /bdag kyang gdul bya lhan cig tu/ /byams mgon 'phags pa'i zhabs pad drung/ /skyes nas de dgongs gsal skyed shog/ byang chub sems dpa' i lam gyi rim pa de kho na nyid bsdus ba/ dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla bral pa'i panDi ta chen
287b1(mdo 'grel): po/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gsum bar yongs su grags pa'i kha che shAkya sh+rI bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //panDi ta chen po de nyid dang lo ts+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal ldan gyis rgyang ros lu'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// //
287b2(mdo 'grel): dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa' i lam/ /mdor bsdus rim pa legs mnyan pa'i/ /bsod nams bdag gis gang bsgrubs des/ /'gro kun bde gshegs myur thob shog /lnga rig brtul zhugs dri med rnam thar dang/ /bstan pa'i snying po bsgrub pa lhur mdzad
287b3(mdo 'grel): pa/ nyi 'og khams na mtshungs med gcig pu de'i/ /gsung 'di phyogs su nyi ltar rgyas gyur cig/ //*/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i sAts+tsha gdab pa'i cho ga bzhugs so// //pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i sAts+tsha gdab pa'i cho ga/ sangs rgyas
287b4(mdo 'grel): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bai ro tsa nA ya bra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ a rha te saM myag ksaM bud+d+ha ya/ ta dya thA/ oM suk+Sh+me su k+Sh+me/ sa me sa ma ye/ shAn+te dA n+te/ a sa mA ro be/ a na lam+b+he/ ta raM b+he/ ya sha/ wa?
287b5(mdo 'grel): ti/ mahA te dza/ ni ra ku le/ ni ri ba Ne/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a d+hi Sh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ gzungs 'dis 'jim pa'i gong bu 'am bye ma'i gong bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la mchod rten bya'o/ /mchod rten de la rdul phra rab kyi gra das ji snyed yong pa
287b6(mdo 'grel): de snyed kyi mchod rten bye ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /rdul phra rab grangs ji snyed yod bde snyed kyi lha dang mi rnams kyi skye ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa na skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
287b7(mdo 'grel): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /dang por 'jim pa brdung bdag gam gzhan yang rung bas byams pa dang snying rjes byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya zhing brdung ngo/ /de nas 'bi 'bi byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'og min nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
288a1(mdo 'grel): par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa la phyag btsal bar bsam zhing/ sngags kyi grangs gong ma bzhin du brjod do/ /de nas brten 'brel gyi sda?
288a2(mdo 'grel): bzlas shing gdab bo/ /de nas 'bru 'am me tog la brten 'brel gyi sngags lan gsum mam bdun bzlas la dbul lo/ /de nas bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid/ /thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te/ /rga nad 'chi da'i dba'
288a3(mdo 'grel): klong 'khrugs pa yi/ /srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par shog/ ces smon lam gad bo/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i sAtsTsa gdab pa'i cho ga/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
288a4(mdo 'grel): oM ye d+ha rmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShA na ta thA ga to hya da ta te ShA ny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA sh+ra ma Na:// //*/ /bla ma'i bya ba'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa bzhugs// //rgya gar skad du/ gu ru kri ya kra ma/ bod skad du/ bla ma'i bya ba'i
288a5(mdo 'grel): rim pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por tshad dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis/ slob ma la dad ba dang yid ches pa dang 'dod pa'i dad pa skyes la/ de nas byang chub kyi sems kyi phan yon brjod la spro ba bskyed par bya'o
288a6(mdo 'grel): de nas gnas khang khyad par can du mchod pa'i tshogs khyad par can bshams la/ 'phags pa'i tshogs spyan drangs te/ phyag btsal ba dang/ zhabs bsil zhing gdan 'bul ba dang/ bla na yod pa dang/ bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis legs par
288a7(mdo 'grel): mchod cing/ mchod pa'i sprin gyi sngags kyang lan gsum brjod do/ /stong pa byed pas bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan khyad par can dran pa'i sgo nas gus bas bstod cing/ /de dang de 'phal ba'i tshig kyang brjod do/ /da nas bshags pa dang rjes su yi rang ba dang/ bskul?
288b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ gsol ba gdab pa dang bsngo ba la sogs pa bya ste/ de nas slob ma dad pa dang ldan pas slob dpon la phyag byas la/ gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pas byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis legs par bskyed la/ /de dag gi rang gi ngo bo dang/ dbye ba dag/ khyad
288b2(mdo 'grel): par yang brjod do/ /de nas byang chub kyi spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/ bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ rgyu dang 'bras bu dang/ bslab pa'i go rim dang/ nyams pa dang mnyams pa'i skyon yon dang/ tshul ji ltar
288b3(mdo 'grel): bslab pa la sogs pa yang rgyas par bstan par bya'o/ /de yang bag yod pa dang/ shes bzhin dang/ dran pas zin par bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o/ /de dag gi mtshan nyid dang/ ro rim dang/ nyams pa dang ma nyams pa'i skyon yon la sogs pa yang
288b4(mdo 'grel): bslab par bya'o/ /de dag byed pa la yang brtson 'grus drag pos bskyed la ji mi snyam pa dang/ sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang/ ma yengs pa'i bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyis rang bzhin med par shes par byas la/ bslab pa gsum mam
288b5(mdo 'grel): shes rab rnam pa gsum la mnyam par bzhag pa dang/ spyod lam gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o zhes bstan par bya'o/ /mthar smon lam gyis yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig ces kyang brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i las kyi go rim
288b6(mdo 'grel): mo/ /slob mas kyang tshul ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bslab par bya'o/ /'di ni mtshan nyid thag pa chen po'i sems bskyed pa dang/ bslab pa bstan pa'i tshul lam go rim che long tsam bstan pa yin no/ /rgyas par ni gzhan nas shes par bya'o/ /bla ma'i bya
288b7(mdo 'grel): ba'i rim pa mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdogs so// //sdom pa gsum gyi rim pa bzhugs// / //rgya gar skad du/ dri sa ba ra kra ma/ bod skad du/ sdom
289a1(mdo 'grel): pa gsum gyi rim pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa slob pa la/ bsnyen gnas dpag pa dang/ dge ba snyen gyi sdom pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i sems bskyed pa dang por
289a2(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /bsnyen gnas dpog pa ni/ btsun pa 'am/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ /bdag dge bsnyen ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ /ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skya ba su mtsha'o/ /de bzhin du lan gnyis
289a3(mdo 'grel): lan gsum du bya'o/ /de ltar bcun pas bdag la gsum la skyabs su song bar bzung du gsol zhes bya'o/ /btsum pa'am slob dpon bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag dge ba snyen ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ /ji srid sang nyi ma shar
289a4(mdo 'grel): gyi bar du/ srog chags so cog gsod pa dang/ gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang/ mi tshangs par spyod pa dang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ myongs byed 'thung ba dang/ dus ma yin par tha ba dang/ /phred ba dang/ kha dog bsgyur ba dang/ gar dang/ klu dang/ rtsed 'od dang/ ma la
289a5(mdo 'grel): stan mthon po la sogs pa ldog par bgyid pa/ yon tan brgyad kyis bdag dgra bcom pa rnams kyi tshul du 'jog zhes bya ba ni bsnyen gnas dpog pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa brjod cing/ bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes pa gyi ba dus 'di nas
289a6(mdo 'grel): bzung ste/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rkad gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /theg pa chen po'i chos mdza' dag la skyabs su mchi'o/ /tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pas bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du
289a7(mdo 'grel): gsol/ thabs yin no legs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa brjod cig/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las log par de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes ba gyi ba yang
289b1(mdo 'grel): dus 'di nas bzung ste/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyid do/ /yan lag dang po 'dis bdag 'phags pa dag bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su rlob bo/ /rjes su bsgrub po/ /rjes pa byed do/ /gzhan yang 'ong ??
289b2(mdo 'grel): bcom pa de dag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang/?/ bdun du smra ba dang/ 'bru'i chad dang/ bcos pa'i chad myos par 'gyur ba/ bag med pa'o gnas slongs te/ ma byin par lan pa dang/
289b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas log bar g.yem pa dang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ 'bru'i chang dang/ bcos pa'i chad mos pad 'gyur pa bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog pa de bzhin du/ /bdag ming 'di zhes pas kyang dus 'di nas bzung ste/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par
289b4(mdo 'grel): len pa dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ 'bru'i chad dang/ bcos pa'i chang myos par gyur pa bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pas log bar g.yem pa dang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ 'bru'i chad dang/
289b5(mdo 'grel): bcos pa'i chad myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par bgyid do/ /yan lag gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa dang/ lnga pa 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su bslab bo/ /rjes su bsgrub bo/ /rjes su
289b6(mdo 'grel): bgyid do/ /thabs yin no/ /legs so/ /dge ba snyen gyi sdom pa dbog pa'o/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang deng nas
289b7(mdo 'grel): bzung ste/ ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang/ ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang/ sems can dzugs ma byin pa rnams dbugs phyin pa dang/ sems can yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa
290a1(mdo 'grel): rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba' i slad du/ byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bdag gi de ring skyob ba thams cad kyi/ spyan sngar 'gro ba bde gshegs nyid dang ni/ /bar du bde la mgron du bos brin gyis
290a2(mdo 'grel): lha dang lha min la sogs dga' ba bgyis/ /zhes de ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ 'jig rten skyod pa brgyad la sogs pa'i lha rnams thams cad yid kyi dmigs te/ dad pa chen pos byang chub tu sems bskyed par
290a3(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /de ltar kun rdzob kyi rnam pa smon lam gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed do/ /don dam pa la ni bsgom pa'i stobs kyis bskyed bar bya'o/ /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/ /sdom pa gsum gyi rim pa/ slob dpon chen po
290a4(mdo 'grel): rnyog med rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tu lya dA sa dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// //bton glegs pa ma glog pa'i sngon du bya ba'i chog bzhugs so// //
290a5(mdo 'grel): kha ton dang glrogs bam blag pa'i sngon du bya ba'i chog /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po re zhig byang chub sems dpa' chos kha ton du bya bar 'dod pa dang/ glegs bam du bya ba klog par 'dod pas
290a6(mdo 'grel): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab ste/ yid kyis kun tu dmigs la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi chog/
290a7(mdo 'grel): phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa yan lag bdun gyi tshul du mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod do/ /de'i rjes la sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag ste/ yod dge ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas de ltar bsams pa'i rjes
290b1(mdo 'grel): la/ tshig lan gsum brjod par bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi tshig gcig gi don gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi yang yin na/ 'on kyang bdag ni rang gi las kyis nyes pas shes rab chung zhing blo zhan te/ de lta yin du
290b2(mdo 'grel): brin? kyang/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab bzung nas de bdag gi kha ton byas te/ chos kyi sgra de sems can gang gi rna lam du grags pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa thob par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos tshig
290b3(mdo 'grel): gcig gi don gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad kyi yang yin na/ 'on kyang bdag ni rang gi las kyis nyes pas shes rab chung zhing blo zhan te/ de ltar yin du zin kyang/ gang bdag gis glegs bam du byas pa'i chos bklag par bya ste/ chos kyi sgra de
290b4(mdo 'grel): sems can gang rnams kyi rna lam du grags pa de dag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa thob par gyur cig /ces lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /kha ton dang glegs bam bklag pa'i cho ga slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad
290b5(mdo 'grel): ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //theg pa chen po'i man ngag tshigs su bcad pa panDi ta shAkyag sh+ri'asa mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ /ma hA ya no ba de sha gA thA/ bod ska du/ theg pa chen
290b6(mdo 'grel): po'i man ngag tshigs su bcad pa/ rje btsun mi pham mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnyed dka' i ngal 'byor myur du 'jig/ /'jig rten las 'bras sdug bsngal yin/ /de spong stong nyid snying rje bsgom/ /bde gshegs bstan pa'i snying
290b7(mdo 'grel): po'o/ /bde 'dod skyes bus bsod nams bsags/ /de yang rang bzhin med par bsgom/ /rang bzhin med shes bsod nams mchog /de phyir bsod nams bde ba'i rgyu/ /bsod nams bsags pas bde ba 'thob/ /
291a1(mdo 'grel): de phyir mis ni bsod nams bsags/ /de yang yang dang yang du bsgrub/ /de ring nyid nas 'dun te bsgrub/ /chos kun rang sems rnam par snang/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal dri ma med/ /
291a2(mdo 'grel): stong nyid snying rje ro gcig thabs/ /de bsdom 'bras bu byang chub mchog /sems can kun gyi don bsgrub phyir/ /byang chub mchog gnyis sems bskyed de/ /stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can/ /bsgom bya de 'bras sku gsum
291a3(mdo 'grel): 'thob/ /bsam pa rin chen sems gnyis 'brel/ /sbyor ba dka' spyang dang len dang/ /rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs shes/ /gnod pas skyon med sangs rgyas sras/ /skye 'gag gnas med byang chub sems/ /rgya chen sems can
291a4(mdo 'grel): don la mkhas/ /tshogs gnyis rgyun chad med pa'i lam/ /stong nyid snying rje'i snying po'o/ /rmi lam lta bur phyi rol min/ /sgyu ma lta bur bden don med/ /nam mkha' lta bur mtshan nyid bral/ /chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal yin/ /rang
291a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin 'od gsal nyid las 'dir/ /ma skyes skye ba'i rten can gyi/ /byang chub sems gnyis rjes 'brel bas/ /sems can kun don spyad par bya/ /dam pa gsum gyis sdig las zlog /dri med gnyis kyis dge tshogs bsgrub/ /mnyam
291a6(mdo 'grel): par bzhag pas rang sems gdul/ /bdag nyid chen po'i sgrub pa'o/ /sems ni rtag par byang chub 'dod/ /bya ba lus can don la brtson/ /bde sdug rmi lam 'drar shes pas/ /mkhas pas gzhan don sgrub par byed/ /khrims kyis
291a7(mdo 'grel): dal 'byor snying po blang/ /bsgrub pas bstan pa'i snying po blang/ /de yi snying po gzhan don no/ /rtse gcig gnas pas dran pa bsten/ /byang chub sems kyis tshogs gnyis bsag /ma bcos mthong bas mnyam par bzhag /bsgrub pa'i snying po/
291b1(mdo 'grel): mdor bsdus pa'o/ /gang gi skye dang gnas mthong ba/ /rmi lam mar me dag dang mtshungs/ /'gro ba brdzun pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis/ /rigs ldan skyes bu rtag tu bslus/ /'du byed gar mkhan lta bu ste/ /de yi rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dro?/ /pa bas?
291b2(mdo 'grel): pas don kun bsgrub 'dod pas/ /bden gnyis mtshan nyid rtogs par byos/ /bya byed phra men rdzu 'phrul 'dra/ /'chi bdag rig zar chu drag bzhin/ /mdza' sdang rmi lam dgra gnyen mtshungs/ /'jigs pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho yin/ /yid 'ong mi 'ong
291b3(mdo 'grel): rkyen gyis bsgrub/ /dge sdig kun slong bsam pas bsgrub/ /thos pas tshe yi snying po blang/ /thams cad las kyis 'grub 'gyur te/ /kye ma dal 'byor don yod byos/ /mdza' dang mi mdza' chags sngar gis/ /gtan sdug sdig pa 'phel 'gyur na/ /
291b4(mdo 'grel): thams cad slu ba'i chos can la/ /kye ma yid brtan su zhig 'cha'/ /yid mthun tshod grogs lta bur 'bral/ /mi mthun lam kha'i tsher shing bzhin/ /rang srog bum snar bud ba 'dra/ /thams cad sha lam grog tshang mtshungs/ /legs bshad me tog rtsi ltar
291b5(mdo 'grel): phan/ nyes spyad sbrul gdug so ltar gdug /kun kyang bdag sdug mi 'dod na/ /ngal ba don med ci tha tshig /nyin mtshan glog rgyun lta bur 'das/ /tshe srog chu sbur ji bzhin 'gag /bde sbyor chu 'gram bye ma bzhin/ /kye ma ji ltar bdag 'chi grang/ /'du
291b6(mdo 'grel): byed rmi lam yul 'dra ste/ /mja' bshes srang sdod tshod grogs mtshungs/ /dge sdig rang lus gri pa ma bzhin/ /ci byas mi bzad tshor ba'i rgyu/ /gshin rje'i pho nyas phyi bzhin gtugs/ /gnyen nor na bun lta bur dengs/ /'jigs chen g.yang sar bdag
291b7(mdo 'grel): ltung na/ /kye ho bsod nams su zhig gsog /srid gsum sdug bsngal me 'o bas 'bar/ /skye bo don med 'chid bas bcings/ /de bas snying brtse brtson 'grus kyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsgrub par bya/ /phung po bdag med sgyu ma 'dra/ /yid ni me long gzugs
292a1(mdo 'grel): bzhin te/ /sems can sgyu ma'i 'bras dang mtshungs/ /chos kun stong pa nyid shes bya/ /'khrul phyir snang ba phyi rol min/ /sna tshogs snang phyir snang min te/ /shes byed med phyir shes yod min/ /de phyir
292a2(mdo 'grel): chos kun ston pa nyid/ /brtse ba tsam gyis srid par 'phen/ /shes rab dman pa'i mya ngan 'da' / /de phyir phan tshun mnyam ldan pas/ /rgyal bas bla med lam du gsungs/ /nyin mtshan sdod med res 'jog 'gro/ /tshe 'di smon med rtag tu
292a3(mdo 'grel): 'brid/ /gzhan duAng cir 'gyur gdengs med na/ /'chi tshe bdag yid ji ltar bde/ /gang bsags bung ba'i rtsi ltar 'dor/ /gnyen sdug sbrul chad bya khyung bzhin/ /bdag cig ya nga'i thang la rgyu ba/ /kyi hud bzod dka' i tshor bas 'jigs/ /mi sdug
292a4(mdo 'grel): gshin rje'i pho nyas bzung/ /yid 'ong gnyen dang bshes pas spangs/ /skyabs gcig bsod nams rgyang bsrings nas/ /de tshe gnas skabs ci 'dra zhig /de ring nyid kyang 'chi srid na/ /lo brgyar bde bar gnas sam ci/ /nams kyang mi sdod 'gro
292a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur gyis/ /bdag don bdag gis bsgrub par gyis/ /'di la mi 'jigs suAng med/ /'jigs nas gdengs thob ci'ang med/ /gdengs drod dge las gzhan med na/ /ci phyir bdag yid bda bar 'dug /sngon chad ma myong bde sdug med/ /gang myong
292a6(mdo 'grel): de la snying po med/ /kye ma rmi lam sgyu 'bras slus/? da ni bla ma'i bka' bsgrub rigs/ /ji lta ji ltar sna tshogs spyod yul gang snang ba/ /rgyal sras spyod tshe yul dus ngo bo de med bsgom/ /de lta de ltar mnyam nyid 'gro 'ong med gnas nas/ /sems can
292a7(mdo 'grel): don brtson tshogs gnyis 'du byed mkhas par 'gyur/ /gson tshe rtswa rtse'i zil pa 'dra/ /pha rol la yang shin tu nye/ /gcig pur gar 'gro des med de/ /thams cad slu ba'i chos can nyid/ /bdag gis bdag don ma bsams na/ /nyin mtshan don med/
292b1(mdo 'grel): 'da' bar zad/ /mi dge spyad pas sdug bsngal 'byung/ /de pas bag yod brtson par rigs/ /ma thob thob na dga' snyam sems/ /thob nas cung zad cing kyang skyo/ /mi skyo na'ang chog shes med/ /chog shes gang med dbul po yin/ /dbul pos 'byor pa'i
292b2(mdo 'grel): chog mi shes/ /phyug po rgyal pos chog mi shes/ /rgyal po lha yi dbang phyug 'dod/ /des kyang mi chog brgya stong 'dod/ /gos med chen gos 'dod de/ /gos thob gos zas mang po 'dod/ /des kyang mi chog de bzhin du/ /rgyal yul sogs kyi gos gzhan tshol/
292b3(mdo 'grel): nor med tshe na nor 'dod de/ /gcig gis mi chog khri phrag tshol/ /de rnyed na yang pa du sha'i/ /rta glang gser ri la sogs 'dod/ /gcig thob brgya 'dod brgya rnyed na/ /stong 'dod de yi mi chog ste/ /gnyis 'gyur de bzhin sum 'gyur dang/ /brgya 'gyur la sogs 'dod
292b4(mdo 'grel): me mched/ /de phyir gang la chog shes yod/ /de la nor rnams thams cad yod/ /gang la de med thams cad med/ /phyag po dbul po'i khyad par ci/ /dbul po cung zad dngos pos phongs/ /cung zad thob na'ang che thob sems/ /phyug po tshogs med mang pos phongs/
292b5(mdo 'grel): chen po rnyed kyang chung dur sems/ /srid la yid skyo nges 'byung chog /bdag 'dul sangs rgyas bstan pa'i srog /'chi bdag mi bzad dgra bo'i sde/ /pha rol don shes rnyed pa'i mchog /bag byed khral yod chos 'dul yin/ /rang blo rang sbyong lhag pa'i sems
292b6(mdo 'grel): phyi nang stong shes shes rab ste/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sgrol pa'i gru/ /bstan rtsa bslab pa bsrung 'dod pas/ /'bang bas kun gyis sems bsrung bya/ /bslab pa ma bsrungs lus don ci/ /sems ma bsrungs na chos don med/
292b7(mdo 'grel): rang sems rang gis bsrung 'dod na/ /gsung bral mtshan ma med bsgom bya/ /sbul? pa lta bu'i dran pa yis/ /thams cad 'bad de bsrung bar gyis/ /bdag gi mnyam nyid rang bzhin te/ /yang dag don shes bsrung ba'i mchog /
293a1(mdo 'grel): gang gi lus sems sgyu 'drar ni/ /gnas nas yang yang mnyam bzhag bya/ /sdig byas 'bras bu rnam gsum ste/ /sdug bsngal chu bo'i rgyun

293a3(mdo 'grel): gsum/ /'di dag bsod nams mchod 'os 'bras/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas chos rje shAkya sh+rIs yul 'khor so sor byon pa'i tshe zhu ba po rnams kyi skal pa dang sbyar te zhar byung du brtsams
293a4(mdo 'grel): lots+tsha ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //mang+gA laM/
